src_text: Taolo ya Dikoduwa Kamora Dikgohola.
tgt_text: Ulawulo lweentlekele emva kwezikhukhula.

src_text: Kabinete lebisitse matshediso bathong bohle ba lahlehetsweng ke beng ka bona dikgoholeng tsa morao tse mpe tse ileng tsa hlasela dibaka tse ngata tsa naha ya rona, haholoholo KwaZulu-Natal..     Sepheo ka tsebahatso ya Maemo Dikoduwa Naha le dithuso tsa boiphediso tse sa tswa tsebahatswa ke Presidente Cyril Ramaphosa ne le ho netefatsa karabelo atlehileng le hlophisehileng makaleng ohle mmuso, ka Setsi sa Taolo ya Naha ya Dikoduwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ithi mabalale ngenxeba bonke abantu abaswelekelwe zizihlobo zabo kwezi zikhukhula zakutsha nje zenze umonakalo omkhulu bezithwaxe iindawo ezithile kweli lizwe lethu, ingakumbi kwiphondo laKwaZulu-Natal.

src_text: Biliyone ya diranta eo mmuso e ntshitseng sebedisetswa ho tshehetsa maiteko dithuso le ho iphumana, ho kgutlisa ditshebeletso tsa motheo le ho phallela ba hlokang ka ho ba thusa ka dijo, metsi, botshabelo, tsa bohlweki le diaparo.
tgt_text: Ukubhengezwa kweMeko yeNtlekele kwiZwelonke kunye namanyathelo oncedo kwezentlalo nakwezoqoqosho abhengezwe nguMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa, kuneenjongo zokuqinisekisa ukuba kukho intsebenziswano emandla nebambeneyo kuwo onke amaqoqo karhulumente, ngokusebenzisa iZiko leSizwe loLawulo lweeNtlekele.

src_text: Motjha wa ho aha botjha dibaka tse amehileng se qadile mme le batho ba naha ya rona ba kopane ka maikemisetso ho thusa ba lahlehetsweng ke bodulo le thepa ya bona..     Tlhahisoleseding ka Lefu laCoronavirus (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Le mali iyibhiliyoni yeerandi ikhutshwe ngurhulumente iza kusetyenziselwa ukuncedisa kumaphulo oncedo nawohlangulo, ukubuyisela iinkonzo ezisisiseko kunye nokunikezela uncedo olunxulumene nentlalontle yabantu olufana nokutya, amanzi, iindawo zokufihla intloko, ugutyulo kunye neempahla zokunxiba.

src_text: Kabinete kgathatsehile ka ho eketseha ha morao tjena ha ditshwaetso tsa COVID-19 dikarolong tse ding tsa naha mme ipileditse ho bohle ho nka mehato ya ho itshireletsa kgahlano le vaerase ena kotsi, haholoholo mariha tjena..     Vaerase ena ntse le kotsi mme ho enta ntse le sebetsa se bohlokwa haholo seo re ka itshireletsang ka sona.
tgt_text: Inkqubo yokwakha kwakhona iindawo ebezichaphazelekile sele iqalile njengoko abantu belizwe lakuthi bathe bafunquka ngobuninzi babo bafaka isandla kwabo amakhaya abo adilizwe zizikhukhula baze futhi balahlekelwa nazizinto zabo.

src_text: Kabinete thabiswa ke hore batho ba bangata ba ntse ba kgetha ho enta le tshireletso ya bona ya pele kgahlano le COVID-19 kamora hore dipalopalo tsa morao di bontshe hore batho ba baholo ba fetang dipersente tse mashome mahlano ba se ba entile diprovenseng tse hlano..     Kabinete ipiletsa ho ba so ente ho enta molemong wa ho itshireletsa le beng ka bona.
tgt_text: Ezakutsha malunga nesiFo seNtsholongwana ye-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Bohle re lokela ho tswela pele le ho ikamahanya le melao ya ho itshireletsa ho COVID-19 kenyeletsang ho rwala semonkwana se kwahelang nko le molomo, ho hlapa matsoho ka metsi le sesepa, kapa ho sebedisa sehlwekisi se nang le alcohol ballwang dipersenteng tse 70, le ho arohana le ba bang ka bonnyane mitara..     Thuso Imollang Nakong ya Mathata (SRD).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ixhalatyisiwe kukunyuka kwenani labantu abosulelwe yi-COVID-19 kutsha nje kwiindawo ezithile kweli lizwe kwaye ibongoza bonke abantu ukuba bathathe amanyathelo okuzikhusela kule ntsholongwana ingubhubhane, ingakumbi ngeli xesha lasebusika.

src_text: Kabinete kgothaleditse baahi ba fumanang R350 ya SRDGrant ho etsa dikopo hape, kamora hore ho kenngwe tshebetsong melawana metjha laolang dikopo le ho lokela ha batho ho fumana dithuso.
tgt_text: Le ntsholongwane iseyingxaki kuthi sonke kwaye inye indlela yokuyilwa nokuzikhusela kuyo, kukugonya.

src_text: Dikopo di ka etswa websaeteng ya Setheo sa Dithuso tsa Setjhaba sa Afrika Borwa (SASSA) leng:https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.Mokgwatshebetso wa dikopo butswe ka la 23 Mmesa 2022 mme etswa inthaneteng molemong wa ho potlakisa katleho ya ona..     Thuso ena ya ho imolla bohlokwa haholo malapeng hlokang le ka sulafallwang ke maphelo ka lebaka la bofuma le ho hloka mesebetsi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ichulumancile kukubona abantu abaninzi beqhubeleka besebenzisa amachiza okugonya njengezona zixhobo zokuzikhusela kwi-COVID-19 njengoko iingxelo zakutsha nje zichaza ukuba kumaphondo amahlanu ngabantu abadala abangaphezulu kwe-50% asele begonyiwe.

src_text: Mmuso ikemiseditse ho fana ka dithuso tsa setjhaba hoba hlokang haholo ba kgone ho fumana tseo ba di hlokang tsa motheo..     Polokeho le Tshireletseho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi icela abo bangekagonyi ukuba baye kugonya ukuze bakhusele bona kunye nezihlobo zabo.

src_text: Kabinete tswella le ho nyatsa ho bolawa ka sehloho ha basadi mme ananetse karabelo potlakileng ya mapolesa ha tshwara babelaellwa polaong ya Mofumahatsana Hillary Gardee (28), waKamaguguMpumalanga.
tgt_text: Kufuneka futhi siqhubeleke nokuthobela imiqathango yokuthintela i-COVID-19, equka ukunxiba isifonyo esigquma impumlo nomlomo, ukuhlamba izandla ngamanzi anesepha okanye ukusebenzisa isibulala-ntsholongwane esine-alkhoholi eyi-70%, kunye nokuqinisekisa ukuba kukho umgama oyimitha enye phakathi kwethu.

src_text: Kabinete boetse nyatsitse ho bolawa ha batho ba tsheletseng Khayelitsha, Motsekapa.
tgt_text: IsiBonelelo sezeNtlalo soNcedo (i-SRD).

src_text: Dipolao tsena tse sehloho di re hopotsa hore re lokela ho sebetsa ka matla re le setjhaba ho fedisa dikgoka le dikgoka tsa bong le polao ya basadi (GBVF)..     Kabinete ipileditse ho bohle naheng ena ho sebetsa mmoho le mmuso ntweng kgahlano le bosenyi le GBVF.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikhuthaza abemi beli abafumana isiBonelelo se-SRD esiyi-R350 ukuba baphinde bafake izicelo kwakhona kulandela ukuqaliswa kwemigaqo emitsha eza kulandelwa xa kuphicothwa izicelo kujongwa ukuba umntu ufanelekile na ukuba afumane esi sibonelelo.

src_text: Mmoho re ka netefatsa hore metse le diterata tsa rona di bolokehile bakeng sa batho bohle, ho kenyeletsa maqheku, basadi le bana..     Moruo.
tgt_text: Izicelo kufuneka zifakwe kwiwebhusayithi ye-Arhente yoMzantsi Afrika yeziBonelelo zeNtlalo (i-SASSA) ethi: https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse ho bulwa semmuso ha feme ya ho etsa ditene ya Kwastina ya Corobrik, Driefontein,Gauteng ke Presidente Ramaphosa ka Laboraro la la 4 Motsheanong.
tgt_text: Inkqubo yokungenisa izicelo yavulwa ngomhla wama-23 kuTshazimpunzi 2022 kwaye yonke iqhutywa ngobuxhaka-xhaka be-intanethi into leyo iza kwenza ukuba ikhawuleze..     Isibonelelo soncedo sibalulekile ukunceda amakhaya angathathi ntweni engethwaxwa kanobom yindlala nentswela-msebenzi ukuba besingekho.

src_text: Feme ena ya maemo phahameng haholo ke karolo ya matsete diranta tse dimiliyone tse 800 tsamayang mmoho le diranta tse ding tse dimiliyone tse 200 tse behetsweng ho atolosa feme ya Corobrik ya konkreiti KwaZulu-Natal.Corobrik ke nngwe ya dikgwebo tsa mona tse ileng tsa utlwa boipiletso ba Presidente Ramaphosa ba hore dikgwebo tsa Afrika Borwa le tsa matjhaba di tsetele moruong wa naha ena.
tgt_text: Urhulumente uzimisele ukunikezela ngezibonelelo kubantu abangathathi ntweni ukuba bakwazi ukufumana izinto ezisisiseko zokuziphilisa..     Ukhuselo nokhuseleko.

src_text: Kabinete elelletswe hore moruo fokolang wahydrogen matlafaditswe kamora ho thakgolwa ha lori sebedisang hydrogen ke Anglo American.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyaqhubeleka nokugxeka kabukhali umkhuba wokubulawa kwamabhinqa ngolunya kwaye iyawubulela umsebenzi owenziwe ngamagosa olwaphulo-mthetho athe abamba ngokukhawuleza abarhanelwa abakrokrelwa ngokubulala uNksz Hillary Gardee (obeneminyaka engama-28 ubudala), waKamagugu eMpumalanga.

src_text: Lori ena neng sebedisa diesel mme ya fetolelwa tshebedisong ya hydrogen le sebedisang le dibetri tsa lithium-ion keya pele lefatsheng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyakugxeka kunye nokubulawa kwabantu abathandathu eKhayelitsha.

src_text: Moruo wahydrogen hlwauwe le lewa le pele moruong wa naha ya rona lwantshang tshenyo ya tikoloho, mme moruo ona tla ntshetsa pele kgolo moruong thuse le ho thehweng ha mesebetsi..     Kabinetee boetse ananetse matsete mang moruong wa rona ka khampani ya dijo ya Ireland, The Kerry Group butseng feme ya diranta tse dimiliyone tse 650, Hammarsdale,KwaZulu-Natal, eo sepheo ka yona leng ho hlahisa dijo ho ya ho ile kontinenteng.
tgt_text: Lo mkhuba wokubulawa kwabantu ngolunya usikhumbuza ukuba kusekuninzi ekufuneka sikwenzile sisisizwe ukulwa ubundlobongela ngokubanzi kunye nobo busekelwe kwisini kunye nokubulawa kwamanina (i-GBVF).

src_text: Feme ena ke ikgethang hobane na le dikarolo tsa moshwelella tse kenyeletsang disebediswa tsa eneji nyenyane, tlhahiso ya matla letsatsi ho fokotsa tshebediso ya motlakase wa keriti ya naha ena, mokgwa wa paballo ya eneji, le wa paballo ya metsi, tshebediso ya ona hape le mokgwa wa ho fokotsa tshebediso ya ona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibongoza bonke abantu elizweni ukuba basebenzisane norhulumente kwidabi lokulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho ne-GBVF.

src_text: The Kerry Group fihlile Afrika Borwa ka 2011, mme matsete yona amang ke letshwao la hore Afrika Borwa ntse ratelwa matsete.
tgt_text: Xa sibambisene singaqinisekisa ukuba bakhuselekile abantu kunye neendawo abahlala kuzo, abo bantu baquka abantu abadala, amanina kunye nabantwana..     Ezoqoqosho.

src_text: Matsete ana tla kamora ho thakgolwa ha vene ena ya Isuzu D-Max hlahisitsweng naheng, Gqeberha, Kapa Botjhabela kgweding fetileng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuvulwa ngokusesikweni komzi-mveliso wokwenza izitena wakwa-Kwastina Corobrik ose-Driefontein e-Gauteng nguMongameli Ramaphosa ngoLwesithathu, umhla wesi-4 kuCanzibe.

src_text: Koloi ena ya D-MAX ya mehleng ena bontsha boinehelo ba Isuzu naheng ena mmeke nngwe ya dikatleho tse fihletsweng tlasa Lenaneo la Ntshetsopele ya Tlhahiso ya Makoloi (APDP).
tgt_text: Lo mzi-mveliso wale mihla uyinxalenye yotyalo-mali oluxabisa izigidi zeerandi ezingama-800, oluhambisana nolunye lwezigidi zeerandi ezingama-200 ezibekelwe ukwandisa umzi-mveliso wakwa-Corobrik oKwaZulu-Natal.

src_text: APDP ke mokgwatshebetso wa kgothatso wa tlhahiso bakeng sa indasteri ya makoloi oo sepheo ka ona leng ho phahamisa tlhahiso indastering boletsweng ya makoloi, ho phahamisa bolengindastering mme ka tsela ena ho thehwe mesebetsi makaleng ohle amanang le tlhahiso ya makoloi.Kediranta tse dibiliyone tse batlang di eba 2,8 tse tla etswa ka tlhahiso ya mona nakong ya tshebetso ya APDP.
tgt_text: U-Corobrik yenye yeenkampani eziliqela zeli ezithe zasabela ikhwelo elahlatywa nguMongameli Ramaphosa kwinkampani zoMzantsi Afrika nezehlabathi ukuba zityale imali kuqoqosho lweli lizwe..     IKhabhinethi ithethile nangomba wecandelo lehaydrojini elikhulayo elithe lahlutshezwa nayiloli ehamba ngehaydrojini yakwa-Anglo American.

src_text: Matsete tla thusa ho theha mesebetsi fetang 1000 ka palo ka kotloloho femeng, le meng ya tlatsetso hirang batho ba 24 000, mme sena se tla kenya letsoho matlafatsong ya baahi lebatoweng.
tgt_text: Le loli – ebikade ihamba ngedizili yaza yatshintshwa yayesebenzisa ihaydrojini futhi isebenzisa neebhetri ze-lithium-ion – yeyokuqala elolu hlobo ehlabathini.

src_text: Seboka sa tsa Merafo.
tgt_text: Icandelo lehaydrojini lityuntywe njengalamanye abalulekileyo ekufuneka akhokeliswe phambili kuqoqosho lweli olungenabungozi kokusingqongileyo, kunye nokukhokela kumaphulo okukhulisa uqoqosho nawokudala imisebenzi..     IKhabhinethi iphinde yalubulela notyalo-mali olwenziwe yinkampani yase-Ireland, i-Kerry Group, evule umzi-mveliso oxabisa imali ezizigidi zeerandi ezingama-650 e-Hammersdale, kwiphondo laKwaZulu-Natal, inkampani leyo iza kuvelisela eli lizwekazi ukutya ngendlela engazikwenza monakalo kokusingqongileyo.

src_text: Investing in African Mining Indaba 2022 neng tshwaretswe Cape Town International Convention Centreho tloha ka la 9 ho ya ho la 12 Motsheanong 2022, ke le leng la mapatlelo maholo ho bontshana le tshebedisano pakeng tsa ba amehang indastering ya merafo.
tgt_text: Lo mzi-mveliso ufana wodwa kuba usebenzisa iintlobo zobuxhaka-xhaka obungenzi monakalo kokusingqongileyo obuquka izixhobo ezingatyi mbane kakhulu, ukuvelisa umbane ngemitha yelanga ukuze ungatyi kakhulu umbane oveliswa liziko lombane leli, ukuvelisa amandla okuzifudumeza kusetyenziswa inkunkuma, ukuqokelelwa, ukusetyenziswa kwakhona kunye nokuphungulwa kwamanzi asetyenziswayo ngendlela ehlakaniphileyo.

src_text: Mookotaba wa ketsahalo ena ne le: “Ntshetsopele ho tsa Merafo Afrika: Matsete Diphetohong ho tsa Eneji, ESG, leMeruo”.
tgt_text: Le nkampani yakwa-Kerry Group yaqala ukusebenza eMzantsi Afrika ngowama-2011, futhi ukutyala kwayo enye imali kubonakalisa ukuba uMzantsi Afrika lilizwe elithandwayo ngabatyali-mali.

src_text: Kabinete na le tshepo ya hore Seboka sa tsa Merafo se tla thusa ho pepesa le ho phahamisa Afrika Borwa jwaloka naha ka kgahlang batsetedi..     Afrika Borwa amohela matsete naheng ya rona mme inehetse ho theheng maemo loketseng kgolo kenyeletsang bohle le diphetoho moruong..     Dikamano le Dinaha tsa Matjhaba le tsa Mabatowa.
tgt_text: La maphulo otyalo-mali alandela kanye emva kokuba kuveliswe i-bakkie eluhlobo lwe-Isuzu D-Max eGqebera eMpuma Koloni kule nyanga iphelileyo.

src_text: Kabinete boetse ananetse ditherisano tsa morao tjena tsa Presidente Ramaphosa le Presidente Joe Biden wa Amerika, Presidente Emmanuel Macron wa France le Presidente Hakainde Hichilema wa Zambia mapatlelong fapaneng.
tgt_text: Olu hlobo lutsha lwebakkie luyi-D-MAX lubonisa phandle ukuba abakwa-Isuzu bazimisele ukuzinza eMzantsi Afrika kwaye luyeminye yemisebenzi emihle ezelwe yiNkqubo yokuPhuhlisa iMizi-mveliso yeziThuthi (i-APDP).

src_text: Dipuisano tsena di nehile Presidente monyetla wa ho tiisa maqhama le tshebedisano pakeng tsa Afrika Borwa le dinaha tse ding ditabeng tsa bohlokwa boemong ba mabatowa le matjhaba, ho kenyeletsa ho fumana tharollo ya kgotso ntweng ya Ukraine     Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: I-APDP sisibonelelo secandelo lezithuthi esenzelwe ukunyusa umthamo wezithuthi eziveliswayo , into leyo eza kukhwezela necandelo leentsimbi zeemoto ngolo hlobo kudaleke imisebenzi kuwo onke amashishini achaphazelekayo kwicandelo lezithuthi.

src_text: Dipuo tsa Ditekanyetso tsa Ditjhelete.
tgt_text: Imali eqikelelwa kwiibhiliyoni zeerandi eziyi-2,8 iza kwenziwa kumashishini avelisa iintsimbi zeemoto alapha ekhaya ngoku isaqhubeka ukusebenza i-APDP.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho baahi bohle ho mamela Dipuo tsa Ditekanyetso tsa Ditjhelete tsa mafapha naha mmuso le puo ya lefapha la Bopresidente molemong wa hore ba behe mmuso leihlo..     Ha ho tekwa Dipuo tsa Ditekanyetso, mafapha ohle fana ka dintlha tse felletseng tsa merero le tsa bohlokwa tseo ikemiseditseng ho di phetha selemong.
tgt_text: Olu tyalo-mali luza kudala imisebenzi engaphezulu kwe-1 000 eza kuvela ngqo kulo mzi-mveliso luze ludale neminye engama-24 000 kwamanye amacandelo asebenzisana neli, into leyo iza kuphelisa intsokolo kubantu balo mmandla.

src_text: Sepheo ka Dipuo tsa Ditekanyetso ke ho netefatsa hore ditjhelete tsa setjhaba di sebediswa hantle ho thusa setjhaba ka tseo di se hlokang.
Dipuo tsa ditekanyetso di boetse ke monyetla wa hore Matona hlalose haholwanyane ka mosebetsi wa mmuso, ho kenyeletsa dikatleho le diphephetso tseo tobanang le tsona.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela yezeMigodi.

src_text: Lewa la Qalo ya Tshebediso ya Kgase ya Mafura (LPG).
tgt_text: INgqungquthela yokuTyala iMali kwezeMigodi e-Afrika yowama-2022 ibibanjelwe kwiZiko laseKapa leNgqungquthela zeHlabathi ukususela ngomhla wesi-9 ukuya kowe-12 kuCanzibe 2022, yenye yeendibano ezinkulu yokudibana nokusebenzisana phakathi kwawo onke amahlakani akwicandelo lemigodi.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Lewa la Qalo ya Tshebediso ya LPG, le phatlaladitsweng hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka lona ka Tlhakubele.
tgt_text: Umxholo wale ngqungquthela ubusithi: “Ukutshintsha kweMigodi e-Afrika: Ukutyala imali kwiMithombo eMitsha yaMandla, i-ESG kunye noQoqosho”.

src_text: Sepheo ka lewa ke ho atolosa indasteri ya kgase ya mafura naheng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iqinisekile ukuba le Ngqungquthela yezeMigodi iza kubonisa futhi ithengise noMzantsi Afrika njengelizwe eliphambili elinamathuba otyalo-mali.

src_text: LPG tla ba le seabo se molemo phapanong ya mehlodi ya eneji..     Hara tse ding lewa le tla laola theko makaleng fapaneng tlhahiso le ho tshehetsa tlhahiso ya meqomo ya LPG naheng ena.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uyawamkela amaphulo otyalo-mali eza kweli kwaye uyathembisa ukuba uza kudala iimeko ezifanelekileyo eziza kukhuthaza uhlumo oluza kuxhanyulwa ngumntu wonke kunye neenguqu kuqoqosho lweli lizwe..     Ubudlelwane namazwe ehlabathi nawengingqi.

src_text: Le tla boela le rute setjhaba ka melemo ya ho sebedisa LPG jwaloka mofuta mong wa eneji..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyalwamkela uqhakamshelwano uMongameli Ramaphosa abenalo noMongameli Joe Biden wase-United States, uMongameli Emmanuel Macron wase-France kunye noMongameli Hakainde Hichilema wase-Zambia esebenzisa amaqonga awahlukeneyo.

src_text: Le tla fumaneha kamora hore le phatlalatswe ke Lefapha la Diminerale le Eneji howww.dmr.gov.za.
tgt_text: Olu qhakamshelwano lunike uMongameli ithuba lokuqinisa ubudlelwane nentsebenziswano phakathi koMzantsi Afrika nala mazwe angamahlakani wawo kwimiba engundoqo etya le ngingqi nehlabathi, equka ukusombulula ungquzulwano oluse-Ukraine     Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Moralotshebetso wa Batho ba sa Itekanelang wa Lewa wa Naha Mabapi le Matsholo ho Hlokomedisa ka Ditokelo tsa ba sa Itekanelang.
tgt_text: IiVoti zoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Moralotshebetso wa Batho ba sa Itekanelang wa Lewa wa Naha mabapi le Matsholo ho Hlokomedisa ka Ditokelo tsa ba sa Itekanelang.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ihlaba ikhwelo kubo bonke abemi beli ukuba bamamele iintetho zeVoti zoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali lwamasebe esizwe karhulumente kunye nolwe-Ofisi kaMongameli ukuze bakwazi ukuqinisekisa ukuba urhulumente bambeke phantsi kweliso ngenene..     Ngethuba kuqhutywa ezi ntetho zoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali, onke amasebe aza kunika iinkcukacha ezigcweleyo ngezicwangciso zawo kunye nezinto aza kuzikhokelisa phambili kulo nyaka.

src_text: Moralotshebetso tla tataisa lekala la poraefete le la setjhaba hore netefatse ho sireletswa ha ditokelo tsa basa itekanelang, jwalokaha di sireleditswe le Molaong wa Motheo wa Riphaboliki ya Afrika Borwa wa.
tgt_text: IiNtetho zoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali zenzelwe ukuqinisekisa ukuba imali yombuso isetyenziswa ngobunono kwizinto ezifunwa luluntu.
Zikwanika ithuba nabaPhathiswa ukuba bacacise ngokupheleleyo umsebenzi karhulumente, kuquka izinto ezenziwe ngempumelelo kunye nezo ziseyimingeni.

src_text: Moralotshebetso nehelana kadisebediswa tse tla thusa ho tlosa kgethollo thibelang ho nkuwa ha diqeto, haholoholo tse amanang le batho basa itekanelang boetse lemosa batho ba sa itekanelang hore ba tsebe ditokelo tsa bona jwalokaha di sireleditswe ke Molao wa Motheo.Moralotshebetso boetse fana ka thupelo hlokomedise mehloding ya ditaba le setjhabeng ka ditokelo tsa batho basa itekanelang thusa ho kenngweng tshebetsong ha Tokomane ya Tataiso ya Ditokelo tsa Batho ba sa Itekanelang.Afrika Borwa saenne Tumellano ya Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN) ya Ditokelo tsa Batho basa Itekanelang mmoho le Tokomaneya Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN) yaLekgotla la Tumellano la Ditokelo tsa Botho le Batho Afrika mabapi le Ditokelo tsa Batho ba sa Itekanelang leng Tokomane ya Tumellano ya Ditokelo tsa basa Itekanelang Afrika).
tgt_text: IsiCwangciso-qhinga sokuZisa iRhasi Elulwelo (i-LPG).

src_text: Ho bontshanwe le bohle ba amehang, ho kenyeletsa Ntshetsopele ya Moruo ya Naha le Lekgotlala Basebetsi..     Seboka sa Lefatshe Metseng ya Mahae sa Tsamaiso ya Lefatshe le Tokelo ya Lefatshe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba siqalise ukusebenza isiCwangciso-qhinga sokuZisa i-LPG, esasipapashwe ngenyanga yoKwindla yowama-2022 ukuba uluntu luhlomle kuso.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarwa ha Seboka saMetse ya Mahae sa Tsamaiso ya Lefatshe le Tokelo ya Lefatshe ka Labohlano la la 27 le ka Moqebelo wa la 28 Motsheanong 2022, Gauteng..     Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Tlaleho ya Maikutlo ka Seboka saMetseng ya Mahae sa Tsamaiso ya Lefatshe le Tokelo ya Lefatshe ka Tlhakubele.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-qhinga sineenjongo zokwandisa icandelo le-LPG kweli lizwe.

src_text: Kabinete laetse hore ho be le dipontshano tse ding lebohle ba amehang..     Seboka ke sehlohlolo sa mosebetsi entsweng ngwahola ileng wa nonya maikutlo ba fapaneng ba amehang     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.
tgt_text: I-LPG iza kunceda kakhulu kwiphulo lokuqinisekisa ukuba sineentlobo ezahlukeneyo zamandla..     Esi sicwangciso-qhinga siza kubeka imithetho eza kulawula ukubekwa kwamaxabiso kumashishini akweli candelo size sixhase nokuveliswa kwamagadlela e-LPG kweli lizwe, phakathi kwezinye izinto.

src_text: Seboka sa Bohlano sa Lefatshe sa Phediso ya Mosebetsi wa Bana.
tgt_text: Siza kufundisa noluntu malunga nezinto eziluncedo ngokusebenzisa i-LPG njengolunye uhlobo lwamandla.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla tshwara Seboka sa Bohlano sa Lefatshe sa Phediso ya Mosebetsi wa Bana, Durban International Convention Centre, KwaZulu-Natal ho tloha ka Sontaha sa la 15 ho ya ho Labohlano la la 20 Motsheanong.
tgt_text: Siza kufumaneka emva kokuba sipapashiwe liSebe leMithombo yeziMbiwa naMandla ku: www.dmr.gov.za.

src_text: Ke lekgetlo la pele Mokgatlo wa Lefatshe wa Basebetsi (ILO) tshwarela seboka sena Afrika..     Baetapele ba Dinaha, matona 120, baemedi ba dikarolo tse tharo tsa dinaha tse 187 tseo leng ditho tsa ILO, makgotla Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba, ditheo tsa thuto phahameng, mekgatlo ya baahi, mekgatlo eo eseng ya mmuso le mehlodi ya ditaba ba lebelletswe ho ba sebokeng sena..     Seboka se tla boela se nehe Afrika Borwa monyetla wa ho beha ka pele Molao wa Motheo wa naha jwalokaha sireletsa ditokelo tsa bana.
tgt_text: IsiCwangciso-qhinga seSizwe esiQiqisisiweyo samaPhulo okuFundisa ngamaLungelo okuKhubazeka Abantu abaKhubazekileyo.

src_text: Naha tla bontshana le dinaha tse ding tse itlhommeng pele phedisong ya mosebetsi wa bana mme ithute ho tsona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isamkele isiCwangciso-qhinga seSizwe esiQiqisisiweyo samaPhulo okuFundisa ngamaLungelo okuKhubazeka Abantu abaKhubazekileyo.

src_text: Imbizo ya Presidente ya Mokgwa wa Ntshetsopele ya Ditereke (DDM).
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-qhinga sineenjongo zokusebenza njengesikhokelo sokunceda icandelo labucala kunye norhulumente ukuba aqinisekise ukuba akhuselekile amalungelo abantu abakhubazekileyo, njengoko noMgaqo-siseko weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika wowe-1996 usitsho.

src_text: Presidente Ramaphosa tla ba le Imbizo ya Mokgwa wa Ntshetsopele ya Ditereke Mpumalanga ka Labohlano la la 20 Motsheanong 2022 tlasa mookotaba: “Ha re siye motho morao”.
tgt_text: Esi scwangciso-qhinga sisixhobo esiza kunceda xa kuguzulwa imiqobo ecalulayo xa kuthathwa izigqibo, ingakumbi ngokumayelana nabantu abakhubazekileyo.

src_text: Jwaloka mokgwa wa bohlokwa wa ho ba le seabo ha setjhaba, Imbizo fa Presidente monyetla wa ho buisana le ba amehang ba fapaneng ka ho otloloha – haholoholo batho ba metseng ya mahae – le ho mamela mathata bona ka sepheo sa ho buisana le bona ka ona..     Sepheo ka Imbizo ya Presidente ya Mokgwa wa Ntshetsopele ya Ditereke ke ho lwantsha tse sitisang phumantsho momahaneng ya ditshebeletso le ho kgothaletsa seabo sa baahi ho ikamahantswe le Mokgwa wa Ntshetsopele ya Ditereke..     Maafrika Borwa ka latela le ho ba leseabo dipuisanong kaho kena diwebsaeteng tsa ho etsa setswalle tlasa #PresidentialImbizo.
tgt_text: Senzelwe kwanokufundisa abantu abakhubazekileyo ngamalungelo wabo akuMgaqo-siseko.

src_text: Kgwedi ya Afrika.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-qhinga sikwanceda nangoqeqesho, indlela amajelo eendaba anika iingxelo ngazo kunye nokufundisa uluntu ngamalungelo abantu abakhubazekileyo.

src_text: Ho ketekwa ha selemo le selemo ha Kgwedi ya Afrika le Letsatsi la Afrika ka Laboraro lala 25 Motsheanong ho tla ba le mookotaba oo leng: “Selemo sa Phepo Nepahetseng: Matlafatso ya Phepo Nepahetseng le ya dijo tse lekaneng bohle kontinenteng ya Afrika”..     Jwaloka karolo ya ponelopele ya nako telele ho Agenda 2063 (eo leng leano la ntshetsopele la Afrika la ho fihlella ntshetsopele ya tsa bophelo kenyeletsang bohle le ya moshwelella ya dilemo tse fetang tse mashome mahlano), mookotaba ona tsepame bokgoning ba batho ba Afrika mme ho tsepamisitswe maikutlo haholo basading, batjheng le baneng.
tgt_text: Sikwazalisekisa izithembiso ezikwiPhepha eliCacisa uMgaqo-nkqubo wamaLungelo Abantu abaKhubazekileyo.

src_text: Sena se bohlokwa haholo bakeng sa ntshetsopele hobane se lebisa maphelong ntlafetseng bakeng sa motho ka mong, se lebise le meputsong hodimo le kunong hodimo bakeng sa dinaha..     Ntlha ka sehloohong meketeng ya Kgwedi ya Afrika ke Beke ya Dikgokahano ya Afrika tla ketekwa Constitutional Hill, Johannesburg ho tloha ka la 23 ho ya ho la 27 Motsheanong.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika lelinye lamazwe atyikitya isiVumelwano seZizwe eziManyeneyo (i-UN) samaLungelo Abantu Abakhubazekileyo kunye nesiVumelwano se-UN soXwebhu lwase-Afrika lwamaLungelo oLuntu nawaBantu abaKhubazekileyo (isiVumelwano samaLungelo Abantu abaKhubazekileyo e-Afrika).
Onke amahlakani afanelekileyo ebelinikiwe ithuba lokuhlomla kwesi sicwangciso-qhinga, kuquka neBhunga leSizwe loPhuhliso lezoQoqosho nezaBasebenzi (i-Nedlac).

src_text: Kgwedi ya Afrika ke monyetla wa ho phahamisa kopano ya Afrika le momahano tebileng ya lebatowa, le ho inehela botjha ha Afrika bokamosong bo le bong.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela yoLawulo loMhlaba namaLungelo oMhlaba kwiiNdawo zoLuntu.

src_text: Kabinete hopotsa bohle hore ditabatabelo tsa rona tsa naha di amana haholo le botsitso, kopano le tswelopele ya Afrika     Melaetsa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba kubanjwe iNgqungquthela yoLawulo loMhlaba kunye namaLungelo oMhlaba kwiiNdawo zoLuntu ngoLwesihlanu, umhla wama-27 nangoMgqibelo, umhla wama-28 kuCanzibe 2022 e-Gauteng.

src_text: MatshedisoKabinete lebisitse matshediso malapeng le metswalleng ya bana: •    MmePhindile Xaba(53),ya sebeditseng nako telele le ka bokgabane indastering ya ditaba, Afrika Borwa le mose sebeleditse ntlafalo ya naha ena ka boitelo.•    LenqosaSilumkoSokupa(74),ya sebeleditseng Lekgotla la Tshireletseho ya Mmuso maemong fapaneng, nako telele sebetsa ka bokgabane Tshebeletsong ya Mmuso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ilamkele iPhepha elinoLuvo ngoLawulo loMhlaba kunye namaLungelo oMhlaba kwiiNdawo zoLuntu ngeyoKwindla.

src_text: •    Profesa Francis Wilson(83), setsebi sa moruo se ipabotseng, le mothehi wa Lekala la Diphuputso la tsa Basebetsi le Ntshetsopele Lebatoweng le Borwa ba Afrika     KhiroHo tlameha hore ho netefatswe mangolo thuto ba hirwang mme ho netefatswe le hore ba ha ba eso ka ba tlola molao..     Ngaka Kesavan Naidoo jwaloka Motlatsa-Molaodi-Kakaretso (DDG): Ntshetsopele ya Makgabane Ditheong, Lefapheng la Puso ya Kopanelo (DCoG).
tgt_text: Iye yalela ukuba kufuneka usasazwe kumahlakani afanelekileyo ukuba nawo alihle amahlongwane.

src_text: Monghadi Siphosihle Emmanuel Hlomukajwaloka DDG: Botsamaisi ba Tshehetso le Dithuso Mebusong ya Lehae,DCoG..     Monghadi Risimati Patrick Mathyejwaloka DDG: Botsamaisi ba Ditshebeletso tsa Metsi le Bohlweki (DWS)..     MonghadiCollin Xolani Zwane jwaloka DDG: Taolo, Tumellano le Phethahatso,DWS.
tgt_text: Le ngqungquthela iza kwenzeka ngenxa yomsebenzi owenziwa kulo nyaka uphelileyo, obuquka ukufuna izimvo zamahlakani awahlukeneyo     Imisitho Ezayo.

src_text: MonghadiMelanchton Makobe jwaloka DDG:Ditshebeletso tsa Molao le Peholeihlo ya Tshebetso Pusong, Dikgwebong tsa Mmuso,Lefapheng la Dikgwebo tsa Mmuso     Kabinete dumellane le Matona ka ho hirwa ha ba latelang:.
tgt_text: INkomfa yesiHlanu yokuLwa ukuSetyenziswa kwaBantwana.

src_text: MonghadiBhekuyise Mathews Khenisajwaloka Mohlanka Moholo wa Phethahatso(CEO)Lekgotleng la Ntshetsopele ya Phumantsho ya Bodulo (HDA).
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uza kusingatha iNkomfa yesiHlanu yokuLwa ukuSetyenziswa kwaBantwana e-Durban International Convention Centre kwiphondo laKwaZulu-Natala ngeCawe, umhla we-15 ukuya ngoLwesihlanu, umhla wama-20 kuCanzibe.

src_text: Mme Joy KelediMasemolajwaloka Mohlanka Moholo wa Ditjhelete, HDA.
tgt_text: Kokokuqala uMbutho wezaBasebenzi weHlabathi (i-ILO) ubamba le nkomfa e-Afrika..     INtloko zamazwe, abaphathiswa abali-120, amahlakani angunxantathu amazwe ali-187 angamalungu e-ILO, ii-arhente ze-UN, amaziko emfundo ephakamileyo, imibutho yoluntu, imibutho engekho phantsi korhulumente, amajelo eendaba kunye noluntu kulindeleke ukuba azimase le nkomfa..

src_text: Ngaka Cornelius Ruiters jwalokaCEO ya Lepelle Northern Water.
tgt_text: Lo msitho uza kunika uMzantsi Afrika ithuba lokuba uqhayise ngoMgaqo-siseko wawo okhusela amalungelo abantwana.

src_text: Boiphumano le Maiteko Kahobotjha Kamora Dikgohola.
tgt_text: Amalinge okuhlangula nokwakha ngokutsha emva kwezikhukhula.

src_text: Kabinete rorisitse le ho ananela mosebetsi wa batho le mekgatlo yohle kentseng letsoho maitekong hore batho ba iphumane, le kahongbotjha kamora dikgohola tse mpe dikarolong tse ding tsa naha, haholoholo KwaZulu-Natal lebohile mekgatlo yohle eo eseng ya mmuso, ya ditumelo, baahi, beng ba dikgwebo le mekgatlo thusang faneng ka dijo, diaparo, dikobo, dipakana tse sebediswang ke bomme ha ba le matsatsing  le diaparo tsa sekolo malapeng tlokotsing sa kgoneng ho iphumanela tsa motheo tseo di hlokang..     Setsi Sa Taolo ya Dikoduwa se ntse se tswela pele le ho kopanya makala ohle mmuso maitekong sona ho fana ka thuso ya diphallelo malapeng ohle amehileng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibulela futhi ibamba ngazibini kubo bonke abantu kunye nemibutho ethatha inxaxheba kumalinge ohlangulo nokwakha ngokutsha emva kwezikhukhula zakutsha nje ezenze umonakalo omkhulu kwiindawo ezithile zezwe lakuthi, ingakumbi kwiphondo laKwaZulu-Natal.

src_text: Batho ba fetang 7 000 ka palo ba fuwa botshabelo diterekeng tse nne tse amehileng haholo KwaZulu-Natal qadile mosebetsi wa ho fumantsha malapa amehileng bodulo ba nakwana ditsheng tseo leng tsa mmuso tse hlwauweng KwaZulu-Natal tse ka sebedisetswang ho ahela batho.
tgt_text: Iye futhi yabulela nayo yonke imibutho engekho phantsi kukarhulumente (ii-NGO), imibutho yezenkolo, uluntu, oosomashishini kunye nemibutho yoncedo ethe yabonelela iintsapho ebezingamaxhoba ezikhukhula ngokutya, iimpahla, iingubo kunye nezinye izinto eziluncedo ukuze ezi ntsapho zikwazi ukuqhawulisa izinto ezincinci zemihla ngemihla..     Iziko leSizwe loLawulo lweeNtlekele liyaqhubeleka nokukhokela amaphulo adibanisa onke amaqoqo karhulumente okunikezela ngoncedo lwezentlalonte kuwo onke amakhaya achaphazelekileyo.

src_text: Kabinete tiisitse boinehelo ba mmuso ba ho laola matlole dithuso tsa kamora dikgohola ka hloko le ka ho se pate letho.
tgt_text: Abantu abangaphezulu kwama-7 000 abaphuma kwizithili ezine ezithwaxwe ngamandla zaKwaZulu-Natal babonelelwe ngeendawo zokufihla iintloko.

src_text: Mohlahlobi Moholo wa Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete Afrika Borwa fana ka tshebeletso ya tlatsetso ya peholeihlo mme tlhophisobotjha ya ditjhelete ikamahanya le mokgwatshebetso wa mmuso wa ditekanyetso tsa ditjhelete..     Tsa Morao tsa Lefu la Coronavirus (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Sele uqalile umsebenzi wokwakhela amakhaya achaphazelekileyo izindlu zethutyana kumhlaba wombuso ofunyenwe kwiphondo laKwaZulu-Natal.

src_text: Kabinete ipileditse ho batho bohle ba Afrika Borwa ho nka mehato ya ho itshireletsa ho thibela ho ata ha COVID-19 kamora hore dipalopalo tsa morao tjena di bontshe hore palo ya batho ba tshwaetsehang le ba kulang a eketseha jwalokaha mariha se kene..     Kabinete hopoditse bohle ho tswela pele ka ho itshireletsa le batho ba bang ka ho hlapa matsoho kgafetsa, ho rwala dimonkwana ha motho le kahara moaho, ho se atamelane le ba bang, ho bula difenstere moya kene, le ho enta..     Ente ntse le tshireletso matla kgahlano le COVID-19 hobane thibela ho kula haholo, ho robatswa sepetlele le ho hlokahala.
tgt_text: La makhaya asenokufuduselwa kwezi ndawo.

src_text: Ha hloke hore be le aterese ya moo dulang teng hore ente.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yakubethelela ukuzinikela kukarhulumente ekulawuleni ngobunono nangendlela eselubala imali yokunceda kwizikhukhula.

src_text: Mang kapa mang ya nang le bukana ya boitsebiso le ya se nang yona ka enta mahala dibakeng tsohle tsa setjhaba tsa ho enta naheng ka bophara..     Kgethollo ya Mmala ha Fele!.
tgt_text: UMphicothi-zincwadi-Jikelele woMzantsi Afrika lelinye lamaqumrhu aza kubeka iliso kwindlela eza kusetyenziswa ngayo le mali kwaye le mali ixulwe ngokwemigaqo karhulumente yokuhlahla nokwaba imali.

src_text: Kabinete nyatsitse diketso tsa kgethollo ya mmala ka matla naheng ena, ho kenyeletsa diketsahalo tse tlalehilweng tsa Sekolo se Phahameng sa Good Hope Seminary le Yunivesithi ya Stellenbosch, Kapa Bophirima.
tgt_text: Eza kutsha nje ngesiFo seNtsholongwane i-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Diketso tsena tse mpe di kgahlano le makgabane Molaotheo ao naha ya rona thehuweng hodima ona kenyeletsang seriti sa botho, ho se kgethollane ka mmala, ho se kgethollane ka bong, toka setjhabeng, ho se be leeme, le hlomphano.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibongoza bonke abantu eMzantsi Afrika ukuba bazikhusele ukuze bathintele ukunwenwa kwe-COVID-19 emva kokuba iingxelo zakutsha nje zibonakalisa ukuba kweli lizwe lenyuke kakhulu inani labantu abosulelwe yile ntsholongwane kunye nabo banezifo ezinxulumene nexesha lasebusika..     IKhabhinethi isikhumbuzile ukuba masiqhubeleke sizikhusele thina buqu kunye nabanye abantu ngokuthi sihlambe izandla ngesepha okanye ngesibulala-ntsholongwane rhoqo, sinxibe izifonyo xa singaphakathi kwizakhiwo, singasondelelani nabanye abantu, sivule iifestile ukuze kubethe umoya endlini size sigonye..     Ukugonya isesesona sixhobo sinaso sokulwa i-COVID-19 njengoko kuthintela ukugula kakhulu, ukulaliswa esibhedlela kunye nokubulawa yile ntsholongwane.

src_text: Molaotheo wa Riphaboliki ya Afika Borwa wa 1996 ke ona re tataisang hore re fedise dikarohano tse mpe le diketso tsa kgale tsa tlhokeho ya toka.
tgt_text: Akunyanzelekanga ukuba ube nendawo ohlala kuyo enedilesi esesikweni ukuze ugonye.

src_text: Ho ipiletswa ho batswadi ho ruta bana ba bona ho se ikamahanye le diketso tsa kgethollo ya mmala le ho atlarela diphapano jwaloka karolo ya letsholo la rona le tsitlalletseng ho kgothaletsa kaho ya setjhaba le momahano ya setjhaba re sebetseng mmoho ho pepesa diketso tsa kgethollo ya mmala hohle moo di bonahalang di amoheleha mme re romele molaetsa hlakileng reng ha di amoheleha naheng ya rona ya demokrasi..     Dikamano tsa Afrika Borwa le Germany.
tgt_text: Nabani na, futhi nokuba akanayo incwadi-sazisi, angagonywa simahla kumaziko okugonya karhulumente akho kulo lonke eli lizwe..     Phantsi ngobuhlanga!.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse leeto la semmuso le bileng le katleho la Tjhanselara ya Riphaboliki ya Federale ya Germany, Monghadi Olaf Scholz, Afrika Borwa ka Labobedi la la 24 Motsheanong.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izigxibhe kabukhala izenzo zobuhlanga kweli lizwe, eziquka iziganeko ezisematheni sithetha nje, e-Good Hope Seminary High School nakwiDyunivesiti yase-Stellenbosch eNtshona Koloni.

Lo mkhuba mbi unxamnye nemimiselo yomgaqo-siseko eli lizwe lethu lilawulwa ngentando yesininzi elasekelwa phezu kwayo, equka isidima somntu, ukungacaluli ngobuhlanga, ukungacaluli ngesini, ubulungisa entlalweni, ulingwano kunye nentlonipho..     UMgaqo-siseko weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika wowe-1996 nguwo osisikhokelo esisisebenzisayo ukusiphula neengcambu iyantlukwano engakhiyo kunye nezenzo ezingenabulungisa zangaphambili.

src_text: Tjhanselara Scholz etetse kwano semmuso menngwe ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa, eo leng moetapele wa letsholo la mmuso la ho kgothaletsa dikamano tse ntle tsa lebatowa le matjhaba, mmoho le ho hohela matsete hlokwang ka matla..     Hara tse ding baetapele bana ba babedi ba buisane ka ditsela tsa ho ntlafatsa tshebedisano ho tsa eneji le diphetoho maemong lehodimo, kgwebisano le matsete, le mekgwa ya ho lwantsha COVID-19 le tlhokeho matla ya ente.
tgt_text: Abazali bayacelwa ukuba bafundise abantwana babo ukuba babukhabe ubuhlanga, bamkele iintlanga ezahlukeneyo zeli, njengenxalenye yephulo lokwakha isizwe nokukhuthaza ukuhlalisana ngoxolo.

src_text: Ba boetse ba buisana ka diketsahalo tsa kontinenteng ya Afrika le matjhabeng, ho kenyeletsa ntwa ya Ukraine le kamoo amang moruo wa lefatshe le phumaneho ya dijo le eneji.
tgt_text: Masisebenzisane sibhentsise imikhuba yobuhlanga naphina apho buthathwa njengento eqhelekileyo ngolo hlobo sitsho phandle ukuba ubuhlanga abamkelekanga kwaphela kweli lizwe lethu lilawulwa ngentando yesininzi.

src_text: Germany ke molekane wa bobedi moholo kgwebisanong le Afrika Borwa, mme boetse ke naha ya boraro eo leng mohlodi wa bahahlaudi ba mose tsetela haholo naheng ena mme ke molekane ho tsa ntshetsopele..     Seboka sa Lefatshe sa Bohlano sa Phediso ya Mosebetsi wa Bana.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwano phakathi koMzantsi Afrika ne-Germany.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse ho phethelwa ka katleho ha Seboka sa Lefatshe sa Bohlano sa Phediso ya Mosebetsi wa Bana se neng se tshwaretswe Durban ho tloha ka la 15 ho ya ho la 20 Motsheanong.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyalwamkela uTyelelo lwasebuRhulumenteni olube yimpumelelo lweNgqonyela ye-Federal Republic of Germany, oHloniphekileyo u-Olaf Scholz, eMzantsi Afrika ngomhla wama-24 kuCanzibe..     Olu Tyelelo lwasebuRhulumenteni lweNgqonyela u-Scholz lwenziwe emva kokuba uMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa wathi wamema le Ngqonyela, futhi noqhuba iphulo lokuqinisa amatyathanga obudlelwano amazwe engingqi nawehlabathi nawokutsala utyalo-mali olufunwa ngabomvu kweli.

src_text: Ba amehang ba tswang lefatsheng ka bophara ba ne ba le sebokeng sena se neng se tshwerwe ka tshebedisano le Mokgatlo wa Lefatshe wa Basebetsi..     Kamora ho buisana ka mesebetsi metle kentsweng tshebetsong ke dinaha tse fapaneng le ho hlwaya tse salletseng morao le mehato potlakileng hlokehang bakeng sa ho potlakisa phediso ya ya ho etsa bana makgoba le ho qobellwa ha bana ho sebetsa, ho thehilwe ‘Durban Call to Action’ ho sebetsana le bothata ba ho etsa bana makgoba..     Ho etsa bana makgoba ke ntho mpe etswang ke setjhaba mme beha bana pontsheng ya maemo kotsi.
tgt_text: Ezi nkokeli zimbini zigwadle iindlela zokuqinisa ubudlelwane kumacandelo afana nelezamandla kunye noguqu-guquko lwemozulu, urhwebo notyalo-mali kunye namacebo okulwa i-COVID-19 kunye nokwanda kwabantu abadinga ichiza lokugonya, phakathi kwezinye izinto.

src_text: Ke tlhekefetso mme thibela bana ho fumana thuto le menyetla meng ka ba ntshetsang pele.
tgt_text: Iingxoxo zabo ziquke nezinye izinto ezingundaba-mlonyeni kweli lizwekazi le-Afrika nakwihlabathi liphela, kuquka ungquzulwano olwenzeka e-Ukraine kwakunye nomonakalo oluwenzayo kuqoqosho lwehlabathi kunye nokutya namandla..     I-Germany ayilolizwe likwindawo yesibini ngobukhulu njengehlakani lezorhwebelwano nje kuphela koko likwakwindawo yesithathu ngokwamanani abakhenkethi abangena kweli, likwalilizwe eliphambili kwezotyalo-mali nehlakani eliluncedo kwezophuhliso.

src_text: Ngwana mong le mong wa Afrika Borwa na le tokelo ke keng ya phehiswa ya ho sireletswa diketsong tse sotlang mosebetsing.
tgt_text: INkomfa yeHlabathi yesiHlanu yokuLwa ukuSetyenziswa kwaBantwana.
IKhabhinethi iyakwamkela ukuqukunjelwa ngempumelelo kweNkomfa yeHlabathi yesiHlanu yokuLwa ukuSetyenziswa kwaBantwana ebibanjelwe eThekwini ukususela ngomhla we-15 ukuya kowama-20 kuCanzibe.

src_text: Tokelo ya thuto ya motheo kentswe Molaong wa rona wa Motheo mme ho ya ka Molao wa Dikolo wa Afrika Borwa wa 1996 (Molao 84 wa 1996), “motswadi mong le mong tlameha ho netefatsa hore morutwana mong le mong eo mo hodisang kena sekolo ho tloha letsatsing la pele la sekolo selemong seo ngwana qetang dilemo tse supa ho sona ho fihlela letsatsi la ho qetela la sekolo selemong seo ngwana qetang dilemo tse 15 kapa bang ho kereiti ya borobong ho sona, ho tla ya ka hore ke efe etsahalang pele.” .
tgt_text: Amahlakani aphuma bombo zone zehlabathi azimase le nkomfa, ibibanjwe ngentsebenziswano noMbutho weHlabathi wezaBasebenzi (i-ILO).

src_text: Ho ya ka Molao wa Bana wa 2005 (Molao 38 wa 2005), “ha ho motho ya ka sebedisang reka fana ka ngwana hore sebetse kapa hire ngwana”     Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Emva kokuba kuxoxwe iindlela ezifanelekileyo ezisetyenziswa ngamazwe ahlukeneyo kunye nokubona iindawo ezinezikroba ezifuna kuthathwe amanyathelo akhawulezileyo afunekayo ukuze ipheliswe ngokukhawuleza le ngxaki yokusetyenziswa kwabantwana kunye nokusetyenziswa kwabantu ngenkani, kuye kwamkelwa umgaqo othi ‘Durban Call to Action’ okulwa le ngxaki yokusetyenziswa kwabantwana..     Ukusetyenziswa kwabantwana ngumkhuba ombi kakhulu kwaye kubabeka emngciphekweni abantwana.

src_text: Kananelo ya ho ba karolo ya Tumellano ya Matjhaba ya Tshireletso ya Batho Bohle ba Nyametswang ke Mapolesa (ICPPED).
tgt_text: Ukwenza oku kukuxhaphaza abantwana kwaye kubenza bangakwazi ukuya esikolweni futhi baxhamle namanye amathuba okuziphuhlisa.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana tokomane ya tlhahiso ya ICPPED palamenteng bakeng sa tekolo ha Afrika Borwa lohotha ho ba karolo ya tumellano ena.
tgt_text: Wonke umntwana eMzantsi Afrika unelungelo elingenakuthathwa mntu lokuba akhuselwe ekubeni lixhoba lokuxhatshazwa ngokusetyenziswa..     Ilungelo lokufumana imfundo esisiseko likuMgaqo-siseko kwaye ngokoMthetho weziKolo zoMzantsi Afrika, wowe-1996 (uMthetho uNombl 84 wowe-1996), “wonke umzali makavumele wonke umfundi ophantsi kwakhe ukuba aye esikolweni ngosuku lokuqala lokuvulwa kwezikolo xa eneminyaka esixhenxe ubudala ade abe neminyaka eli-15 ubudala okanye afikelele kwibanga lesithoba, nokuba yeyiphi efike kuqala kwezi”..     NgokoMthetho waBantwana, wowe-2005 (uMthetho uNombl 38 wowe-2005), “akukho mntu uvumelekileyo ukuba asebenzise, afune uncedo, anike okanye aqeshe umntwana njengomsebenzi”     Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Ke tumellano tlamang dinaha tse saenneng tsa Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN) sebetsanang le tlolo ya ditokelo tsa botho ka mokgwa wa ho nyametswa ha batho ke mapolesa.
tgt_text: Ukuvuma ukutyikitya isiVumelwano seHlabathi sokuKhusela Bonke Abantu Ukuba baNyanyalaliswe ngeNkani (i-ICPPED).
IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba kungeniswe ePalamente i-ICPPED ukuze kuqwalaselwe umba wokuvuma koMzantsi Afria ukutyikitya esi sivumelwano.

src_text: Tumellano hlalosa ho nyametswa ke mapolesa ho qobelletsweng ho kenyeletsa kwetelo, ho tshwarwa ke mapolesa, ho kwallwa kapa mekgwa meng ka bakang hore sesenyi se hane ho dumela kapa se pate hore lehlatsipa le kae..     Ha tumellano se ananetswe kenyeleditswe le melaong ya naha ena, ho tla lebellwa hore Afrika Borwa tlalehele Matjhaba Kopaneng dilemo tse ding le tse ding tse pedi ka kamoo sebedisang tumellano ena kateng.
tgt_text: I-ICPPED sisivumelwano esibophelela amazwe ehlabathi seZizwe eziManyeneyo (i-UN) nesimalunga nokunyhashwa kwamalungelo abantu ngokuba banyanyalaliswe ngenkani.

src_text: Tumellano fana ka mehato eo dinaha tseo leng ditho di ka nkang ho thibela ho nyametswa ha batho.
tgt_text: Esi sivumelwano sikuchaza ukunyanyalaliswa komntu ngenkani, njengokuxhilwa, ukubanjwa, ukuvalelwa okanye nawaphi na amanyathelo anokukhokelela ekubeni umenzi wobubi angavumi ukuba uyalazi apho likhoyo ixhoba okanye ayifihle le ndawo likuyo.

src_text: Tlaleho ya Bone ya Naha ya Afrika Borwa ya Tshireletso le Ntshetsopele ya Ditokelo tsa Botho.
tgt_text: Sakuba esi sivumelwano sivunyiwe ukuba sibe yinxalenye yemithetho yeli, uMzantsi Afrika uza kulindeleka ukuba unike ingxelo kwi-UN rhoqo emva kweminyaka emibini ngendlela oqinisekisa ngayo ukuba esi sivumelwano siyasebenza.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse tlhahiso ya Tlaleho ya Bone ya Naha ya Tshireletso le Ntshetsopele ya Ditokelo tsa Botho Lekgotleng la Matjhaba Kopaneng la Ditokelo tsa Botho.
tgt_text: Esi sivumelwano sicacisa amanyathelo ekufuneka amazwe awutyikityileyo awalandele ukuthintela ukunyanyalaliswa ngenkani kwabantu kumazwe wabo..     INgxelo yeLizwe yesine yokuKhuselwa nokuLwelwa kwamaLungelo oLuntu yoMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Tokomane ena tla lekolwa hamorao selemong ke lekala la Matjhaba Kopaneng le lekolang diketsahalo tse amang ditokelo tsa botho dinaheng tseo leng ditho tsa UN.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba kungeniswe iNgxelo yeLizwe yesine yokuKhuselwa nokuLwelwa kwamaLungelo oLuntu kwiBhunga lamaLungelo oLuntu leZizwe eziManyeneyo (i-UNHRC).

src_text: Afrika Borwa se lekotswe makgetlo mararo esale ba karolo ya Tumellano ya Ditokelo tsa Botho ya Matjhaba Kopaneng, mme tekolo ya ho qetela entswe ka Loetse..     Tlaleho fana ka tsa morao tse mabapi le dikgothaletso tse 187 tse amohetsweng tsa motjha wa tekolo wa.
tgt_text: I-UN Universal Periodic Review iza kuhlaziya le ngxelo ekupheleni kwalo nyaka.

src_text: Ho qotsitswe maikutlo mang dintlheng tse netefaditsweng, tlhahisoleseding tswang mafapheng amehang, ditheo tse tshehetsang demokrasi le mekgatlo ya baahi amehang.
tgt_text: Oko watyikitya isiVumelwano samaLungelo oLuntu se-UN, uMzantsi Afrika sele uphononongwe izihlandlo ezithathu.
Wagqibela ukuphononongwa ngenyanga yoMsintsi ngowama-..

src_text: Kabinete motlotlo ka kgatelopele entsweng ha ho kenngwa tshebetsong dikgothaletso tsena le ka dikarolo tseo ho ntseng ho sebetsanwa le tsona.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo inika iinkcukacha ngomsebenzi osele wenziwe malunga nezindululo ezivunyiweyo ezili-187 zophononongo lowama-.

src_text: Tlaleho tla phatlalatswa ha se teketswe Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba ka Phato.
tgt_text: Iinkcukacha zithatywathwe kulwazi oluqinisekisiwe, amasebe karhulumente afanelekileyo, amaziko axhasa ulawulo lwentando yesininzi kunye nemibutho yoluntu efanelekileyo.

src_text: Leano la Botsamaisi ba Metsi Merafo la.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi yonelisekile ngumsebenzi osele wenziwe mayelana nezi zindululo kwakunye nazezo ndawana zisaphethweyo.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana hore ho kenngwe tshebetsong Leano la Botsamaisi ba Metsi Merafo la.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo iza kupapashwa esidlangalaleni emva kokuba ingeniswe kwi-UN ngenyanga yeThupha kowama-.

src_text: Leano lena le fana ka mekgwa ya ho sireletsa le ho baballa metsi.
tgt_text: UMgaqo-nkqubo wowama-2022 wokuLawulwa kwaManzi eMigodi.

src_text: Le setletsa mesebetsi ya merafong le boikarabello ba merafe ba ho netefatsa tshebediso ya metsi ya ho ya ho ile bakeng sa naha.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iwuvumile uMgaqo-nkqubo wowama-2022 wokuLawulwa kwaManzi eMigodi ukuba uqalise ukusetyenziswa.

src_text: Hara tse ding, leano le hlakisa mesebetsi le boikarabello ba makala mararo mmuso malebana le tse amanang le metsi merafo.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo ucacisa amacebo okukhusela nokonga amanzi.

src_text: Diphetoho tse sisintsweng di tla rarolla mathata ho tlisa dikotlo kgahlano le merafo silafatsang metsi mme di bebofatse   tshebediso ya molao reng ba silafatsang ba lefe.
tgt_text: Uqinisekisa ukuba imisebenzi yemigodi yezoqoqosho iyahambelana nephulo leli lizwe elikhuthaza ukusetyenziswa kwamanzi ngobunono.

src_text: Leano lena le hlahisitswe ho ikamahantswe le Molao wa Naha wa Metsi, 1998 (Molao wa 36 wa 1998).
tgt_text: Phakathi kwezinye izinto, lo mgaqo-nkqubo ucacise indima kunye noxanduva lwala maqoqo mathathu karhulumente ngokumayelana nomba wamanzi emigodini.

src_text: Tlaleho ya Moralotshebetso Nahanelang Bong wa Merero, Ditekanyetso tsa Ditjhelete, Tekolo ya Peholeihlo le Bohlahlobi ba Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete.
tgt_text: Ezi zilungiso zicetywayo ziza kusombulula iingxaki ezinxulumene nezohlwayo ezinikwa abo bangcolisa amanzi futhi ziza kwenza kube lula ukunyanzelisa ukuba kuhanjwe ngalo mgaqo uthi iqumrhu elingcolisileyo malibhatale.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse tlaleho ya kgatelopele ya ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Moralotshebetso Nahanelang Bong wa Merero, Ditekanyetso tsa Ditjhelete, Tekolo ya Pehololeihlo le Bohlahlobi ba Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uyahambelana noMthetho waManzi eSizwe, wowe-1998 (uMthetho uNombl 36 wowe-1998).

src_text: Kabinete amohetse kgatelopele matla entsweng ke mafapha fapaneng mmuso kentseng tshebetsong moralotshebetso ananetsweng ka..     Mafapha mang se behile pele maano tla tataisa mananeo matjha tla shebana le ditlhoko tsa basadi, batjha le batho ba sa itekanelang.
tgt_text: INgxelo ngesiCwangciso-sikhokelo soCwangciso, uHlahlo-mali, uHlolo, uVavanyo kunye noPhicotho oluSekelwe kwiSini.

src_text: Kabinete kopile hore ho be le mekgwa matla ya peholeihlo le tlaleho, haholoholo mafapheng so kenye ditlaleho tsa ona..     Puisano ya Batjha ya ho Tlotla Nelson Mandela (NMYD).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ifumene ingxelo malunga nomsebenzi osele wenziwe malunga nokuqaliswa kwesiCwangciso-sikhokelo soCwangciso, uHlahlo-mali, uHlolo, uVavanyo kunye noPhicotho oluSekelwe kwiSini.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana hore ho be le NMYD selemo le selemo ho tloha ka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyawuncoma umsebenzi osele wenziwe ngamasebe karhulumente awahlukeneyo okusebenzisa esi sicwangciso-sikhokelo samkelwa ngowama-2019 ukuba siqaliswe ukusetyenziswa, njengenxalenye yezikhokelo zawo.

src_text: NMYD ya pele tla ba ka la 07 ho ya ho la 20 Phupu.
tgt_text: Amasebe amaninzi sele eqalise imigaqo-nkqubo eza kuba neenkqubo ezingundoqo eziza kugxila kumanina, ulutsha kunye nabantu abakhubazekileyo.

src_text: Bona ke boiteko ba Bopresidente ba ho neha batjha ba kontinente ena lepatlelo la ho tshwara ditherisano tse ahang ka ditaba tse ba amang..     Dipuisano tsena tse tla bua ka Mopresidente wa mehleng ya hlomphuwang haholo matjhabeng Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela, di tla thakgola meqoqo amanang le ho otlella tlwaelo ya boetapele bo kgabane Afrika..     Dipuisanong tsena batjha ba tla nehwa monyetla wa ho abelana ka botjhaba ba bona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi imemelele ukuba kubekwe iinkqubo ezingqingqwa zokuhlola nokunika iingxelo, ingakumbi kwamanye amasebe la angekaniki zingxelo..     INgxoxo zoLutsha zika-Nelson Mandela (i-NMYD).

src_text: Boiteko bona bo tla boela bo matlafatse dikamano tsa batho ka ho otloloha hara batjha ba kontinente.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyivumile i-NMYD eza kubanjwa rhoqo ngonyaka.

src_text: Lefapha la Basadi, Batjha le Batho ba sa Itekanelang le tla fana ka dintlha tsa lenaneo la diketsahalo hamorao..     Tlaleho ya Selemo le Selemo ya Peholeihlo ya Tshebetso ya Ntlafatso ya Basadi le Tekano ya Bong, Ntshetsopele ya Batjha le Ntshetsopele ya Ditokelo tsa Batho ba sa Itekanelang ya 2021/.
tgt_text: I-NMYD yokuqala iza kubanjwa ngomhla wesi-7 ukuya kowama-20 kweyeKhala.

src_text: Kabinete fumane tlaheho ya selemo le selemo ya peholeihlo ya tshebetso ya 2021/22 malebana le ntlafatso ya basadi, batjha le batho ba sa itekanelang.
tgt_text: Eli liphulo likaMongameli lokunika ulutsha lweli Lizwekazi ithuba lokubamba iingxoxo ezakhayo ngemiba echaphazela lona..     Ezi ngxoxo – eziza kusekelwa kwimbalasane yeli ehlonitshwa kwihlabathi jikelele uMongameli wangaphambili uNelson Rolihlahla Mandela – ziza kuqala iingxoxo-mpikiswano eziza kukhuthaza ukubaluleka kweenkokeli ezinyanesekileyo e-Afrika..     Ziza kunika abantu abatsha ithuba lokuba bafundisane ngeenkcubeko zabo ezahlukeneyo nezityebileyo.

src_text: Tlaleho latella ditshupo tsa bohlokwa ntshetsopeleng ya tekatekano, boemo ba khiro le thuo le seabo sa dihlopha tsena tsa batho diketsahalong tsa mafapha le ditheo tsa mmuso..     Tlaleho bokeleditswe ho ikamahantswe le moralo, tekanyetso ya ditjhelete, peholeihlo, tekolo le moralotshebetso wa Hlahlobo ya Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete tsepameng ho bong ananetsweng ke Kabinete ka     Dibili.
tgt_text: Eli linge liza kukhuthaza nobudlelwano obushushu phakathi kwabantu abatsha beli lizwekazi.

src_text: Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Bophelo bo Botle le Polokeho Merafong.
tgt_text: ISebe lamaNina, uLutsha naBantu abaKhubazekileyo liza kunika iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe ngenkqubo yalo msitho apha ekuhambeni kwexesha..     INgxelo yoNyaka wama-2021/22 yokuHlola uMsebenzi wokuXhotyiswa kwamaNina noLingwano ngokweSini, uPhuhliso loLutsha nokuLwelwa kwamaLungelo Abantu abaKhubazekileyo.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Bophelo bo Botle le Polokeho bakeng sa hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka yona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ifumene ingxelo yonyaka wama-2021/22 yokuhlola umsebenzi wokuxhotyiswa kwamanina nolingwano ngokwesini, uphuhliso lolutsha nokulwelwa kwamalungelo abantu abakhubazekileyo.

src_text: Sepheo ka Bili ena ke ho ntlafatsa bophelo bo botle le polokeho tsa basebetsi ba merafong, ho kenyeletsa tikoloho eo tshebetso ya merafong etsahalang ho yona.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo inyathela imiba ephambili emalunga nokukhuthazwa kolingwano, umgangatho wengqesho kunye nobunini kunye nokuthatha inxaxheba kwaba bakhankanyiweyo kwimisebenzi yamasebe kunye namaqumrhu karhulumente..

src_text: Bili fetola Molao wa jwale wa Bophelo bo Botle le Polokeho Merafong wa 1996 (Molao wa 29 wa 1996).
tgt_text: Le ngxelo ibhalwe kusetyenziswa isicwangciso-sikhokelo socwangciso, uhlahlo-mali, uhlolo, uvavanyo kunye nophicotho olusekelwe kwisini esamkelwa yiKhabhinethi ngowama-     ImiThetho eYilwayo.

src_text: Hara tse ding ditlhomathiso tse lokisitsweng di hlakisa dikgopolo tse ding tse kahara Molao, di matlafatse moralotshebetso wa bophelo bo botle le polokeho mme di amahanye le mekgwa ya tshebetso tswang pele lefatsheng ha ho tluwa ho tsa polokeho merafong.
tgt_text: UMthetho-sihlomelo oYilwayo weMpilo noKhuseleko eMgodini.

src_text: Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Molaotheo ya Leshome le Metso Robedi ya.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba uMthetho-sihlomelo oYilwayo weMpilo noKhuseleko eMgodini upapashwe ukuze uluntu luhlomle.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Molaotheo ya Leshome le Metso Robedi ya 2022 hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka yona le hore Letona la Toka le Ditshebeletso tsa Ditjhankana, Monghadi Ronald Lamola ntshe tsebiso nang le dintlha tsa tlhomathiso sisintsweng ya Molaotheo.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo ufuna ukuphucula impilo nokhuseleko lwabasebenzi-mgodini, kuquka nezi ndawo kwembiwa kuzo izimbiwa.

src_text: Bili fetola Karolo ya 6(1) ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa wa 1996 tsebahatsang hore dipuo tsa semmuso tsa Afrika Borwa tse 11 ke Sepedi, Sesotho, Setswana, siSwati, Tshivenḓa, Xitsonga, Afrikaans, English, isiNdebele, isiXhosa le isiZulu..     Ditlhomathiso di tla tlisa hlompho Puong ya Matsoho ya Afrika Borwa (SASL) jwaloka puo ya bo-12 ya semmuso naheng ena mme sena se tla ntshetsa pele puo le ba buang se boele se tiise tekano ya ditokelo tsa Maafrika Borwa ohle, ho sa kgathallehe maemo bona.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo wenza izilungiso kulo Mthetho ukhoyo weMpilo noKhuseleko eMgodini, wowe-1996 (uMthetho uNombl 29 wowe-1996).

src_text: Lefapha la Thuto ya Motheo le se le ananetse Puo ya Matsoho jwalo ka puo ya lapeng     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.
tgt_text: Ezi zilungiso zitsha zinika ingcaciso malunga nesigama esithile salo Mthetho, zenza ngqingqwa imithetho elawula impilo nokhuseleko zize ziwenze uhambelane nemithetho yehlabathi elawula impilo nokhuseleko emigodini, phakathi kwezinye izinto.

src_text: Beke ya Tshireletso ya Bana.
Afrika Borwa tla keteka Beke ya Tshireletso ya Bana ya Naha ho tloha ho la 29 Motsheanong ho ya ho la 4 Phuptjane 2022 tlasa mookotaba reng: “A re Sireletseng Bana nakong ya COVID-19 le Kamora moo.”.
tgt_text: UMthetho oYilwayo wowama-2022 wokuHlonyelwa okweShumi elinesiBhozo koMgaqo-siseko.

src_text: Bekeng ena ho tla tsepamiswa maikutlo ntlheng kgolo naheng ya ho ima ha batjha leng ntho totileng haholo ka nako ya COVID-19 ha batjha ba bangata ba beleha ka..     Kabinete ipileditse ho batswadi, mekgatlo ya baahi, ya ditumelo tse fapaneng le baahi ka kakaretso ho sebedisana le ho thusa ho lwantsha keketseho ya ho ima ha batjha..     Seboka sa Lefatshe sa Moruo (WEF).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa koMthetho oYilwayo wowama-2022 wokuHlonyelwa okweShumi elinesiBhozo koMgaqo-siseko ukuze uluntu luhlomle nokuba uMphathiswa wezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko, uMnu Ronald Lamola, akhuphe isaziso esineenkcukacha ngesi silungiso sifuna ukwenziwa kuMgaqo-siseko.

src_text: Afrika Borwa na le seabo ho WEF tla tshwarelwa Davos-Klosters, Switzerland ho tloha ka la 22 ho ya ho la 26 Motsheanong 2022, tlasa mookotaba reng: “Re Sebetsa Mmoho ho Kgutlisa Tshepo”.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo wenza izilungiso kwiCandelo 6(1) loMgaqo-siseko weRiphabhlikhi yoMzantsi Afrika wowe-1996, elibhengeza ngokusesikweni ukuba iilwimi ezisemthethweni ezili-11 zoMzantsi Afrika zezi: Sepedi, Sesotho, Setswana, Siswati, Tshivenda, Xitsonga, isiBhulu, isiNgesi, isiNdebele, isiXhosa kunye nesiZulu.

src_text: Afrika Borwa thabela monyetla wa ho ba karolo ya tharollo le ho abelana ka boiphihlelo ba rona sebokeng sa lefatshe.
tgt_text: Ezi zilungiso ziza kubeka uLwimi lweZandla loMzantsi Afrika (i-SASL) njengolwimi olusemthethweni lwe-12 kweli lizwe kwaye ziza kucacisa igalelo lwalo njengenxalenye yenkcubeko futhi zibethelele namalungelo alinganayo kubo bonke abemi boMzantsi Afrika, kuquka nabo bakhubazekileyo.

src_text: Boteng ba rona WEF bo bohlokwa haholo ho phahamiseng lebitso la rona sebakeng sa matsete sa lefatshe, ho abelana le lefatshe ponelopele ya rona ya bokamoso le ho totobatsa tse ntjha tse seng di sibollotswe kahara naha..     Kgwedi ya Batjha.
tgt_text: ISebe leMfundo esiSiseko sele layamkela i-SASL njengolwimi lwenkobe     Imisitho Ezayo.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Lenaneo la Kgwedi ya Batjha la 2022 tlasa mookotaba reng: “Ntshetsopele ya mekgwa ya ho iphedisa ya moshwelella ya batjha le matla bona molemong wa bokamoso bo tjhatsi.”.
tgt_text: IVeki yokuKhuselwa kwaBantwana.

src_text: Letsatsi la Batjha le tla ketekwa semmuso Kapa Botjhabela..     Monongwaha ho tla be ho ketekwa selemo sa bo-46 esale baithuti ba itseka ka la 16 Phupjane 1976, Soweto, ba ipelaetsa kgahlano le ho qobellwa ho ithuta dithuto kaofela ka puo ya Afrikaans ke mmuso wa kgethollo..     Ka moya oo wa Phuptjane 1976, Kabinete ipileditse ho batjha ba naha ena ho lwantsha tlhokeho ya mosebetsi ntseng eketseha ya batjha ka ho ba le seabo mananeong ntshetsopele kang thupelo ya mosebetsi lebisang ho fumaneng mangolo, le mananeo thupelo ya mosebetsi bakeng sa ba seng ba na le mangolo..     Mmuso sibollotse mananeo nang le molemong wa ho tshehetsa ho thehwa ha mesebetsi bakeng sa batjha le ho thehwa ha mesebetsi ya nakwana.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uza kuphawula iVeki yeSizwe yokuKhuselwa kwaBantwana ukususela ngomhla wama-29 kuCanzibe ukuya kowesi-4 kweyeSilimela phantsi komxholo othi: ‘Masikhusele Abantwana ngeXesha le-COVID-19 Nasemva Kwawo”.

src_text: Dikgwebo le tsona di kgothaletswa ho hohella batjha mosebetsing ka ho ba thehela menyetla ya mesebetsi..     Lenaneo la batjha bakeng sa kgwedi ya Phuptjane le kenyeletsa diketsahalo tse fapaneng ho tloha ho thakgolweng ha letsholo la dipulamadiboho tsa batjha, ho thakgolweng ha Lenaneo la Moemedi wa Letshwao wa NYDA le diketsahalo tse ding tsa tshebeletso ya naha ya Batjha naheng ka bophara.
tgt_text: Kule veki, kuza kugxininiswa kakhulu kumba oxake isizwe wokukhulelwa kwamantombazana asafikasayo, ingxaki leyo ethe yathatha unyawo ngethuba le-COVID-19 kuba amantombazana asafikasayo amaninzi athi afumana abantwana ngowama-..     IKhabhinethi imemelele ukuba kubanjiswane ngabazali, imibutho yoluntu, imibutho yenkolo kunye noluntu ngokubanzi kuliwe le ngxaki yokukhulelwa kwamantombazana aselula..     INgqungquthela yezoQoqosho yeHlabathi (i-WEF).

src_text: Letona la Basadi, Batjha le Batho ba sa Itekanelang Lefapheng la Bopresidente haufinyane le tla hlakisa lenaneo kaofela.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uza kuthatha inxaxheba kwi-WEF e-Davos-Klosters, e-Switzerland ukususela ngomhla wama-22 ukuya kowama-26 kuCanzibe 2022, phantsi komxholo othi: “Sisebenzisana, Masibuyisele ukuThembana”.

src_text: Ho lebelletswe hore diketsahalo tsohle tsa batjha di ikamahanye le melawana ya bophelo bo botle ya COVID-.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uyakwazi ukubaluleka kweli thuba lokuba yinxalenye yabo bagwadla izisombululo nokwabelana nehlabathi ngeengxaki nawo ojamelene nazo.

src_text: Seboka sa Lefatshe la Metseng ya Mahae.
tgt_text: Ukuthatha inxaxheba kwezwe lakuthi kule ngqungquthela kunceda igama lelizwe lakuthi elihlonitshwe nangakumbi kwihlabathi njengelizwe elinamathuba amaninzi otyalo-mali, futhi kuza kusinika nethuba lokwazisa ihlabathi ngombono wethu ngendlela eliya kuyo eli lizwe kwaye siza kuthetha nangezinto ezintsha ezenzekayo kwizwe lakuthi..     INyanga yoLutsha.

src_text: Mmuso, ka tshebedisano le ntlo ya Naha ya Baetapele ba Setso tla ba le Seboka sa Lefatshe la Metseng ya Mahae ka Labohlano la la 27 le ka Moqebelo wa la 28 Motsheanong 2022 molemong wa ho buisana ka ditaba tse amanang le thuo ya mobu..     Ditaba tsena di kenyeletsa motjha wa ho tloswa ha lefatshe la metseng ya mahae Mmusong le iswa ho beng ba lona ba loketseng leng se bohlokwa bakeng sa matlafatso ya baahi ba metseng ya mahae.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyamkele iNkqubo yeNyanga yoLutsha yowama-2022 phantsi komxholo othi: “Ukukhuthaza indlela yokuziphilisa nokomelela kolutsha okuzinzileyo ukwenzela ikamva elingcono”.

src_text: Ho se be teng ha thuo ya lefatshe ka molao metseng ya mahae ho fokodisa ditokelo tsa beng ba lefatshe le ho fokotsa bokgoni ba bona ba ho le sebedisetsa ho ntlafatsa maphelo bona le maemo bona ditjhelete     Melaetsa.
tgt_text: Umsitho osesikweni woSuku loLutsha oza kubanjelwa eMpuma Koloni.

src_text: MahlohonoloKabinete lebohisitse le ho lebisa ditakalletso tse ntle ho: Mme Leanne Manas, sebohodi sa lenaneo la SABC la Morning Live, ya hlomphilweng ka Kgau Tlotlang Tshebetso Ipabotseng ya France ho tswa naheng ya France ka Labobedi la la 17 Motsheanong 2022, bakeng sa seabo sa hae boqolotsing ba ditaba, kgasong le mesebetsing meng fapaneng ya ho thusa setjhaba.
tgt_text: Lo ngunyaka wama-46 emva kwezidube-dube zabafundi zomhla we-16 kweyeSilimela 1976 ezazise-Soweto apho abantu abatsha bathi baqhankqalazela ukunyanzeliswa ngurhulumente wocalucalulo ukuba bafunde ngolwimi lwesiBhulu.

src_text: MatshedisoKabinete lebisitse matshediso malapeng le metswalleng ya bana: Monghadi Mpho Moerane (52), Ramotse wa mehleng wa Masepala wa Johannesburg, eo neng le radipolotiki ya neng lwanela ditokelo tsa batho bile le mohlanka wa batho ba Johannesburg.
tgt_text: Besebenzisa la moya mnye wawuboniswe ngabafundi ngenyanga yeSilimela ngowe-1976, iKhabhinethi ihlaba ikhwelo kubantu abatsha beli lizwe ukuba balwe ingxaki yabantu abatsha abangenamisebenzi ngokuthi bathathe inxaxheba kwiinkqubo zophuhliso ezifana nokufunda umsebenzi usemsebenzini kunye nawokuqeqeshwa emsebenzini..     Urhulumente uqulunqe iinkqubo zokuncedisa kumaphulo okuqesha ulutsha nawokudala imisebenzi ezizingxungxo zexeshana.

src_text: Pele e ba Ramotse bile setho sa Komiti ya Ramotse ya Tikoloho le Meralo ya Ditshebeletso.
tgt_text: Amashishini ayakhuthazwa ukuba aqeshe abantu abatsha abaninzi ngokuthi adalele ulutsha amathuba..     Inkqubo yolutsha yale nyanga yeSilimela yonke iquka izinto ezininzi eziquka ukuphehlelela iphulo lolutsha olungamatshantliziyo, ukusekwa kweNkqubo ye-NYDA Brand Ambassador kunye namaphulo okuvuselelwa kweNkonzo yeSizwe yoLutsha (i-YES) kulo lonke eli.

src_text: Ngaka Deborah Fraser (56), sebini se hapileng dikgau tse ngata mminong wa sedumedi se neng se sa tswa hlomphuwa ka Doctor of Philosophy in Sacred Music ke Christian Leadership Academy.Ngaka Namane Magau (70), serutehi se neng se hlompheha bile le setho se hlomphehang sa Boto ya Bahlokomedi ba Ditjhelete ba Lekgotla la Naha la AIDS Afrika Borwa.Monghadi Mike Schüssler (60), eo neng le setsebi se hlomphehang sa moruo Afrika Borwa le mokaubere indastering ena mme na le maikutlo tjhatsi ka maemo moruo wa Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: UMphathiswa okwi-Ofisi kaMongameli wezamaNina, uLutsha naBantu abaKhubazekileyo uza kunika ingcaciso egcweleyo kungekudala ngeenkqubo epheleleyo.

src_text: Monghadi Jamie Bartlett (56), sebapadi se neng se tlotlwa Afrika Borwa sa kalaneng le dipapadi tsa thelevisheneng se neng se hapile dikgau tse ngata, se tumme ka seabo sa sona jwaloka Mike O'Reilly ho Isidingo le David Genaro ho Rhythm City.
tgt_text: Yonke imisitho yolutsha kulindeleke ukuba ithobele imiqathango yezempilo ye-COVID-.

src_text: Kabinete mmoho le Mopresidente Ramaphosa ba boetse ba lebisitse matshediso mmusong le bathong ba United Arab Emirates (UAE) kamora ho hlokahala ha Mopresidente Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan (73) wa UAE      KhiroHo tlameha hore ho netefatswe mangolo thuteho ba hirwang mme ho netefatswe hore ha ba so ka ba tlola molao.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela yoMhlaba woLuntu.

src_text: Monghadi Bongani Sinenhlanhla Dladla ke Mohlanka ya ka Sehloohong wa Phethahatso Botong ya Ntshetsopele ya Indasteri ya tsa Kaho.
tgt_text: Urhulumente, ebambisene neNdlu yeSizwe yeeNkokeli zoMthonyama, uza kubamba iNgqungquthela yoMhlaba woLuntu ngoLwesihlanu, umhla wama-27 nangoMgqibelo umhla wama-28 kuCanzibe 2022 apho baza kuxoxa ngemiba enxulumene nobunini-mhlaba..

src_text: Mongadi Shabeer Hamid Khan ke Akhaontente Kgolo Matlotlong Naha..     Mme Mendoe Ntswahlana ke Mohlanka ya ka Sehloohong Thekong ya Thepa, Matlotlong Naha..     Kabinete dumellane le ho hirwa ha ba latelang bakeng sa ho tlatswa ha dikgeo Botong ya Balaodi ya Letlole le Leholo la Eneji     Monghadi Mosimaneotsile Jim Besnaar; (ii)    Mme Unati Nombakuse-Figlan.
tgt_text: Le miba iquka inkqubo yokukhutshelwa komhlaba woluntu usuka kuMbuso uye kubanikazi bawo abafanelekileyo, into leyo ibalulekileyo kumaphulo okuphuhlisa abantu basemaphandleni.

src_text: Moruo.
tgt_text: Ezoqoqosho .

src_text: Kabinete ananetse kgatelopele tsa morao tjena tse kgothatsang, maitekong mmuso ao sepheo ka ona leng ho kgothaletsa kgolo ya moruo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izamkele indaba ezincumisayo zakutsha nje ezimalunga namanyathelo esizwe okungenelela ngeenjongo zokukhwezela uhlumo loqoqosho.

src_text: Ho ya ka dipalopalo tsa morao tjena tsa tlhokeho ya mosebetsi tse tswang ho ba Dipalopalo Afrika Borwa, tlhokeho ya mosebetsi fokotsehile ho tloha dipersenteng tse.
tgt_text: Ngokweengxelo zakutsha nje zeZiko leeNkcukacha-manani zoMzantsi Afrika (i-StatsSA), inani labantu abangasebenziyo lehlile lisuka ku-.

src_text: 3 kotareng ya bone ya 2021 ho ya dipersenteng tse.
tgt_text: 5% kwikota yesine yowama-2021 laya kutsho ku-.

src_text: 5 kotareng ya pele ya.
tgt_text: 5% kwikota yokuqala yowama-.

src_text: Ke kotara ya bobedi jwale sekgahla se atolositsweng sa tlhokeho ya mosebetsi se fokotseha.
tgt_text: Inani labantu abangasebenziyo bebonke lehlile kwiikota ezimbini zilandelelana.

src_text: Mesebetsi mengata fumanwe makaleng ditshebeletso tsa baahi le setjhaba, makaleng tlhahiso le bohwebi.
tgt_text: Amacandelo adale eyona misebenzi mininzi leleenkonzo zoluntu nentlalontle, elemizi-mveliso kunye nelorhwebo.
Imveliso yonyaka yelizwe (i-GDP) kwikota yokuqala yowama-2022 ikhule ngo-.

src_text: Tlhahiso yohle ya kahara naha kotareng ya pele ya 2022 hodile ka persente tse.
tgt_text: 9% into leyo eyenze ukuba uqoqosho lweli lizwe lubuyele kwela nqanaba lalikulo phambi kwalo bhubhane siphuma kuye.

src_text: 9% mme sena sa lekanya moruo wa rona le nakong ya pele ho sewa sena.
tgt_text: Kule kota, icandelo lemizi-mveliso lilo eliqhube kakuhle kakhulu nelithe landisa imveliso yepetroli neekhemikhali, ukutya neziselo, kunye nesinyithi kunye noomatshini.

src_text: Kotareng eo, lekala la tlhahiso bile lona le sebetsang ka matla mme le bile le kgolo tlhahisong ya petroliamo le dikhemikhale, dijo le dino, le dimethale le metjhini..     Phaello tsena tse itekanetseng di bontsha hore moruo wa rona ntse le matla le hore maiteko kang Leano la Tlhophisobotjha le Tsoseletso ya Moruo ntse matlafala.
tgt_text: Lo mnconwana siwubonayo ubonakalisa ukuba uqoqosho lweli lizwe lusemi ngeenyawo kwaye amanyathelo okungenelela afana nesiCwangciso soKwakha Ngokutsha nokuVuselela uQoqosho (i-ERRP) ayaqalisa ukwenza umahluko.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho bohle ho tshehetsa dikgwebo le diindasteri tsa lehae ka ho reka dihlahiswa le ditshebeletso tsa tsona..     Kabinete boetse ananetse qeto ya mokgatlo wa ditekolo wa S&P Global ya ho lekolabotjha maemo Afrika Borwa ho kgona ho lefa melato ya yona – ho tloha maemong tsitsitseng ho ya ho matle.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ihlaba ikhwelo kuye wonke umntu ukuba axhase amashishini kunye nemizi-mveliso yalapha ekhaya ngokuthi athenge iimveliso kunye neenkonzo eziveliswe apha ekhaya..     IKhabhinethi isamkele isigqibo se-arhente ehlela isakhono sokukwazi ukubhatala izikweliti, u-S&P Global ngokuthi ayitshintshe indawo ebebeka kuyo uMzantsi Afrika ngokwesakhono sokukwazi ukubhatala izikweliti – isuke kwimeko ezinzileyo iye kwimeko encumisayo.

src_text: Mokgatlo ona boetse behile bokgoni ba naha ba ho lefa melato ya ditjhelete tsa dinaha tse ding ho BB minus le ya tjhelete ya kwano ho BB.
tgt_text: U-S&P Global usibeke kwizinga ngokwesakhono sokubhatala amatyala exesha elide abalwe ngezimali zangaphandle waze wasibeka ku-BB minus naku-BB kweletyala elibalwe ngemali yalapha ekhaya.

src_text: Theko ya tsa ho Iphedisa.
tgt_text: Iindleko zokuphila.

src_text: Lefu la Coronavirus (COVID-19) le ntwa ntseng tswela pele lefatsheng di bile le kameho matla thekong ya tsa ho iphedisa lefatsheng ka bophara.
tgt_text: Ubhubhane weSifo seNtsholongwane ye-Corona (i-COVID-19) kunye nongquzulwano oluqhubayo kwihlabathi zenze iindleko zokuphila zenyuka kakhulu kwihlabathi liphela.

src_text: Maafrika Borwa le ona tsieditswe ke theko nyolohang ya mafura, dijo le tse ding tsa bohlokwa..     Re lokela ho sebetsa mmoho, re thusane re boele re baballe disebediswa tsa rona nakong tsena tse boima.
tgt_text: Abemi boMzantsi Afrika bathwaxwa ngamaxabiso okunyuka kwamafutha ezithuthi, ukutya kunye nezinye izinto ezisisiseko.

src_text: Mmuso etsa ka hohle kamoo ka kgonang kateng ho thusa bohle, haholoholo ba futsanehileng..     Banka ya Afrika Borwa Kgolo sebetsang hantle matla le ikemetseng thusa ho sireletsa setjhaba ditlamoraong tsa boleng ba tjhelete ka ho tsitlallela infleishene seng batsi tlase ha ho bapiswa le ya dinaha tse ding..     Kabinete ananetse qeto ya Matlotlo Naha ya ho eketsa nako ya ho fokotswa ha Lekgetho la Mafura la Kakaretso (GFL).
tgt_text: Kufuneka sibambisane, sincedane sange ubutyebi beli lizwe ngala maxesha anzima.

src_text: GFL fokoditswe ka  50 bakeng sa litara ya mafura ka Mmesa le Motsheanong, mme sena se tla tswela pele le ho tloha ho la 1 Phuptjane ho ya ho la 6 Phupu.
tgt_text: Urhulumente wenza konke okusemandleni ukuzama ukunika uncedo kumntu wonke, ingakumbi abantu abasweleyo.

IBhanki enguVimba yoMzantsi Afrika esebenza kakuhle, ezinzileyo futhi nezimeleyo ifaka isandla izama ukuncenda isizwe singathwaxwa ngamandla kukunyuka kwamaxabiso ngokuthi igcine izinga lokunyuka kwamaxabiso lilawuleka; lingaphantsi kakhulu kweli lamanye amazwe..     IKhabhinethi isamkele isigqibo sikaNondyebo weSizwe sokwandisa kwexesha lokungatsalwa kwerhafu yawo onke amafutha ezithuthi, i-General Fuel Levy (i-GFL).

src_text: Kabinete boetse ananetse qeto ya Khomeshene ya Ditlhodisano ya ho beha ditheko tsa dintho tsa bohlokwa leihlo, haholoholo pehelo ya hore dikgwebo di lokela ho fana ka mabaka ho eketsa ditheko tsa dihlahiswa..     Kopano ya tsa Kgwebo ya Japan le Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: I-GFL yophulwe nge-R. 50 ilitha ngenyanga kaTshazimpunzi noCanzibe, kwaye iza kuphinda ingatsalwa ukususela ngomhla woku-1 kweyeSilimela ukuya kowesi-6 kweyeKhala..     IKhabhinethi iphinde yasamkela isigqibo seKhomishini yezoKhuphiswano sokubeka phantsi kweliso elibukhali amaxabiso okutya, ingakumbi ela solotya linyanzelisa amashishini ukuba anike izizathu ngokunyusa amaxabiso ezinto.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse diphetho tsa Kopano ya morao ya tsa Kgwebo ya Japan le Afrika Borwa, eo ho yona ho dumellanweng ka lenaneo le leholo la mosebetsi le kenyeletsang tshebedisano ho tlisweng ha diphetoho ho tsa tikoloho, ditheknolojing tsa dipalangwang tsa motlakase le mehlodi ya motlakase ya tsa tlhaho..     Kopanong ho boetse ho dumellanwe ka hore ho be le letsholo la marangranng la ho hlakisa menyetla teng Afrika Borwa ho beng ba dikgwebo ba Japan, ntshetsopele ya boiphihlelo indastering ya lehae ya tlhahiso ya makoloi, menyetla ya tlhahiso le phapanyetsano ya boiphihlelo ho tsa tekgniki..     Japan ke nngwe ya dinaha tseo leng balekane ba bohlokwa kgwebisanong le rona mme tsetela haholo makaleng fapaneng Afrika Borwa, ho tloha ho tsa tlhahiso ya makoloi ho ya metjhining tswang pele ya merafong, le ho tloha ho kgwebo ho tsa temothuo ho ya ditshebeletsong tsa ditjhelete..     Kabinete boetse ananetse ho thehwa ha Mokgwatshebetso wa Barekisetsi ba Dinaheng tse ding ba Batho ba Batsho ke Lefapha la Kgwebisano, Diindasteri le Ditlhodisano (dtic), molemong wa ho kopanya difeme tse romelang thepa entsweng naheng ena dinaheng tse ding lefatsheng.
tgt_text: INgqungquthela yezoShishino yoMzantsi Afrika ne-Japan.

src_text: Mokgwatshebeso ona tla thusa kabelanong ya tlhahisoleseding, bokgoni le tsebo, mme tsamaya mehlaleng ya dikatleho tsa Lenaneo la Beng ba Diindasteri ba Batho ba Batsho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izamkele iziphumo zeNgqungquthela yezoShishino yoMzantsi Afrika ne-Japan yakutsha nje, ethe yavumelana ngenkqubo yomsebenzi ende equka ukusebenzisana kumaphulo okwakha imizi-mveliso engenabungozi kokusingqongileyo, ubuchwepheshe beemoto ezihamba ngombane kunye nehaydrojini engenabungozi kokusingqongileyo.

src_text: Eneji.
tgt_text: Le ngqungquthela iphinde yavumelana ukuba kubanjwe umboniso oza kuqhutywa ngonxibelelwano lwevidiyo oza kubonisa ngamathuba akhoyo eMzantsi Afrika kumashishini ase-Japan, uphuhliso lwezakhono kwicandelo lezithuthi lalapha kweli, amaqela ajongene namathuba akhoyo kwicandelo lemizi-mveliso kunye nokwabelana ngolwazi olumayelana nobuchwepheshe.

src_text: Mehato ya rona ya ho netefatsa boteng ba motlakase sa timeng  nako telele matlafaditswe kamora hore ho nehelanwe ka Karolo ya 4 ya Sebaka sa ho Fehla Motlakase sa Kusile, Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: I-Japan lelinye lamazwe abalulekileyo esirhweba nawo kwaye lelinye lamazwe atyala imali eninzi kumacandelo amaninzi eMzantsi Afrika, ukusuka kwelezeemoto ukuya koomatshini bale mihla basemgodini, kwezolimo ukuya kwiinkonzo zezimali.

src_text: Ho nehelana hona ke letshwao la phihlello ya bohlokwa matsapeng Eskom ho tsitsisa mokgwatshebetso wa motlakase mme ho tla eketsa dimekawate (MW) tse 800 keriting ya matla..     Kabinete elelletswe hore kaho ya dikarolo tse nne tsa tse tsheletseng tsa ho fehla motlakase phethetswe projekeng ya Kusile ya ho Fehla Motlakase..     Kabinete ananetse ho eketswa ha bokgoni bo bong ba ho fehla motlakase keriting leng ntho kgonahaditsweng ke ho dumella bahlahisi ba motlakase ba ikemetseng hore ba hlahise motlakase.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukusekwa kwe-Black Exporters Network liSebe lezoRhwebo, uShishino noKhuphiswano (i-DTIC), eza kudibanisa amashishini abantu abantsundu aqhuba ushishino lokuthumela kumazwe ehlabathi iimveliso zeli.

src_text: Mmuso sa tswa saena tumellano ya ho reka dimekawate tse 150 ho Scatec ASA, bao leng bahlahisi ba motlakase tswang mehloding ya tlhaho..     Lekgotla la Boeletsi la Matlafatso ya Batho ba Batsho Batsi Moruong (B-BBEE).
tgt_text: Lo mbutho uza kunceda la mashishini akwazi ukwabelana ngolwazi, ngemingeni agagana nayo kunye nobuchule, kwaye wakhele kumsebenzi omhle osele wenziwe yiNkqubo yooSomashishini Abantsundu.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse ho kgethwa ha Lekgotla le letjha la naha la Boeletsi la B-BBEE.
tgt_text: Ezamandla.

src_text: Lekgotla le na le batho ba bangata ba tswang makaleng kgwebo, mekgatlo ya basebetsi, mekgatlo ya baahi le ditheo tsa thuto hodimo, ba tla thusa ho tataisa mmuso ho tlisweng ha diphetoho moruong..     Leha ho bile le kgatelopele kgahlisang molemong wa ho lokisa tse senyehileng nakong ya mmuso wa kgethollo, ho sa na le tse ngata tse lokelang ho etswa ho matlafatsa botsamaisi ba batho ba batsho, ho matlafatsa ntshetsopele ya bokgoni le ho atolosa phumano ya thepa le ditshebeletso molemong wa ho neha batjha le basadi ba batho ba batsho menyetla.
tgt_text: Umbono wethu wokuqinisekisa ukuba sinombane owaneleyo uye wasondela ekubeni ufezekiswe emva kokuba kuye kwanikezelwa ngokusesikweni kukaYunithi 4 weZiko loPhehlo-mbane laseKusile, eliseMpumalanga.

src_text: Dikgohola.
tgt_text: Ukunikezelwa kwale Yunithi kubaluleke kakhulu kumalinge ka-Eskom okuqinisekisa ukuba kukho uzinzo kwezombane kwaye le Yunithi iza kugalela umbane ozimegawathi (i-MW) ezingama-800 kwiziko lophehlo-mbane lesizwe..     IKhabhinethi ivile nokuba sele ugqityiwe umsebenzi wokwakha iiyunithi zokuphehla umbane ezine kwezintandathu kwiZiko loPhehlo-mbane laseKusile.

src_text: Dithuso tse ntseng di tswella tsa mmuso diprovenseng tse anngweng ke dikgohola di etsa phapang kgolo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyakwamkela ukongezwa kweYunithi entsha yokuvelisa umbane kwiziko lombane lesizwe, into leyo ethe yenzeka ngenxa yesigqibo esathathwayo sokuvumela abavelisi bombane abazimeleyo ukuba bavelise umbane.

src_text: Mmuso behile pele phumantsho ya dijo, metsi le botshabelo bakeng sa batho ba tlaletsweng ke naha, le ho lokiswa ha meralo ya ditshebeletso senyehileng.
tgt_text: Urhulumente usanda kutyikitya isivumelwano sokuthenga umbane oyi-150 MW kwa-Scatec ASA, inkampani evelisa umbane ohlaziyekayo.

src_text: Ho sebetswa ka matla ho tsoseletsa ditshebeletso tsa motheo tse kang metsi, motlakase, bohlweki le tsamaiso ya dikgwerekgwere..     Ke tjhelete ka bang dimiliyone tse R189, 217 sebediswang Lenaneong la Ntlafatso ya Mekhukhu leo ka lona sepheo leng ho fetola boleng ba bophelo ba ba phelang mekhukhung..     Ho boetse ho na le dimiliyone tse R733, 086 tsa Ntshetsopele ya Nyehelo ya Phumantsho ya Matlo tse tla thusa ho thehweng ha bodulo ba moshwelella le bo momahaneng ha batho..     Kabinete ananetse thuso ya botho tswang naheng ya Qatar ya dijo, diaparo, di-generator, dihlwekisametsi, metjhini thusang bakudi ho phefumoloha, ditente le disebediswa tsa bongaka.
tgt_text: IBhunga labaCebisi ngokuXhotyiswa Banzi kwabaNtsundu ngezoQoqosho (i-B-BBEE).

src_text: Nyehelo ena tla thusa batho ba fetang 4 000 ka palo ba fuweng bodulo ba nakwana ditsing tsa tlhokomelo tsa baahi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyakwamkela ukonyulwa kweBhunga labaCebisi le-B-BBEE nguMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa.

src_text: Kabinete boetse ananetse thuso ya botho tswang United Arab Emirates (UAE) ya dijo le metsi ho thusa mahlatsipa dikgohola..     Ho Thehwa ha Letlole la Ntshetsopele ya Setjhaba.
tgt_text: Eli bhunga lenziwe ngabantu abahlukeneyo abaphuma kwezoshishino, kwimibutho yabasebenzi, kwimibutho yoluntu kunye nakumaziko emfundo ephakamileyo, abaza kwenza umsebenzi wokukhokela urhulumente kwimizamo yakhe yokwenza iinguqu kuqoqosho.

src_text: 1    Kabinete ananetse ho thehwa ha Letlole la Mesebetsi ya Setjhaba ke Mokgatlo wa Ntshetsopele ya Diindasteri (IDC) sebedisana le lefapha la Bookamedi le dtic.
tgt_text: Nangona umde umgama osele uhanjiwe ukulungisa umonakalo owenziwa ngurhulumente wocalucalulo wokuba uqoqosho lube sezandleni zegcuntswana, kusekuninzi ekufuneka kwenziwe ukwandisa inani labantu abantsundu kwizikhundla zolawulo, ukuphuhlisa izakhono kunye nokwandisa amaqumrhu ekuthengwa kuwo ukuze kunikwe amanina antsundu kunye nolutsha amathuba..     Izikhukhula.

src_text: Tshehetso ena tla thusa ho theha menyetla ya mesebetsi ya nakwana bakeng sa batjha ba ka bang 50 000 leng mesebetsi tla tswela setjhaba molemo etswang metseng.. 2    Tshehetso tla kenyeletsa tlhokomelo ya bophelo bo botle le ya baahi, dijo le phepo ntle ka mokgwa wa dibaka tsa ho phehela batho, ntshetsopele ya ho ngola le ho bala, mananeo ho hlokomedisa ka tsa tikoloho le ho lwantsha diphetoho maemong lehodimo mmoho le maiteko ho tshehetsa batjha.
