tgt_text: Amalinge aqhubayo karhulumente okunikezela ngoncedo kumaphondo ebechatshazelwe zizikhukhula ezimandla enza umahluko obonakalayo.

src_text: Letlole le tla tshehetsa dikgwebo tse 26 tsa baahi le tse sa iketsetseng phaello..     Bosenyi le Bobodu.
tgt_text: Urhulumente uwukhokelise phambili umba wokunikezela ngokutya, amanzi kunye neendawo zokufihla iintloko ebantwini abaphulukene namakhaya abo kunye nokulungisa iziseko ezingundoqo ezonakeleyo.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse ho tshwarwa ha batho mabapi le diketso tsa manyofonyofo, ho patwa ha mehlodi ya ditjhelete tse seng molaong le bobodu.
tgt_text: Uyaqhuba, sithetha nje, umsebenzi omkhulu wokubuyisela kwimo yesiqhelo iinkonzo ezisisiseko ezifana namanzi, umbane, ugutyulo kunye nokuthuthwa kwenkunkuma..     Imali emalunga nezigidi zeerandi ezingama-.

src_text: Ba tshwerweng ba kenyeletsa bao neng le bahlanka ba hodimo mmusong le dikgwebong tsa mmuso, mme ba bang ba bona ba tobane le diqoso tse kenyeletsang ho tlolwa ha Molao wa Botsamaisi ba Ditjhelete tsa Setjhaba, 1999 (Molao wa 1 wa 1999).
tgt_text: 217 iyasebenza ngoku kwiNkqubo yokuPhucula iiNdawo ezingamaTyotyombe ngeenjongo zokuphucula ubomi babantu abahlala kwezi ndawo.

src_text: Ho tshwarwa ha batho bana ho kenyeletsang le ho tshwarwa ha mohlanka wa Lefapha la Ditaba tsa Kahara Naha, Setsing sa Kamohelo ya Baphaphathehi sa Desmond Tutu, Pretoria, ya belaellwang ka ho nka tjotjo ho letswantle, ke bopaki ba hore ha ho motho eo molao sa tlo mo fihlela mme ha ho sebaka sa basebetsi ba sa tshepahaleng lekaleng la setjhaba..     Kabinete boetse ananetse kgatelopele bonahalang pusetsong ya baena ba ha Gupta, Rajesh le Atul, Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Enye imali ezizigidi zeerandi ezingama-.

src_text: Sena se latela ho tshwarwa ha morao ha bona Dubai, UAE, kamora hore Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba wa Mapolesa Bosenyi (Interpol) ntshe ditsebiso tsa ho ba batla.
tgt_text: 086 ibekelwe isiBonelelo soPhuhliso lweziNdlu ukuze incede ukwakha iindawo ezizinzileyo nezihlangeneyo zokuhlala abantu.

src_text: Bobedi bona bo batleha Afrika Borwa mabapi le seabo sa bona ho hatjweng ha mmuso, ho kenyeletsa manyofonyofo le ho patwa ha mehlodi ya ditjhelete tse seng molaong.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyalamkela uncedo lwezentlalontle oluvela kwilizwe lase-Qatar ebelikukutya, iimpahla, iijenereyitha, oomatshini bokucoca amanzi, iintente kunye namayeza.

src_text: Ditherisano pakeng tsa mekgatlo ya tshebetso ya molao ya naha ya UAE le Afrika Borwa ka pusetso ya bona naheng ya rona di tswela pele.
tgt_text: Esi sipho siza kuxhanyulwa ngabemi abangama-4 000 abasahlala okwethutyana kumaziko oluntu.

src_text: Ho tshwarwa ha bona ke sesupo sa maikemisetso mmuso ho lwantsha bosenyi le bobodu ntle le tshabo kapa leeme..     Ho tshwarwa ha bona ke sesupo sa metjha le mekgwa sebetsang hantle ya hore ba belaellwang ka bosenyi ba ikarabelle diketsong tsa bona tse mpe le ho netefatsa hore ha ho ya kahodima molao..     Kabinete nyatsitse boiteko bo se nang dihlong ba ho kgella mmuso le naha ya rona fatshe kamora hore ho senngwe hampe kheibole Karolong ya 1 ya Seteishene sa ho Fehla Motlakase sa Matla sa Eskom, Mpumalanga ne le ketsahalo ya bone ya tshenyo belaellwang seteisheneng sa ho fehla motlakase kamora hore diketsahalo tse tshwanang le eo di tlalehwe diteisheneng tse ding tse tharo dibekeng tse mmalwa tse fetileng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwalamkele noncedo lwezentlalontle oluvela e-United Arab Emirates obelukukutya kunye namanzi okunceda amaxhoba ezi zikhukhula bezi thwaxe eli kwezi veki ziphelileyo.

src_text: Dipalopalo tsa morao tjena tsa diketso tsa bosenyi ke pontsho ya hore re tlameha ho leka ka matla re le setjhaba ho etsa hore ho be le polokeho metseng ya rona.
tgt_text: Ukusekwa kweNgxowa-mali yoPhuhliso lweMisebenzi.

src_text: Dintlha tsena di re hopotsa hore ho lwantsha bosenyi ke boikarabelo ba setjhaba le hore kaofela ha rona, ho kenyeletsa mapolesa, baetapele ba dipolotiki, baahi, malapa, beng ba dikgwebo, basebetsi le mekgatlo ya baahi, re lokela ho ba le seabo twantshong ya bosenyi..     Kabinete na le tshepo ya hore ditjhelete tse ding tse behetsweng thoko ke Lefapha la Mapolesa bakeng sa diteishene tsa mapolesa tse nang le palo hodimo ya melato ya dipolao, dipeto le diketso tse ding tsa bosenyi ba dikgoka, di tla thusa ho fetola maemo le ho tlisa polokeho metseng..     Tsa Morao tsa COVID-.
tgt_text: 1    IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukusekwa ngokusesikweni kweNgxowa-mali yoPhuhliso lweMisebenzi yi-Industrial Development Corporation (i-IDC) isebenzisana ne-Ofisi kaMongameli kunye ne-DTIC.

src_text: Kabinete hopoditse bohle hore COVID-19 ha so fele mme dikotsi tsa tshwaetso tse ntjha di tla eketseha nakong ya mariha.
tgt_text: Le Ngxowa-mali iza kunika abantu abatsha abanokude bafikelele kuma-50 000 amathuba emisebenzi ezizingxungxo eluncedo ekuhlaleni neyenziwa kwasekuhlaleni.. 2    Ezi zingxungxo ziza kuquka ukuncedisa kwicandelo lezempilo nonakekelo loluntu, ukuncedisa kwezokutya nesondlo kumaziko abonelela abantu abangathathi ntweni ngento esiwa phantsi kwempumlo, ukuncedisa kumaphulo okufundisa ukubhala nokufunda, ukutyala imithi namanye amalinge okulwa uguqu-guquko lwemozulu kunye namaphulo okunceda ulutsha.

src_text: Re tlameha ho tswela pele ho nka mehato ya bohlokwa ya ho itshireletsa le ba bang kenyeletsa ho hlapa kapa ho hlwekisa matsoho kgafetsa, ho rwala semonkwana ha le kahara moaho, ho se atamelane le ba bang, ho bula difenstere hore ho kene moya le ho enta..     Seboka sa African Union (AU).
tgt_text: Le Ngxowa-mali iza kuxhasa imibutho yoluntu kunye nengenzi ngeniso engama-.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse tsebahatso, boitlamo le boinehelo bo ananetsweng Sebokeng se sa Tlwaelehang sa AU sa Boferekanyi le Diphetoho tse sa Tsamaelaneng le Molaotheo Afrika se neng se tshwaretswe Malabo, Republic of Equatorial Guinea, ka Moqebelo wa la 28 Motsheanong..     Baetapele ba Afrika ba lekotse ditshoso tse pheelletseng, ba lekola mekgwa ya jwale ya ho di arabela mme ba itlama ho matlafatsa polokeho ya dinaha tseo leng ditho tsa AU tse tobaneng le boferekanyi le bongangele..     Lefu la Monkeypox.
tgt_text: Ulwaphulo-mthetho norhwaphilizo.

src_text: Kabinete tiiseditse Maafrika Borwa hore balaodi ba rona ba tsa bophelo bo botle ba malala laotswe ho beha leihlo le ho thibela lefu la Monkeypox kamora hore le qhome dinaheng tse se nang lona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyakubulela ukubanjwa kwabantu abaninzi ngezityholo ezinxulumene nobuqhetseba, ukuthutyeleziswa kwemali kunye norhwaphilizo.

src_text: Leha ho se motho ya fumanweng na le lefu lena Afrika Borwa, balaodi ba tsa bophelo bo botle naheng ba tswela pele ho beha maemo ana leihlo     Qeto ya Kabinete.
tgt_text: Aba bantu baquka abo babesakuba zizikhulu kurhulumente nakumaqumrhu akhe, futhi abanye babo babekwe amatyala anxulumene nokwaphula uMthetho wokuLawulwa kweziMali zikaRhulumente (i-PFMA), wowe-1999 (uMthetho uNombl 1 wowe-1999).

src_text: Puisano le Setjhaba ka Mehato ya ho Sebetsana le Kgwebo seng Molaong ya Masalla Ditshepe.
tgt_text: Aba bantu babanjiweyo – abaquka igosa leSebe leMicimbi yezeKhaya kwiziko leembacu, i-Desmond Tutu Refugee Reception Centre, ePitoli elityholwa ngokuthatha imali yokunyoba kummi wangaphandle – babubungqina bokuba ngenene umthetho awuthengi buso nokuba abasebenzi abanganyanisekanga abafuneki kurhulumente..     IKhabhinethi iyavuyiswa nangumsebenzi osele wenziwe malunga nokubuyiselwa eMzantsi Afrika kwabafo bakwa-Gupta, u-Rajesh no-Atul.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana hore ho be le dipuisano le setjhaba mabapi le ditshisinyo tsa ho thibela kgwebo ya masalla ditshepe tse utswitsweng le tse lokisitsweng.
tgt_text: Oku kulandela ukubanjwa kwabo e-Dubai e-UAE emva kokuba uMbutho weHlabathi wamaPolisa oLwaphulo-mthetho (i-Interpol) uye yakhupha umgqaliselo wokuba babanjwe apho babonwe khona.

src_text: Boshodu ba masalla ditshepe le dikheibole tsa koporo meralong ya ditshebeletso ya setjhaba bo sitisa tshebetso ya moruo ka ho baka ditjeho tse hodimo.
tgt_text: Aba bafo bakwa-Gupta bayafunwa ngabakwantsasana eMzantsi Afrika ngokunxulumene nendima ekutyholwa ukuba bayidlala kumkhuba wokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane, kuquka ubuqhetseba nokuthutyeleziswa kwemali.

src_text: Tse ding tsa ditshitiso di kenyeletsa tshitiso ya phepelo ya motlakase le ditshebeletso tsa diterene ka lebaka la diporo tse sentsweng.
tgt_text: Luyaqhuba uthetha-thethwano phakathi kwee-arhente zogcino-mthetho zoMzantsi Afrika kunye nezase-UAE malunga nokubuyiselwa kwabo kweli lizwe.

src_text: Ho sitisa tsamaiso ya dipalangwang tsa bapalami ho eketsa ditefello tsa ho tsamaya.
tgt_text: Ukubanjwa kwabo kubonakalisa ukuba urhulumente uzimisele ngenene ukulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho norhwaphilizo ngaphandle koloyiko nokujonga ubuso bomntu.

src_text: Dikheibole tsa motlakase tse sentsweng le tse sa bolokehang di kotsi ho baahi, haholoholo bana..     Kabinete laetse dtic ho etella pele dipuisano bakeng sa nako itseng, le ho nonya maikutlo setjhaba le makala loketseng, ka mehato sebetsang hantle eo mmuso ka kenyang tshebetsong ho thibela ho senngwa ha meralo ya ditshebeletso ya bohlokwa.
tgt_text: Ukubanjwa kwaba bantu kubonakalisa ukuba ziyasebenza iinkqubo namanyathelo okuqinisekisa ukuba abenzi bobubi bayaphendula ngezenzo zabo ezihambisa umzimba kwaye zikwabubungqina bokuba umthetho awuthengi buso.

src_text: Kamora moo, Kabinete tla tsebahatsa mehato tjhaetsweng monwana     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iligxibhe kabukhali ilinge lokuzama ukusengela phantsi uqoqosho lweli lizwe nokudelela ilizwe uqobo emva komonakalo ombi owenziwe kwikheyibhuli ekuYunithi 1 kwisiKhululo soPhehlo-mbane sika-Eskom, iMatla esiseMpumalanga.

src_text: Seboka sa Matjhaba se Mabapi le Theknoloji Polokong ya Kgotso (PTPS) sa Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN).
tgt_text: Eli ibilityeli lesine kusenziwa amalinge okonakalisa ngabom isikhululo sophehlo-mbane elilandela amanye amatyeli amathathu alo mkhuba kwezi veki zimbalwa zidlulileyo.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla tshwara seboka sa Botshelela sa PTPS Lekgotleng la Diphuputso tsa Saense le Diindasteri Pretoria ho tloha ka Labobedi la la 21 ho ya ho Labohlano la la 24 Phuptjane.
tgt_text: Iinkcukacha-manani zolwaphulo-mthetho zibonakalisa ukuba kusekuninzi ekufuneka sikwenzile sisisizwe ukuqinisekisa ukuba abantu bakuthi bakhuselekile.

src_text: Ho lebelletswe baromuwa ba 300 ba tswang dinaheng tse 50 tseo leng ditho sebokeng sena..     Seboka se kopanya ba nang le thahasello ho tswa sesoleng, sepoleseng, le batho ka kakaretso Dinaheng tseo leng Ditho tsa Matjhaba Kopaneng molemong wa hore ba sebetse mmoho tshebedisong ya ditheknoloji tsa sejwalejwale le tse tswetseng pele le dikgopolotaba matsholong poloko ya kgotso Matjhaba Kopaneng.
tgt_text: Oku kusikhumbuza ukuba idabi lokulwa amazinga aphezulu olwaphulo-mthetho lelesizwe kwaye nathi sonke – kuquka amapolisa, iinkokeli zezopolitiko, uluntu ngokubanzi, iintsapho, oosomashishini, abasebenzi kunye nemibutho yoluntu – kufuneka sidlale indima yethu ekulweni ulwaphulo-mthetho.

src_text: Seboka se tla sebediswa jwaloka lepatlelo la ho abelana ka tlhahisoleseding le ho qothisana lehlokwa bakeng sa dinaha tseo leng ditho tsa UN tse nang le seabo matsholong ho boloka kgotso ka tshebediso ya ditheknoloji tsa morao tjena matsholong ana..     Tlhodisano ya Naha Tshwarwang Kamora Dilemo tse Pedi tla Tshwarwa Lekgetlo la Bone ya WorldSkills South Africa (WSZA).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi inethemba elikhulu ukuba le mali ibekelwe bucala yi-Ofisi yoMphathiswa wezamaPolisa ilungiselela izikhululo zamapolisa ezinamanani aphezulu abantu ababuleleyo, abadlwenguleyo kunye nezinye izenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho olunobundlobongela iza kunceda kakhulu ukulwa ulwaphulo-mthetho ize yenze zikhuseleke kumntu wonke iindawo esihlala kuzo..     Ezakutsha nge-COVID-.

src_text: Ho tshwerwe Tlhodisano ya Naha ya Kamora Dilemo tse Pedi ya Bone ya WSZA, Inkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre, KwaZulu-Natal ho tloha ka la 7 ho ya ho la 10 Phuptjane 2022 tlasa mookotaba: “Ntlafatso ya Tlhahiso ya ba Etsang Mesebetsi ya Matsoho Mongwahakgolong wa bo-21”..     Ketsahalo ena sebedisetswa ho ntlafatsa boiphihlelo ba batho ba etsang mesebetsi ya matsoho jwaloka mosebetsi ka phedisang motho le ho lebisa tshebedisanong le ba bang indastering ena.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikhumbuza wonke umntu ukuba i-COVID-19 ayikapheli kwaye amathuba okuba lande inani labantu abosulelwe yiyo aza kunyuka ngeli xesha lasebusika.

src_text: Ketsahalo ena boetse sebedisetswa ho lekola boemo ba boithuto ba mosebetsi le ntshetsopele ya ba etsang mesebetsi ya matsoho hodima ho kgothaletsa ho kgethwa ha mesebetsi ya matsoho jwaloka kgetho ya pele ya baithuti ba rona     Molaetsa.
tgt_text: Masiqhubeleke ngokuthatha amanyathelo afanelekileyo okuzikhusela thina kunye nabanye abantu.

src_text: MatshedisoKabinete le Mopresidente Ramaphosa ba lebisitse matshediso Lelapeng la Boreneng le setjhabeng sa Borena ba Maphoto kamora ho hlokahala ha Motlotlehi Morena Moholo Zanozuko Tyelovuyo Sigcau     KhiroHo tlameha hore ho netefatswe mangolo thuto ba hirwang mme ho netefatswe le hore ba ha ba so ka ba tlola molao..     Monghadi Jacob Ganny Mbele jwaloka Molaodi-Kakaretso (DG) Lefapheng la Diminerale le Eneji..     Mme Pumeza Nwabisa Nodada jwaloka Motlatsa-Molaodi-Kakaretso (DDG): Botsamaisi ba Meru Lefapheng la Meru, Botshwasi le Tikoloho.
tgt_text: La manyathelo aquka ukuhlamba izandla rhoqo ngamanzi okanye ngesibulala-ntsholongwane, ukunxiba izifonyo xa ungaphakathi kwizakhiwo, ukungasondelelani, ukuvula iifestile ukuze kubethe umoya kunye nokugonya..     INgqungquthela yeMbumba ye-Afrika (i-AU).

src_text: Mme Susan Mafanedza Masapu jwaloka Moeletsi ya ka Sehloohong wa Mmuso wa Molao Lefapheng la Toka le Ntshetsopele ya Molaotheo..     Mme Doris Tshepe jwaloka Mokhomeshenara Khomesheneng ya Ditlhodisano..     Ngaka Alex Mahapa jwaloka Moeletsi ya Ikgethang wa nako tsohle ho Letona le Tshwereng Mokobobo lefapheng la Tshebeletso ya Mmuso le Tsamaiso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isamkele isibhambathiso kunye nezithembiso ezamkelwe kwiNgqungquthela eNkulu ye-AU engezoBunqolobi kunye noTshintsho Olungahambi ngokoMgaqo-siseko e-Afrika ebibanjelwe e-Malabo, e-Republic of Equitorial Guinea, ngoMgqibelo, umhla wama-28 kuCanzibe.

src_text: Diphetoho Maemong Lehodimo.
tgt_text: Ukutshintsha kweMozulu.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ketelo ya Monghadi Alok Sharma, Afrika Borwa, eo leng Mopresidente wa Seboka sa bo-26 sa Maemo Lehodimo sa Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN), ho tloha ka la 19 ho ya ho la 21 Phuptjane 2022, le tekolo ya hae ya hore Afrika Borwa bontshitse ho ikemisetsa ho fetohela enejing ya mehlodi ya tsa tlhaho..  Ka 2021, Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa kopane le baetapele ba bang tsebahatsong ya tshebedisano ya bohlokwa le dinaha tsa France, Germany, United Kingdom le Amerika, mmoho le European Union, molemong wa ho tshehetsa phetoho nang le toka moruong sebedisang mehlodi ya eneji sa hlahiseng khabone le setjhaba se nang le bokgoni ba ho emelana le maemo lehodimo mabe..  Afrika Borwa sebeditse ka thata itokisetsa ho fetela tlhahisong ya motlakase hlwekileng le ho fallela mehloding ya eneji ya tlhaho kang matla mafura hlwekileng etswang ka metsi le motlakase, dimela, matla moya, matla letsatsi le metsi, hara mehlodi meng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ilwamkele utyelelo lukaMnu Alok Sharma, eMzantsi Afrika nongu Mongameli weNgqungquthela yeZizwe eziManyaneyo (i-UN) yama-26 yoTshintsho lweMozulu.

src_text: Motswako ona wa eneji tlisa tekatekano pakeng tsa mehlodi ya eneji ho netefatsa matla tshepehang emelanang le ditlhoko tsa naha tsa eneji tse eketsehang..  Tshebediso ya Ente ya Lefu la Coronavirus (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Ukusuka ngomhla we-19 ukuya kowama-21 kweyeSilimela ngowama-2022, kananjalo lwamkelwe ngezandla ezishushu uvavanyo lwakhe oluziphumo zalo zithe uMzantsi Afrika ubonakalise ukuzinikela okungathandabuzekiyo kutshintsho lwamandla acocekileyo.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse ho theoha ka matla ha palo ya batho ba tshwaetswang ke COVID-19 rekotilweng Afrika Borwa dibekeng tse mmalwa tse fetileng mme ya kgothaletsa batho bohle ba loketseng, ho tswela pele ka ho enta leng ntho thusang ho thibela ho kula haholo, ho robatswa sepetlele le ho hlokahala..  Ho fihlela jwale halofo ya palo ya batho ba baholo ba Maafrika Borwa se fumane bonnyane ente le nngwe ya COVID-.
tgt_text: Ngonyaka wama-2021, uMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa wazimanye nezinye iinkokeli ekubhengezeni intsebenziswano eyaba yimbali kunye norhulumente waseFransi, eJamani, e-United Kingdom nowaseMelika, kwakunye neManyano yaseYurophu, ukuxhasa utshintsho olunobulungisa kuqoqosho lwekhabhoni ephantsi kunye noluntu olukwaziyo ukumelana nemozulu.

src_text: Mmuso ikemiseditse ho sebedisa tjhelete ya tswala tlase eo sa tswa kadingwa ke Banka la Lefatshe ho reka diente tse ding tsa COVID-19 le ho netefatsa hore setjhaba se sireletsehile ka ho lekaneng ditshwaetsong tse ka bang teng..  Kabinete boetse buisane ka dintlha tse amanang le tswelopele taolong ya sewa sa COVID-19, haholoholo kgatelopele etswang molemong wa ho kgutlela bophelong bo tlwaelehileng.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika ubusebenza nzima ekulungiseleleni inguqu yokuvelisa amandla acocekileyo kunye nenyathelo lokucoca imithombo yamandla efana nehidrojeni ecocekileyo, i-biomass, amandla omoya, amandla elanga kunye nombane ophehlwa ngamanzi, nekuzezinye izinto ezinokuhlaziywa kabutsha ukuze kuveliswe amandla ombane.

src_text: Letona la Bophelo bo Botle, Ngaka Joe Phaahla, le tla fana ka dintlha tse ding..  Letsatsi la Naha la Batjha.
tgt_text: Le ngxubevange yamandla ivumela ulungelelwaniso phakathi kwemithombo yamandla ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuba ilizwe lifumana amandla awoneleyo nangekho ethe-ethe nakwaziyo ukuhlangabezana neemfuno zamandla ezikhulayo zelizwe.

src_text: Kabinete lebohile Maafrika Borwa ohle ikamahantseng le mekete ya naha ya Letsatsi la Naha la Batjha ya Labone la la 16 Phuptjane 2022 tlasa mookotaba reng: “Ntshetsopele ya mekgwa ya ho iphedisa ya moshwelella ya batjha le matla bona molemong wa bokamoso bo tjhatsi.” Moya wa tjantjello le matla bontshitsweng ke batjha naheng ka bophara ke dintho tse ka ketekelwang mme di tlisa tshepo ya bokamoso bo tjhatsi..  Jwalokaha re lebile mafelong Kgwedi ya Naha ya Batjha re tebiseng matsapa rona ho netefatsa hore batjha ba fihlella mananeo mangata ao mmuso fanang ka ona le ho ba thusa hore ba kgone ho ba le seabo moruong..  Tshebeletso ya Setjhaba, jwaloka mohiri moholo arabetse phephetso ena ka ho thusa batjha ba phethetseng dithuto tsa bona ba sa sebetseng ho fumana boiphihlelo ka Lenaneo la Tshebeletso ya Setjhaba la ho Rupella Batjha Mosebetsing.
tgt_text: Ukuthathwa kwesitofu sokugonyela intsholongwane ye-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Mmuso boetse kenya tshebetsong Letlole la Mesebetsi ya Setjhaba (SEF) le Tsehebeletso tsoseleditsweng ya Naha ya Batjha (NYS) leng maiteko ho theha mesebetsi tla thusa khirong ya batjha ba ka bang.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukwehla okumandla kosulelo lwe-COVID-19 eMzantsi Afrika kwezi veki zimbalwa zidlulileyo kwaye ikhuthaze bonke abantu abafanelekileyo ukuba baqhubeleke nokugonya, kuba oku kuthintela ukugula okumandla, ukulaliswa esibhedlele kunye nokufa.
Isiqingatha sabo bonke abantu abadala baseMzantsi Afrika ukuza kuthi ga ngoku sele befumene ithamo elinye ubuncinane lokugonyela i-COVID-.

src_text: Maiteko ana tla fana ka boiphihlelo bo hlokehang haholo ba mosebetsing mme boele tiise molemo wa seabo sa baahi.
tgt_text: Urhulumente ujonge ukusebenzisa imali-mboleko enenzala ephantsi esandula kuvunywa yiBhanki yeHlabathi ukuze athenge izitofu zogonyo ze-COVID-19 kunye nokuqinisekisa ukuba isizwe sikhuseleke ngokwaneleyo kusulelo olungenzeka lubekhona.

src_text: SEF sebetsa mmoho le mekgatlo eo eseng ya mmuso (di-NGO) ha NYS hira batjha ditshebeletsong tse tswelang baahi molemo naheng ka bophara..  Dipalangwang.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwaqwalasele imiba enxulumene nophuhliso lolawulo lobhubhani we-COVID-19, ingakumbi kwinkqubela eyenziweyo ekubuyeleni ngokupheleleyo kwimisebenzi yesiqhelo yentlalo noqoqosho.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse Morero wa Dintlha tse 11 wa Tshebetso tla sebetsana le ho kwalwa ha mebila le ho hirwa ha matswantle jwaloka bakganni ba dilori.
tgt_text: UMphathiswa wezeMpilo, uGq Joe Phaahla, uza kunika iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe ngalo mba.

src_text: Morero ona sibollotsweng ke Komiti ya Matona Fapaneng (IMC) ya Mebila le ho tsamaiswa ha Thepa ka tshebedisano le ba amehang indastering ya ho tsamaiswa ha thepa, hara tse ding kgothaletsa ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha ditokomane tsa ho eta le ho ikamahanya le melao ya tsa basebetsi..  IMC thehetswe ho sebetsana le diketsahalo tse jeleng setsi tsa ho kwalwa ha mebila le mehwanto ya boipelaetso ya bakganni ba dilori ba Maafika Borwa ba sa kgotsofalang.
tgt_text: Usuku loLutsha lweSizwe.

src_text: Mehwanto le ho kwalwa ha mebila di na le kameho mpe phallong ya dipalangwang tshosa boramatsete ba dinaha tse ding mme sa bohlokwa haholo na le kameho mpe moruong le metjheng bohlokwa ya phepelo sebedisang mebila amehang mehwantong..  Kgaello ya metsi Masepaleng Moholo wa Nelson Mandela Bay (NMB).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibulele bonke abemi boMzantsi Afrika ngokuzimanya kwabo kwizikhumbuzo zoSuku loLutsha lweSizwe, ebelibhiyozelwa ngoLwesine, umhla we-16 kweyeSilimela ngowama-2022 phantsi komxholo othi: “Ukukhuthaza ukuphila okuzinzileyo nokomelela kwabantu abatsha ukuze babe nengomso elingcono.”.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse seabo sa Lefapha la Metsi le Bohlweki (DWS) Masepaleng Moholo wa NMB, Kapa Botjhabela molemong wa ho thibela ho kwalwa ha phepelo ya metsi nakong eo provense tobaneng le mathata matla kgaello ya metsi qadileng ka.
tgt_text: Njengoko siyisonga iNyanga yoLutsha lweSizwe, masiqinise iinzame zethu zokuqinisekisa ukuba abantu abatsha bayafikelela kwiinkqubo ezininzi zenkxaso ezibonelelwa ngurhulumente kwaye siququzelele ukuthatha kwabo inxaxheba kuqoqosho.

src_text: DWS sebetsa le provense ho kenya tshebetsong mehato ya nako kgutshwane bohareng le telele ya ho lwantsha ditlamorao tsa komello..  Kabinete boetse ipileditse ho baahi ba NMB ho ikamahanya le melawana ya metsi behilweng ke bomasepala ba lehae ho netefatsa boteng ba metsi nako telele.
tgt_text: INkonzo kaRhulumente, njengoyena mqeshi mkhulu, isabele kulo mceli mngeni ngokunika ithuba  abafundi abaphumelele izidanga abangaphangeliyo lokufumana amava ngeNkqubo ye-Public Service Graduate Internship and Learnership Programme.

src_text: Ka kakaretso, metsi sebediswang ka letsatsi lokela ho fokotswa ka dilitara tse dimiliyone di 50, ho tloha ho dilitara tse dimiliyone di 280 tse sebediswang hona jwale ka letsatsi, mme sena se tla lebisa tshebedisong ya dilitara tse dimiliyone di 230 ka letsatsi..  Bosenyi le bobodu.
tgt_text: Urhulumente ukwaphumeza iNgxowa-mali yeNgqesho yoLuntu (i-SEF) kunye namanyathelo okudala amathuba emisebenzi eNkonzo yoLutsha yeSizwe (i-NYS) aza kutsalela abantu abatsha abangama-50 000 kuqoqosho ngalinye.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ho tshwarwa ho sa tswa etsahala ha mosebetsi wa Lefapha la Ditaba tsa Kahara Naha ofising ya Benoni ya nehileng moahi wa Bangladesh bukana ya ho eta ya mokunyata.
tgt_text: La manyathelo akasayi kubonelela ngamava omsebenzi afuneka kakhulu nje kuphela kodwa azokwazi nokomeleza ixabiso nokuziva ungummi obalulekileyo elizweni.

src_text: Mosebetsi eo leng Mme Sibongile Simelane fumane beili ya R5 000 Lekgotleng la Dinyewe la Makgistrata la Benoni ka Labobedi la la 21 Phuptjane.
tgt_text: I-SEF isebenzisana nemibutho engekho phantsi kukarhulumente (ii-NGO) ngelixa i-NYS yona ibhalisa ulutsha kwiinkonzo ezinceda uluntu kwilizwe liphela.

src_text: Moahi enwa wa Bangladesh leng Monghadi Fahim Kazi tshwerwe leka ho tswa naheng ena ka la 12 Motsheanong 2022 sebedisa lebitso la ‘Lebogang Ndlovu’.
tgt_text: Ezothutho.

src_text: Lefapha la Ditaba tsa Kahara Naha (DHA) le sa tswa romela sebapadi sa dipaleng sa Lithuania, Ieva Andrejevaite naheng ya habo, ha ne batla ho sebedisa hampe botsamaisi ba Afrika Borwa ba taolo ya baphaphathehi iqapela pale eo seng nnete batla botshabelo kwano ka lebaka la “ntwa Ukraine.”.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isamkele isiCwangciso sokuSebenza esizakumiselwa kwiinkalo ezili-11 ezizakujongana nokuvalwa kweendlela kunye nokuqeshwa kwabemi bamazwe angaphandle njengabaqhubi beelori.

src_text: Kabinete rorisitse mosebetsi etswang ke Karolo ya ho Lwantsha Bobodu ya DHA thoholetsa le ho kgothaletsa Maafrika Borwa ho tswela pele ka ho tlaleha diketso tseo tsa tlolo ya molao.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso, sathi saphuhliswa yiKomiti yabaPhathiswa beNdlela noThutho (i-IMC) ngentsebenziswano nabachaphazelekayo kushishino lwendlela nothutho, sikhuthaza phakathi kwezinye izinto ukunyanzeliswa kweemfuneko ze-visa kunye nokuthotyelwa kwemithetho yezabasebenzi.

src_text: Diketso tse seng molaong tsa Maafrika Borwa rekisang boitsebiso ba ona di na le ditlamorao tse mpe le tse kgolo bakeng sa polokeho ya naha le maemo yona bophelong ba setjhaba le moruong wa yona.
tgt_text: I-IMC yasekwa ukuze ijongane nokwanda kokuvalwa kweendlela kunye noqhanqalazo lwabaqhubi belori baseMzantsi Afrika abangonwabanga.

src_text: Mmuso tla tswella le ho nka mehato matla kgahlano le mang kapa mang ya ikamahanyang le diketso tse seng molaong tseo leng tello melao ya rona ya ho kena naheng ena, ntle le tshabo kapa leeme..  Kabinete boetse ananetse ho tshwarwa ho sa tswa etsahala ha titjhere ya Durban, mme Nomusa Precious Gabuza (37) – ya ahlotsweng dilemo tse tharo tsa ho sebeletsa setjhaba le tse nne tsa tjhankaneng, mme hloletswe kantle dilemo tse tharo ke Lekgotla la Dinyewe la Lebatowa la Mlazi, Kwazulu-Natal – ka ho tlola Molao wa Dikgetho tsa Bomasepala wa Mebuso ya Lehae, 2000 (Molao wa 27 wa 2000).
tgt_text: Uqhanqalazo kunye nokuvalwa kwendlela kuchaphazela kakubi ukuhambahamba kwabantu neemoto, kwale loyikisa abatyali-mali bamanye amazwe, eyona mpembelelo embi ngakumbi  ikuqoqosho kunye nokubonelela ngeenkonzo eziyimfuneko ezisebenzisa iindlela  ezichaphazelekayo.

src_text: Jwaloka titjhere sekolong se neng se le sebaka sa ho kgetha nakong ya Dikgetho tsa Bomasepala, Mme Gabuza dumetse molato wa ho kgetha makgetlo 24, ho kenyeletsa makgetlo 12 Dikgethong tsa Bomasepala le 12 Dikgetho tsa Diwate..  Kahlolo ena ke pontsho matla ya boinehelo ba Khomeshene ya Dikgetho ya Afrika Borwa ya ho nka bohato kapele le ho bontsha taolo ya boitshwaro bo bobe.
tgt_text: Ukunqongophala kwamanzi kuMasipala oMbhaxa we-Nelson Mandela Bay (i-NMB).

src_text: Ena ke tiisetso matla ya mekgwatshebetso ya dikgetho seng matlafaditswe ka ho hlahiswa ha Sesebediswa sa Taolo ya Bakgethi thibelang ho kgetha habedi..  Kabinete tiisitse hore dikgetho ke tshiya ya demokrasi ya rona mme di lokela ho sireletswa ka hohle kamoo ho ka kgonehang kateng..  Seboka sa bo-12 sa Matona (MC12) sa Mokgatlo wa Lefatshe wa Kgwebisano (WTO).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ilwamkele ungenelelo lweSebe lezaManzi noGutyulo (i-DWS) kuMasipala oMbhaxa we-NMB eMpuma Koloni ukunqanda iimini ezoma nko (Day Zero)  njengoko eli phondo lijongene nokunqongophala okumandla kwamanzi kususela ngonyaka wama-.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse diphetho tsa WTO MC12 neng tshwaretswe Geneva, Switzerland ho tloha ka la 12 ho ya ho la 17 Phuptjane 2022, haholoholo qeto reng dinaha tse nang le bokgoni di ka ba le ditokelo tsa ho hlahisa diente tsa COVID-19 ho fihlela ka.
tgt_text: Ngoko ke i-DWS isebenzisana nephondo ukuphumeza amanyathelo exesha elifutshane, eliphakathi nelide ukulungisa nokuthomalalisa impembelelo esenokubakhona yembalela.

src_text: Qeto ya ho atolosa sena hore se kenyeletse kalafo le hlahlobo tsa COVID-19 kgutliseditswe morao ka dikgwedi tse tsheletseng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yabongoza abahlali base-NMB ukuba babambelele kwizithintelo zamanzi ezibekwe ngoomasipala basekhaya ngelo kuqinisekisa ukugcinwa kwamanzi.

src_text: Esale Afrika Borwa itlhomme pele boipiletsong ba hore WTO dumelle dinaha tse ding ho ba le ditokelo tsa ho iketsetsa diente tsa COVID-19 mme sena se ka netefatsa hore ho na le phihlello lekanang enteng le ho kgonahatsa hore dinaha tse nang le bokgoni ba ho hlahisa diente di di etsa..  Seboka se boetse sa inehela motjheng bulehileng le kenyeletsang bohle molemong wa ho tlisa diphetoho mesebetsig ya sona, mme ha dumellanwa ka ditumellano tsa kgwebisano tse sebetsanang le tsa bophelo bo botle, ho behwa ha meedi dithusong tsa botshwasi, kemiso ya nakwana kgwebisanong ya marangranng le boteng ba dijo nako telele  Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Kukonke, ukusetyenziswa kwamanzi kufuneka kucuthwe ngezigidi zeelitha ezingama-50 ngosuku, ukusuka kwinqanaba langoku lezigidi zeelitha ezingama-280 ngosuku ukuya phantsi kwizigidi zeelitha ezingama-230 ngosuku.

src_text: Kgatelopele Lenaneong la ho Fallela Kgasong ya Dijithale (BDM).
tgt_text: Ulwaphulo-mthetho norhwaphilizo.

src_text: Kabinete tsebisitswe ka tsa morao Lenaneong la BDM mme ya amohela kgatelopele entsweng ka ho kenngwa ha di-set-top box le karolo ya ho fallela kgasong ya dijithale ho tloha ho ya analogue.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukubanjwa kwakutsha nje kwegosa leMicimbi yezeKhaya elisebenza kwi-ofisi yase-Benoni elenzele ummi wase-Bangladeshi incwadana yokundwendwela yobuqhophololo.

src_text: Kabinete boetse tobokeditse tlhokeho potlakileng ya ho phethela BDM molemong wa ho etsa hore ho be le spectrum se hlokehang bakeng sa phihlello ya inthanete, le bakeng sa mesebetsi meng amanang le theknoloji ya tlhahisoleseding le dikgokahano..  Letona la Dikgokahano le Ditheknoloji tsa Dijithale, Khumbudzo Ntshavheni le tla ba le seboka le boraditaba hosane (Labohlano, 24 Phuptjane) ho fana ka dintlha tse ding.
tgt_text: Igosa, uNksz Sibongile Simelane, unikwe ibheyile ye-R5 000 kwinkundla kaMantyi yase-Benoni ngoLwesibini umhla wama-21 kweyeSilimela ngo-.

src_text: Tlaleho ya Selemo le Selemo ya Naha ya Maemo Ditokelo tsa Ngwana.
tgt_text: Yena ke Ummi wase-Bangladeshi, uMnumzana Fahim Kazi, wabanjwa ngethuba ezama ukubaleka alishiya ilizwe ngomhla we-12  kuCanzibe ngo-2022 ebaleka enegama elithi 'Lebogang Ndlovu'.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Tlaleho ya bobedi ya Selemo le Selemo ya Naha ya Maemo Ditokelo tsa Ngwana.
tgt_text: ISebe leMicimbi yezeKhaya (i-DHA) lisanda kubuyisela emva ekhaya umdlali we-Lithuanian, uNksz Ieva Andrejevaite, owayefuna ukusebenzisa kakubi ulawulo lweembacu lwaseMzantsi Afrika ngokuxela amampunge ebali lokufuna ukufaka isicelo se-asylum ngenxa "yemfazwe yase-Ukraine".

src_text: Tlaleho fana ka tlhahisoleseding mabapi le ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Morero wa Naha wa Tshebetso wa Bana bakeng sa 2019 ho ya ho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwa wuncomile umsebenzi owenziwe lisebe i-DHA kwicandelo lalo lwedesika elwa norhwaphilizo.
Iqhwabela izandla kwaye ikhuthaza abemi boMzantsi Afrika ukuba baqhubeke nokuzixela izenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho ezinjalo.

src_text: Tlaleho hlakisa dikatleho tsa 2020 ho ya ho boetse hlakisa dibaka tse sa ntseng di fana ka bothata, ho kenyeletsa polokeho ya bana le ho se lekane pakeng tsa bana ba hlokang le ba sa hlokeng.
tgt_text: Izenzo ezingekho semthethweni zabemi boMzantsi Afrika abathengisa izazisi zabo zineziphumo ezimbi kakhulu kukhuseleko lwelizwe kunye nobuhle bentlalo noqoqosho.

src_text: Tlaleho boetse bontsha kamoo sewa sa COVID-19 se ammeng bana kateng nakong ena..  Sepheo ka mehato ya ho kena dipakeng kenngwang tshebetsong ke mmuso ke ho netefatsa ho hlomphuwa ha ditokelo tsa bana, jwalokaha di hlalositswe Molaotheong wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa wa.
tgt_text: Urhulumente uza kuqhubeka esebenza ngqwabalala ngakuye nabani na obandakanyeka kwizenzo ezingekho mthethweni ezijongela phantsi imithetho yethu yokufudukela kwelinye ilizwe, ngaphandle koloyiko okanye ukukhetha.

src_text: Mehato ena boetse tshehetsa maitlamo naha Ditumellanong tsa Dinaha tsa Matjhaba tsa Ditokelo tsa Ngwana (UNCRC) le Tokomane ya Tumellano ya Afrika ya Ditokelo le Thekolohelo ya Ngwana (ACRWC).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukugwetywa kwa kutsha nje kukatitshala waseThekwini, uNksz Nomusa Precious Gabuza (37) – ogwetywe iminyaka emithathu phantsi kweliso loluleko kunye neminyaka emine ethothoza etrongweni, yaxhonywa yonke iminyaka emithathu, kwiNkundla yeNgingqi yaseMlazi KwaZulu-Natal – ngokutyeshela uMthetho woNyulo looMasipala kuRhulumente weNgingqi, wama-2000 (uMthetho wama-27 ka-2000).

src_text: Afrika Borwa saenne ditokomane tsa UNCRC le ACRWC..  Tlaleho bokeleditswe ka tshebedisano le mafapha mmuso le ba bang ba amehang boemong ba naha le ba diprovense.
tgt_text: Njengomfundisi-ntsapho kwisikolo esasisetyenziswa njengesikhululo sokuvota ngexesha loNyulo lukaMasipala kweyeDwarha ngowama-2021, uNksz Gabuza ubuvumile ubuqhophololo owabenza kwiivoti ezingamashumi amabini anesine, eziquka i-12 zoNyulo looMasipala kunye ne-12 zoNyulo lweeWadi.

src_text: Tlaleho felletseng tla behwa websaeteng ya Lefapha la Ntshetsopele ya Setjhaba: www.dsd.gov.za.
tgt_text: Oku kugwetywa kunye nesigwebo kubonisa ngokucacileyo ukuzinikela kweKomishoni yoNyulo yaseMzantsi Afrika ukuba ingenelela kwangethuba kwaye iyakwazi nokuthatha amanyathelo anqala emva kweziphumo zophando.

src_text: Tlaleho ya Nako le Nako ya Afrika Borwa ho UNCRC Kopantsweng ya boraro ho ya ho ya botshelela ho UNCRC.
tgt_text: Kwakhona oku kukwasisiqinisekiso sokuba qatha kweenkqubo zonyulo, ezithe zaqiniswa  ngokuziswa kweSixhobo soLawulo lwabavoti i-Voter Management Device esithintela ukuvota kabini.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tekwa ha Tlaleho ya boraro ho ya ho ya botshelela ya Nako le Nako ho UNCRC.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iqinisekisile ukuba unyulo lusisiseko sentando yesininzi yethu kwaye kufuneka lukhuselwe nangaziphi na izindlela.

src_text: Tlaleho ena tla kamora ya bobedi tekilweng ho UNCRC ka.
tgt_text: INkomfa ye-12 yabaPhathiswa (i-MC12) yoMbutho woRhwebo weHlabathi (i-WTO).

IKhabhinethi izamkele iziphumo ze-WTO MC12 ebibanjelwe e-Geneva, e-Switzerland ukusuka ngomhla we-12 ukuya kowe-17 kweyeSilimela ngowama-2022, ingakumbi isigqibo sokuba amazwe afanelekileyo angalisebenzisa igunya lawo lokurhoxisa  ilayisenisi eziwathintela ekuziveliseleni isitofu se-COVID-19 de kube ngowama-.

src_text: Tlaleho bokeleditswe ho latela Karolo ya 44 ya UNCRC, mme boetse akaretsa ditlhokomelo le dikgothaletso tse entsweng tlalehong ya ho qetela.
tgt_text: Isigqibo esimalunga nokwandisa oku kunyango lwe-COVID-19 kunye noxilongo salibaziseka kangange sithuba seenyanga ezintandathu.

src_text: UNCRC rometse ditlhokomelo le dikgothaletso tsa naha ka.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika ubukhokela ikhwelo lokuba i-WTO iwarhoxise amalungelo obunini obubodwa abotshelelwe kwizitofu zokugonya ze-COVID-19 oku kuza kuqinisekisa ukufikelela ngokulinganayo kumayeza okugonya kunye nokuvumela amazwe anamandla okuvelisa izitofu ukuba akwenze oko.

Le nkomfa izibophelele kwinkqubo evulelekileyo nebandakanyayo yokuguqula yonke imisebenzi yayo kwaye ivumelene nomqulu wezivumelwano zorhwebo ezijongana namacandelo afana nezempilo, ukumisela imida kwinkxaso-mali yokuloba, ukumiselwa korhwebo nge-intanethi kunye nokuqinisekisa ubukho bokutya     Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Pokeletso entswe ka tshebedisano le mafapha ohle loketseng le ba amehang naheng ka bophara.
tgt_text: Inkqubela-phambili kwiNkqubo yokuFudukela kuSasazo lobuxhaka-xhaka beDijithali (i-BDM).

src_text: Tlaleho felletseng tla phatlalatswa ha se teketswe UNCRC.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ifumene uhlaziyo ngeNkqubo ye-BDM yaze yayiqaphela nenkqubela-phambili esele yenziweyo ngokufakela iibhokisi ezixhunywayo njengenxalenye yokufudukela kusasazo lwe-analogu ukuya kwidijithali.

src_text: Tlaleho ya naha ka ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Lenaneo le Letjha la Metse ya Ditoropong.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yagxininisa ukungxamiseka kokuba kuqukunjelwe i-BDM yokukhulula inkqubo efunekayo kuthungelwano losasazo, kunye nezinye iinjongo ezinxulumene nobuchwephesha bonxibelelwano.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tekwa ha tlaleho ya pele ya Afrika Borwa ya naha mabapi le ho Kenngwa Tshebetsong ha Lenaneo le Letjha la Metse ya Ditoropong tekwa Lenaneong la Phumantsho ya Bodulo la UN (UN-Habitat).
tgt_text: UMphathiswa wezoNxibelelwano nobuChwepheshe beDijithali uKhumbudzo Ntshavheni uza kunika iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe ngomso (uLwesihlanu, umhla wama-24 kweyeSilimela)..     INgxelo yoNyaka yeSimo seSizwe saMalungelo oMntwana.

src_text: UN-Habitat amohetse Lenaneo la yona le Letjha la Metse ya Ditoropong, Sebokeng sa yona sa Phumantsho ya Bodulo le Ntshetsopele ya Bodulo ba Ditoropng bo Tsitsitseng ka Mphalane.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba ipapashwe iNgxelo yoNyaka yesibini engeSimo seSizwe kumaLungelo abaNtwana.

src_text: Ho ne ho lebelletswe hore dinaha tseo leng ditho di nehelane ka ditlaleho tsa kgatelopele ka ho ithaopa..  Afrika Borwa tsheheditse ho amohelwa ha Lenaneo le Letjha la Metse ya Ditoropong mme hamorao ya le kenya tshebetsong ka Moralotshebetso Momahaneng wa Ntshetsopele ya Metse ya Ditoropong (IUDF).
tgt_text: Le ngxelo ibonelela ngohlaziyo ngokufezekiswa kwesiCwangciso seSizwe  saBantwana kwisithuba esiphakathi kweminyaka yama-2019-..

src_text: Sepheo sa IUDF ke ho tataisa ntshetsopele ya bodulo ba ditoropong bo kenyeletsang bohle, bo matla le bo nang le seriti..  Tlaleho ya kgatelopele bokeleditswe ka tshebedisano le mmuso wa naha, diprovense le mebuso ya lehae, le mekgatlo loketseng eo seng ya mmuso..  Lewa le Momahaneng la Ntshetsopele ya Batjha (IYDS).
tgt_text: Le ngxelo iqaqambisa impumelelo ebhalwe phantsi yexesha eliphakathi kweminyaka yama-2020-.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha IYDS.
tgt_text: Ikwaqaqambisa iinkalo ezisathe gqolo zingumceli mngeni, kubandakanywa ukhuseleko lwabantwana kunye nokuqhubekeka kokungalingani phakathi kwabahlwempu nezinhanha ngokubhekiselele ebantwaneni.

src_text: Lewa le thusa ho kenya tshebetsong Leano la Naha la Batjha la 2020 ho ya ho.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo ikwabonisa indlela ubhubhani we-COVID-19 ochaphazele ngayo abantwana ngeli xesha.

src_text: Le hlalosa diketsahalo, diprojeke le mananeo lokelang ho etswa ke ba fapaneng ba amehang ho tswa mekgatlong ya batjha..
tgt_text: Amanyathelo okungenelela aphunyezwa ngurhulumente ajolise ekufezekiseni amalungelo abantwana, njengoko kucacisiwe kuMgaqo-siseko weRiphablikhi yoMzantsi Afrika wowe-.

src_text: Le boetse le thusa ka ho fokotsa phethapheto ya dithuso tsa mmuso mme le tataise kamoo mekgatlo ya basebetsi le lekala la poraefete di ka tshehetsang batjha ho fihlella menyetla.
tgt_text: Lama nyathelo akwaxhasa izibophelelo zelizwe kwiiNgqungquthela ze-UN malunga namaLungelo oMntwana (i-UNCRC) kunye noMqulu wase-Afrika wamaLungelo kunye neNtlalontle yoMntwana (i-ACRWC).

src_text: Pokeletso ya lewa na le maikutlo makala fapaneng setjhabeng..  Moralo wa Tokomane ya Tataiso ya Paballo le Tshebediso ya Ho ya Ho Ile ya Dihlodilweng tsa Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika watyikitya  kwi-UNCRC kunye ne-ACRWC.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka moralo wa Tokomane ya Tataiso ya Paballo le Tshebediso ya Moshwelella ya Dihlodilweng tsa Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yaqulunqwa ngokubonisana namasebe karhulumente kunye neqela labathathi-nxaxheba abafanelekileyo kwinqanaba lesizwe nelephondo.

src_text: Dihlodilweng tsa Afrika Borwa di fana ka motheo wa bohlokwa bakeng sa kgolo le ntshetsopele ya moruo, mme di bohlokwa boiphedisong ba batho..  Tokomane ena ya Tataiso thusa ho kenya tshebetsong dkgothaletso tsa Moifo wa Boemo bo Hodimo wa Ditsebi kgethilweng ka 2019 hore lekolebotjha maano jwale, molao le mekgwa ya ditaba tse amanang le mefuta ya bohlokwa ya dihlodilweng..  Tlaleho kgothaleditse tshibollo ya leano le leholo le akaretsang la paballo le tshebediso ya Moshwelella ya dihlodilweng tsa naha.
tgt_text: Ingxelo epheleleyo iza kufakwa kwiwebhusayithi yeSebe loPhuhliso loLuntu: www.dsd.gov.za.

src_text: Leano le tla kenngwa tshebetsong makaleng ohle mmuso.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yeXeshana eDityanisiweyo yoMzantsi Afrika yesithathu ukuya kweyesithandathu kwi-UNCRC.

src_text: Paballo bohlokwa bakeng sa letsholo la naha la ho potlakisa kgolo ya moruo le ho thehwa ha mesebetsi..  Lewa la Nama ya tse Hlaha.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukunikezelwa kweNgxelo yeXeshana lesithathu ukuya kwelesithandathu kwi-UNCRC.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Moralo wa Lewa la Nama ya tse Hlaha hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka lona.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo ilandela iNgxelo yexeshana yesibini eyayithiwe thaca kwi-UNCRC ngowama-..     Ingxelo iqulunqwe ngokungqinelana neSiqendu 44 se-UNCRC, kwaye ikwabandakanya imigqaliselo kunye nezindululo ezenziwe kwingxelo yokugqibela.

src_text: Sepheo ka lewa ke ho hophisa le ho tlisa diphetoho indastering ya nama ya tse hlaha.
tgt_text: I-UNCRC yayithumele imigqaliselo kunye neengcebiso zayo kweli lizwe ngo-..     Olu qulunqo lwenziwe ngodliwano-ndlebe nawo onke amasebe afanelekileyo nabachaphazelekayo kwilizwe liphela.

src_text: Sepheo se seng ke ho ba le seabo phumanehong ya dijo nako telele..  Indasteri ya nama ya tse hlaha indastering eo haholoholo sa hlophisehang sebetsang ka mokgwa sa momahanang.
tgt_text: Ingxelo epheleleyo iza kwaziswa eluntwini emva kokuba yondlelwe kwi-UNCRC.

src_text: Lewa lena le sisinngwang le fana ka mokgwa wa tshebetso tla hlophisa le ho matlafatsa lekala lena jwaloka le fanang ka dijo nako telele le la kgolo ya moruo le ka thusang ho thehweng ha menyetla ya mosebetsi  Dibili.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yeSizwe emalunga nokuphunyezwa kweNkqubo eNtsha yoPhuhliso lweDolophu.

src_text: Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Merero ya Setso ka Kakaretso ya.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa kwengxelo yokuqala yesizwe yoMzantsi Afrika emalunga nokuPhunyezwa kweNkqubo eNtsha yoPhuhliso lweDolophu kwiNkqubo yokuHlaliswa koLuntu ye-UN (i-UN-Habitat).

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tekwa ha Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Merero ya Setso ka Kakaretso ya 2022 Palamenteng bakeng sa hore ke sekasekwe.
tgt_text: I-UN-Habitat yamkele iNkqubo eNtsha yoPhuhliso lweDolophu kwiNkomfa yayo yeZindlu kunye noPhuhliso oluZinzileyo lweDolophu kweyeDwarha  ngonyaka wama-.

src_text: Sepheo ka dikarolo tse ngotsweng botjha ke ho lekolabotjha Molao wa Boetapele ba Setso le ba MaKhoi-San wa 2019  (Molao wa 3 wa 2019) keneng tshebetsong ka la 01 Mmesa.
tgt_text: Amazwe angamalungu kwakulindeleke ukuba angenise iingxelo zenkqubela-phambili ngokuzithandela.
UMzantsi Afrika uxhase ukwamkelwa kweNkqubo eNtsha yoPhuhliso lweDolophu waza emva koko wayizalisekisa ngeNkqubo-sikhokelo yelizwe eDityanisiweyo yoPhuhliso lweDolophu (i-IUDF).

src_text: Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya 2022 ya Tshireletso ya Demokrasi Itshetlehileng ho Molaotheo kgahlano le Boferekanyi le Diketsahalo tse Amehang.
tgt_text: I-IUDF ijolise ekukhokeleni uphuhliso lweendawo zokuhlala ezisezidolophini ezibandakanyayo, ezikwaziyo ukuzimela nekuhlalekayo kuzo..     Ingxelo yenkqubela-phambili yaqulunqwa ngokubonisana norhulumente wesizwe, wephondo nowengingqi, kunye neeNGO ezifanelekileyo.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tekwa ha Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya 2022 ya Tshireletso ya Demokrasi Itshetlehileng ho Molaotheo kgahlano le Boferekanyi le Diketsahalo tse Amehang, Palamenteng bakeng sa hore ke sekasekwe.
tgt_text: ISicwangciso esiHlangeneyo soPhuhliso loLutsha (i-IYDS).

src_text: Ha se amohetswe, Bili tla fetola Molao wa jwale wa Tshireletso ya Demokrasi Itshetlehileng ho Molaotheo Kgahlano le Boferekanyi le Diketsahalo tse Amehang wa 2004 (Molao wa 33 wa 2004).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyamkele i-IYDS ukuba iphunyezwe.

src_text: Bili ena fetile motjheng matla wa dipuisano le setjhaba kamora hore tjhaelwe monwana ke Kabinete ka Motsheanong.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-qhinga siphumeza uMgaqo-nkqubo woLutsha weSizwe wowama-2020-.

src_text: Sepheo ka diphetoho ke ho tjhorisa metjha ya kwano ya ho lwantsha boferekanyi le ya lefatshe teng.
tgt_text: Ichaza amanyathelo, iiprojekthi kunye neenkqubo eziza kwenziwa ngabathathi-nxaxheba abohlukeneyo abavela kumaqumrhu olutsha.

src_text: Diphetoho di boetse tsa lokisa dikarolwana tseo ho neng hothwe ha di ikamahanye le molaotheo ke Lekgotla la Molaotheo..  Jwaloka setho sa Lekgotla la Tshireletseho la Matjhaba Kopaneng, Afrika Borwa tlameha ho sebedisa melao ya matjhaba naheng ena leng melao eo sepheo ka yona leng ho matlafatsa mehato ya ho lwantsha boferekanyi lefatsheng  Diketsahalo tse Tlang.
tgt_text: Ikwajongene nokuncitshiswa kokuphindwa kongenelelo lukarhulumente kwaye ikhokele indlela uluntu kunye necandelo labucala abanokuxhasa ngayo abantu abatsha ekufikeleleni kumathuba.

src_text: Seboka sa bo-14 sa Brazil, Russia, India, China le Afrika Borwa (BRICS).
tgt_text: Ukuqulunqwa kwesi sicwangciso kubandakanye amagalelo ahlukeneyo avela kumacandelo ngamacandelo oluntu.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla etella pele Afrika Borwa Sebokeng sa mokgwa wa vidiyo sa bo-14 sa Baetapele ba dinaha tsa BRICS se tla tshwarwa ke People’s Republic of China ho tloha ka Labone la la 23 ho ya ho Labohlano la la 24 Phuptjane.
tgt_text: IPhepha leNgcaciso eYilwayo yoLondolozo kunye noSetyenziso oluZinzileyo lweZityalo eZiphilayo zaseMzantsi Afrika.
IKhabhinethi iluvumile uyilo lwePhepha leNgcaciso yoMgaqo-nkqubo ngoLondolozo kunye noSetyenziso oluZinzileyo lweZityalo eZiphilayo zaseMzantsi Afrika ukuze uluntu luhlomle.

src_text: Botho ba rona ba BRICS bo tswela pele ho tswela naha molemo.
tgt_text: Iintlobo-ntlobo zezityalo nezilwanyana zaseMzantsi Afrika zibonelela ngesiseko esibalulekileyo sokukhula koqoqosho nophuhliso, kwaye zikwa balulekile nakubomi babantu.

src_text: Ngwahola thepa ya Afrika Borwa rometsweng dinaheng tse ding ballwang dipersenteng tse fetang tse 17 ile dinaheng tsa BRICS, mme dipersente tse fetang tse 29 tsa thepa tlileng kwano di ne di tswa dinaheng tseo.
tgt_text: Eli Phepha leNgcaciso yoMgaqo-nkqubo lenza ukuba zisebenze izindululo ezenziwe liGqiza leeNgcali elikwiNqanaba eliPhezulu elalonyulwe ngowama-2019 ukuba lihlole imigaqo-nkqubo yethu yeli xesha, imithetho kunye nezenzo kwimiba enxulumene neentlobo zezilwanyana ezidumileyo.

src_text: Boleng ba kgwebisano ena ntse bo ntse bo hola, mme kgwebisano yohle ya Afrika Borwa le dinaha tse ding tsa BRICS ka 2021 ballwa dibiliyoneng tse R702, ha ka 2017 ne ballwa dibiliyoneng tse  .
tgt_text: Le ngxelo icebise ngokuqulunqwa komgaqo-nkqubo obanzi wolondolozo nokusetyenziswa ngokuzinzileyo kwezityalo nezilwanyana zelizwe.

src_text: Tshebedisano hara dinaha tseo leng ditho tsa BRICS makaleng kang bophelo bo botle le kgwebisano ntlafetseng hodisitse diindasteri tsa naha ena, mme tswetse ditho tsohle tsa BRICS molemo.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uza kuphunyezwa kuwo onke amanqanaba karhulumente.

src_text: Sepheo ka botsetedi ba rona diprojekeng tsa ntshetsopele ya meralo ya ditshebeletso le maiteko ho potlakisa metjha ya kgwebo ke ho eketsa thepa romelwang ho balekane ba rona ba BRICS..  Sekolo sa Mariha sa Tsamaiso ya Moruo.
tgt_text: Ulondolozo lubalulekile kwiphulo lelizwe lokukhawulezisa ukukhula koqoqosho nokudala imisebenzi.

src_text: Sekolo sa Naha sa Mmuso (NSG) se tla tshwara Lenaneo la sona la boraro la sekolo sa Mariha sa Tsamaiso ya Moruo bakeng sa Bahlanka ba Phethahatso, Johannesburg ho tloha ho la 27 Phuptjane ho ya ho la 1 Phupu.
tgt_text: Isicwangciso-qhinga esimalunga nenyama yenyamakazi.

src_text: Sebokeng ho tla tla Matona tswang Côte d'Ivoire; South Sudan le Afrika Borwa; le Balaodi-Kakaretso ba Lesotho, Zambia, Democratic Republic of Congo, Tanzania le Ghana.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa  kwesiCwangciso-qhinga esisayilwayo seNyama yenyamakazi ukuze uluntu luhlomle.

src_text: Boramotse ba Afrika Borwa, mmoho le ditho tsa dikomiti tsa boramotse le makgotla phethahatso ba tla ba teng le bona..  Ho lebelletswe hore bahlanka bana ba phethahatso ba tswang dinaheng tse fapaneng ba abelane dikgopolo le dithuto ka maemo fapaneng ao ba kopanang le ona mosebetsing wa bona wa letsatsi le letsatsi..  NSG radile lenaneo la selemo le selemo bakeng sa ditho tsa phethahatso ka 2020 le karolo ya tshehetso ya yona boinehelong ba mmuso ba ho aha naha nang le bokgoni.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-qhinga sijonge ukuvumela ngokusesikweni kunye nokuguqula ishishini lenyama yenyamakazi.

src_text: Sepheo ka sekolo sena hara tse ding ke ho hlomella bahlanka ba phethahatso makaleng mararo mmuso ka boetapele bo ntlafetseng le bokgoni ba ho hlokomela le hore ba kgone ho lekola botjha diphephetso tsa tsamaiso tse sitisang ho kenyeletswa ha bohle le kgolo ya ho ya ho ile ya moruo..  Letsatsi la Matjhaba la Nelson Mandela.
tgt_text: Sikwafuna ukufaka isandla ekuqinisekeni kokuba khona kokutya ngendlela ezinzileyo.

src_text: Letsatsi la Matjhaba la Nelson Mandela le ka Mantaha, 18 Phupu 2022, mme le tla ketekwa tlasa mookotaba: “Etsa seo se kgonang, ka seo nang le sona, moo leng teng”.
tgt_text: Ishishini lenyama yenyamakazi ubukhulu becala lishishini elingekho sikweni elisebenza ngendlela engafaniyo.

src_text: Ke boipiletso bo matla bathong hore ba tshehetse le ho ba le seabo letsholong lena ka maiteko moshwelella nang le thuso ya nako telele..  Bo bong ba maiteko ao moshwelella ke Dipuisano tsa selemo le selemo tsa Batjha tsa ho tlotla Nelson Mandela le Lenaneo la Boetapele bo Kgabane bo tsepameng dintlheng tseo ho buuwang ka tsona haholo tse amanang le batjha Afrika Borwa le lefatsheng ka bophara..  Nako ya Lekgetho.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-qhinga sicetywayo sibonelela ngesicwangciso somiliselo esiza kumisela ngokusesikweni kwaye someleze eli candelo njengababoneleli bokutya kunye necandelo lohlumo loqoqosho elinokunceda ekudaleni amathuba emisebenzi     Umthetho osayilwayo.

src_text: Sehla sa 2022 sa ho kenya ditokomane tsa lekgetho se qala ka la 1 Phupu ho ya ho la 24 Mphalane.
tgt_text: UMthetho osaYilwayo oLungisiweyo weMicimbi yezeMveli wowama-.

src_text: Balefi ba lekgetho ba kgothaletswa ho kenya ditokomane tsa bona tsa lekgetho ka mokgwa wa eFiling (www.sarsefiling.co.za) kapa ho MobiApp ya Tshebeletso ya Pokello ya Lekgetho ya Afrika Borwa (SARS)..  Monongwaha SARS tla nne sebedise tlhahisoleseding eo e bokellang ya motho ka mong, ho etsa tlaleho ya motho nang le dintlha tsohle tsa hae tsa ditjhelete, ho thusa ho bebofatsa motjha wa ho kenya ditokomane tsa lekgetho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa koMthetho-siHlomelo oYilwayo weMicimbi yezeMveli  wowama-2022 ePalamente ukuze uqhubeke nokuqhutywa.

src_text: Ka 2021 SARS bokelletse tlhahisoleseding ya balefi ba lekgetho ba dimiliyone tse fetang tse tharo.
tgt_text: Ezi zihlomelo zifuna ukuhlaziya uMthetho wobuNkokheli beMveli nobu-Khoi-San, wowama-2019 (uMthetho wesi-3 wama-2019), oqale ukusebenza ngomhla woku-1 kuTshazimpuzi ngowama-.

src_text: Ho kenngwa ha ditokomane ka nako le ka nepo ho netefatsa hore batho ba ikamahanye le melao ya lekgetho, le ho thusa mmuso ho isa ditshebeletso ho Maafrika Borwa di hlokang haholo  Melaetsa.
tgt_text: Umthetho osaYilwayo Wokukhuselwa kweNtando yesininzi yoMgaqo-siseko ngokuchasene nabanqolobi kunye neMisebenzi eNxulumene nabo wama-..     IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa ePalamente koMthetho osaYilwayo wokuKhuselwa kweNtando yesininzi yoMgaqo-siseko ngokuchasene nabanqolobi kunye neMisebenzi eNxulumeneyo nabo wama-2022 ukuba iqhutywelwe phambili.

src_text: DithoholetsoKabinete thoholeditse le ho lebisa ditakaletso tse ntle ho bana: • Moahlodi Owen Lloyd Rogers kamora hore kgethelwe ho ba moahlodi wa Lekgotla la Molaotheo la Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Wakuba wamkelwe, lo Mthetho uYilwayo uza kuhlomela uMthetho okhoyo ngoku woKhuseleko lweNtando yesininzi yoMgaqo-siseko ekuchasene nabanqolobi neMisebenzi eNxulumeneyo nabo, wama-2004 (uMthetho wama-33 wama-2004).

src_text: • Kabinete le Mopresidente Ramaphosa ba lakaleditse Mopresidente wa Mehleng Thabo Mbeki mahlohonolo Letsatsi la Tswalo ha qeta dilemo tse 80, leo le ketekileng ka la 18 Phuptjane.
tgt_text: Emveni  kokuba uvunyiwe lo mthetho usayilwayo yiKhabhinethi kuCanzibe wama-2021, uye waba kwinkqubo yokubonisana noluntu ngokubanzi.

src_text: Monghadi Mbeki lakaleditse Maafrika Borwa ohle bokamoso bo tjhabileng le bo nang le katleho  KhiroHo tlameha hore ho netefatswe mangolo thuto ba hirwang mme ho netefatswe le hore ba ha ba so ka ba tlola molao.
tgt_text: Ezi zihlomelo zifuna ukulungelelanisa iindlela zokusebenza zeli lizwe zokulwa nobunqolobi kunye nemilinganiselo yehlabathi esele ibekiwe.

src_text: Balaodi ba Ikemetseng ba Boto ya Boladi ya Bofofisi Afrika Borwa  Monghadi Ernest Khosa  Mme Bulelwa Koyana  Monghadi Surendra Sooklal; led.
tgt_text: Kwakhona kuphinde kwajongwana  namagatya ayethe athathwa njenga magatya angekho kumgaqo-siseko yiNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko.

src_text: Mme Rejoice Edith Phewa.
tgt_text: Nanjenge lizwe elityikitye kwiBhunga loKhuseleko le-UN, uMzantsi Afrika ubophelelekile ukuba ube nemithetho yamazwe ngamazwe ezama ukomeleza amanyathelo okulwa nobunqolobi behlabathi     Imisitho Ezayo.

src_text: Ditho tsa Ofisi ya Diphatlalatso tsa Dilounu tsa ho reka Matlo le Phatlalatso ya Dikoloto tsa Matlo  Mme Kenosi Pearl Louisa Selane (Modulasetulo)  Mme Catharina Maria Van der Sandt  Monghadi Errol Vincent Magerman  Moadvokheiti Mandla Dludlu  Monghadi Matsobane Gabriel Mello  Mme Palesa Mawasha  Mme Penelope Anne Beck-Paxton  Mme Sphiwe Dorris Mayinga  Mme Tshifhiwa Victor Mphigalale; lej.
tgt_text: INkomfa ye-14 yase-Brazil, i-Russia, i-India, i-China noMzantsi Afrika (i-BRICS).

src_text: Tsa Moraorao Mabapi le Kokwanahloko ya Khorona (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Ezintsha malunga neSifo seNtsholongwane ye-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Kabinete leboha batho bohle ba Afrika Borwa ba ileng ba kgetha ho enta le ho ikobela dipehelo tsohle tse mabapi le COVID-19 leng se entseng hore lenane la batho ba tshwaetsehang le se ke la phahama haholo leqhubung la bohlano la sewa sena naheng ena..     Leha ho le jwalo, re ntse re tlameha ho ba hlokolosi jwalo ka ha COVID-19 ntse so fele.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyababulela bonke abantu eMzantsi Afrika abathe bakhetha ukuzigonya nokuthobela imiqathango ye-COVID-19 into leyo ebangele ukuba eli lizwe likwazi ukunqanda ukunyuka kwamanani abantu abasolulelwa okokuqala yi-COVID-19 ngethuba lomsinga wesihlanu walo bhubhane.

src_text: Leha mmuso sa tswa phumula molao qobellang batho ho apara dimonkwana setjhabeng, empa batho ba nang le mafu sa phekoleheng, le ba kulang, ba ntse ba tlameha ho tswela pele le ho di apara.
tgt_text: Noko kunjalo, kufuneka singayekeleli umxakatho njengoko i-COVID-19 isagquba.

src_text: Re ntse re tlameha ho tswela pele le ho hlapa matsoho rona kgafetsa kapa ho hlwekisa ka sebolaya dikokwanahloko, ho iqaqolohanya le ba bang mmoho le ho ba sebakeng se kenang moya hantle..     Ente ntse le yona feela mokgwa nang le bopaki ba saense ba hore thibela COVID-19, mme Kabinete kgothaletsa batho bohle ba so kang ba enta ho etsa jwalo ka potlako le ba entileng ho fumana ente ya tlatsetso mahala ditsing tse haufi tsa ho entela..     Monkeypox.
tgt_text: Nangona eli lizwe likuphelisile ukunxitywa ngokunyanzelekileyo kwesifonyo esidlangalaleni, abantu abanezifo ezinganyangekiyo kunye nabo bagulayo bayakhuthazwa ukuba baqhubeleke nokunxiba izifonyo.

src_text: Kabinete ile ya behwa sehlohlolong sa ditaba tsa moraorao mabapi le Monkeypox le ho tshwaetsa ha yona naheng ena ho latela ho fumaneha ha motho wa bobedi ya nang le bohloko bona naheng ena.
tgt_text: Futhi kufuneka siqhubeleke nokuhlamba izandla okanye nokuzifefa ngesibulala-ntsholongwane, futhi singasondelelani zize neendawo esikuzo zibethe umoya..     Ugonyo lixhadi esinalo elikuphela kwalo eliqinisekisiweyo zinzululwazi lokulwa i-COVID-19 kwaye iKhabhinethi ikhuthaza bonke abantu abangagonywanga ukuba baye kugonya ngokukhawuleza baze bona abo sele begonyiwe baye kufumana ichiza elisimahla lokomeleza amajoni omzimba kumaziko akufutshane okugonya.

src_text: Bakudi bana ka bobedi ba ipolokile ka bonngwe malapeng mme ho ntse ho tsongwa batho bao ba kileng ba kopana le bona, bao ho ka etsahalang hore ba bile kotsing ya ho tshwaetseha..     Ka bobedi Lefapha la Bophelo bo Botle le Mokgatlo wa Naha wa Mahloko Tshwaetsanang, ba sebedisana mmoho le Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba wa Bophelo bo Botle ho hlahloba kotsi ya tshwaetsano bohlokong bona naheng ena ba ipapisitse le dipehelo tsa Matjhaba tsa Bophelo bo Botle..     Kokwanahloko ya monkeypox ha tshwaetsane ha bonolo ntle le ha thetsane le motho ya nang le yona jwalo ka ho sunana, ho mo sika kapa ho thetsa dikarolo tsa mmele tse nang le yona.
tgt_text: Isifo i-Monkeypox.

src_text: Batho ba se nang matshwao kokwanahloko ena ba ke ke ba tshwetsa ba bang..     Kabinete eletsa batho ba bang le matshwao feberu mokgohlane tlwaelehileng tsamaisanang le matjhatjhetsi kang lekgopho hore ba etele ditsi tsa bophelo bo botle ho ka fumana ho hlahlojwa le ho alafuwa sa le nako..     Koduwa ya Tameneng ya East London.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi inikwe ingxelo malunga nezintsha ngokunwenwa kwesifo se-Monkeypox kweli lizwe emva kokufunyanwa komntu wesibini onesi sifo kweli lizwe.

src_text: Koduwa hlahileng Tameneng ya Enyobeni, East London mane Kapa Botjhabela, ka la 26 Phuptjane 2022, eo ho yona ho ileng ha hlokahala batjha ba 21 ile ya tshosa naha ka bophara.
tgt_text: Aba bantu bafunywenwe banesi sifo kungokunje bazivalele bodwa kumawabo kwaye kusalandelelwa kubo bonke abantu abadibene nabo ukukhangela ukuba ingaba bakhona na abanye abantu abosulelwe sesi sifo.

src_text: Re ipotsa hore be malapa bona ikutlwa jwang ka ho lahlehelwa ke bana ba ona koduweng kang eo..     Kabinete fetisetsa matshidiso yona ho malapa ohle lahlehetsweng ke beng ka bona mmoho le ho leboha bohle ba ileng ba bontsha moya wa botho ka ho tshehetsa malapa ao nakong eo ya tlokotsi..     Ke ntho ngongorehisang hore bana ba dilemong tsa bo 13 ba dumellwe ho kena dibakeng tseo ho nowang jwala ho tsona.
tgt_text: ISebe lezeMpilo kunye neZiko leSizwe leziFo ezoSulelayo (i-NICD) basebenzisana noMbutho wezeMpilo weHlabathi (i-WHO) ukujonga amathuba okunwenwa kwesi sifo kweli njengoko isitsho iMigaqo yezeMpilo yeHlabathi.

src_text: Re ipiletsa ho setjhaba hore le sona se nke karolo ho netefatsa hore bana ba rona ba bolokehile ka dinako tsohle..     Bana ba dilemo tse ka tlase ho tse 18 ha ba dumellwa ho kena ditameneng, dishibining, dibakeng tseo ho nwellwang ho tsona le tse rekisang jwala.
tgt_text: Intsholongwane ye-monkeypox ayosuleli lula, yosulela xa abantu bethe basondelelana kakhulu besenza izinto ezifana nokuphuzana, ukucofa-cofana okanye ukubamba-bambana amalungu omzimba anamaqhakuva esi sifo.

src_text: Ke tlolo ya molao ho batho bohle ba hwebang ka jwala ho se ikobele melao ena, mme hape ba tlameha le ho amohuwa dilaesense tsa bona tsa ho rekisa jwala..     Sephetho sa Kopano ya Baetapele ba Dinaha tse Supileng (G7).
tgt_text: Abantu abangenazimpawu ze-monkeypox abayisasazi le ntsholongwane..     IKhabhinethi icebisa abantu ababonakalisa iimpawu zomkhuhlane ezithi zilandelwe ngamaqhakuva angathi ngamadyunguza ukuba baye kwiziko lezempilo elikufutshane ukuze baxilongwe baze banyangwe.

src_text: Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ile nka karolo Kopanong ya Baetapele ba G7 neng tshwaretswe Bavaria, Jeremane, ka Mantaha wa la 27 Phuptjane.
tgt_text: Inyhikityha enyenzeke kwibhari yaseMonti.

src_text: Mopresidente ne menngwe kopanong ena ke Moetapele wa naha eo ho neng ho tshwaretswe kopano ena ho yona leng Motjhanselara Olaf Scholz.
tgt_text: Inyhikityha embi eyenzeke e-Enyobeni eMonti kwiphondo laseMpuma Koloni ngeCawe, umhla wama-26 kweyeSilimela 2022 apho kusweleke abantu abatsha abangama-21, ilishiye eli lizwe lidandathekile.

src_text: Kopanong ena, ho ne ho sekasekwa ditaba tse amang maemo lehodimo, motlakase, tsa bophelo bo botle, tlhahiso ya dijo boemong ba matjhaba le tekatekano ya bonng..     G7 ke tshebedisano ya mebuso le diforamo tsa dipolotiki dinaheng tse kang Khanada, Fora, Jeremane, Ithali, Japane, United Kingdom le Dinaha tse Kopaneng tsa Amerika     Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Ayinakulinganiswa intlungu azibona ekuyo la makhaya ashiywe ngabantwana bawo kabuhlungu kangaka..     IKhabhinethi ithi akuhlanga lungehliyo kwiintsapho eziphantsi kwelifu elimnyama kwaye ibulela wonke umntu othe wanikezela ngoncedo lwezentlalontle kwezi ntsapho zisentlungwini.

src_text: Moralo wa Tshebetso wa Lekala la tsa Molao (LSC).
tgt_text: Iyaxhalabisa into yokuba iimveku ezineminyaka eli-13 zivunyelwe ukuba zingene kule ndawo yentselo zize zivunyelwe nokuba zisele utywala.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Moralo wa LSC bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.
tgt_text: Sicela uluntu ukuba nalo luncedise ludlale indima yalo ngokuthi luqinisekise ukuba abantwana bakhuselekile ngalo lonke ixesha..     Abantwana abaneminyaka engaphantsi kwe-18 abavumelekanga ukuba bangene kwiithaveni, izimokolo, iipotsoyi zotywala nasezibharini.

src_text: Maikemisetso dipehelo tsena ke ho potlakisetsa ho etswa ha diphetolo lekaleng lena ho etsa hore kemedi ho lona be nepahetseng ho ya ka maemo setjhaba ka ho fapana.
tgt_text: Oosomashishini botywala abafunyaniswe besophula nawuphi na kule mithetho baza kubekwa ityala zize iilayisenisi zabo zotywala zithathwe.

src_text: Dipehelo tsena di tla thusa ho theha mokgatlo tla netefatsa hore lekala lena le ba le batho ba rupeletsweng ka botlalo ho fana ka ditshebeletso tsa molao..     Ho ngolwa ha moralo ona wa LSC ho ne ho okametswe ke Mokgatlo wa Basebeletsi ba Molao leng mokgatlo thehilweng ho latela Karolo ya 4 ya molao wa Legal Practice Act, 2014 (Molao wa bo 28 wa 2014) ka tlasa tataiso ya Leano la molao wa Tshehetso ya ba Batsho Moruong (B-BBEE) wa 2013 (Molao wa bo 46 wa 2013).
tgt_text: Iziphumo zeNgqungquthela yeeNkokeli zamaZwe aTyebileyo asi-7 (i-G7).

src_text: Molao wa B-BBEE wa 2013 neha Letona la Dikgwebo le Ditlhodisano matla ho etsa dipehelo mabapi le tshebetso nepahetseng ho tsa tshehetso ya ba batsho moruong makaleng itseng.
tgt_text: UMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa uthabathe inxaxheba kwiNgqungquthela yeeNkokheli ze-G7 ebibanjelwe e-Bavaria, e-Germany, ngomhla wama-27 kweyeSilimela.

src_text: Ha jwale, ba ditshebeletso tsa molao ha ba na dipehelo tseo ba sebeletsang hodima tsona ho tobana le mathata ho se lekalekane lekaleng lena la tsa molao..     Moralo ona wa LSC tla phatlalatswa Bukeng ya Diphatlalatso tsa Mmuso matsatsi 60 hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka ona..     Tlaleho ya Tshebetso ya Habedi ka Selemo.
tgt_text: UMongameli – othathe inxaxheba kwiintlanganiso ebezigwadla imiba enxulumene nemozulu, ezamandla, ezempilo, amaphulo okuqinisekiswa ukuba kukho ukutya okwaneleyo kwihlabathi kunye nolingwano ngokwesini – ebemenywe yiNgqonyela u-Olaf Scholz, ebinguye ebesingathe le Ngqungquthela.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana tlaleho ya tshebetso tswang habedi ka selemo ya ho tloha ka Mphalane 2021 ho isa ho Tlhakubele.
tgt_text: I-G7 liqumrhu lezopolitiko loorhulumene abahlukeneyo eliquka i-Canada, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, United Kingdom kunye ne-United States     Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Ditlaleho tsena ke karolo ya Leano la Meralo ya Nako ya Bohareng (MTSF) ho tloha ka selemo sa 2019 ho isa ho sa.
tgt_text: ImiGaqo eYilwayo yeCandelo lezoMthetho (i-LSC eYilwayo).

src_text: Leano lena la MTSF 2019-2024, ke moralo wa tshebetso oo ka ona ho boetseng ho ikemiseditsweng ho fihlela Leano la Naha la Ntshetsopele: Leano la Tjhebelo pele la selemo sa 2030 tla beng le nako ya puso ya botshelela..     Ditlaleho tsena di shebile haholo maikemisetso ao mmuso a behileng pele leng (1) Diphetoho moruong le thehong ya menyetla ya mesebetsi; (2) Tsa thuto, thupello, le tsa bophelo bo botle; (3) Leano la tshehetso ya setjhaba ka ho fana ka ditshebeletso tsa boleng ka tsela otlolohileng; (4) Tsa bodulo ba setjhaba le tsa bommasepala; (5) Tshebedisano ya setjhaba mmoho le polokeho ya sona; (6) Theho ya mmuso nang le bokgoni le puso nang le toka; le (7) Ho theha maemo betere Afrika le matjhabeng mmoho le ho kenella ha puso ya botshelela..     Kabinete amohetse kgatelo pele dikarolong tse neng di hlwahilwe nakong ena ya ho lekola botjha.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba ipapashwe i-LSC eYilwayo ukuze uluntu luhlomle.

src_text: Kabinete boetse elelletswe le dikarolo tseo ho sa ntsa neng ho hlokahala ho kenellwa ho tsona ka lebaka la tieho bileng teng ka lebaka la sewa sa COVID-.
tgt_text: Iinjongo zale migaqo kukukhokela amaphulo okwenza iinguqu kwicandelo lezomthetho ukuze zonke iintlanga zeli lizwe zikwazi ukuthatha inxaxheba kulo ngokulinganayo.
Le migaqo iza kuqinisekisa nokuba kuswekwa iqumrhu eliza kuvelisa iingcali zezomthetho eziqeqeshwe zacokiswa futhi nezinezakhono ezigqibeleleyo.

src_text: Matona tla tshwara diboka tsa boraditaba dibekeng tse mmalwa tse tlang ho hlalosa ha batsi ka ditlaleho tsa ona le ho hlalosa dikarolong tseo ho hlokahalang hore ho sebetswe ka thatanyana ho tsona     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.
tgt_text: Inkqubo yokuqulunqa le-LSC iYilwayo ibikhokelwa liBhunga leCandelo lezoMthetho, eliliqumrhu elisemthethweni elisekwe ngokweCandelo 4 loMthetho weCandelo lezoMthetho, wowama-2014 (uMthetho uNombl 28 wowama-2014) likhokelwa nguMthetho woPhuhliso oluBanzi lwabaMnyama ngezoQoqosho (i-B-BBEE), wowama-2013 (uMthetho uNombl 46 wowama-2013).

src_text: Seboka sa Boradiindasteri ba Batsho le Barekisi Dinaheng tsa Matjhaba (BIEC).
tgt_text: UMthetho we-B-BBEE wowama-2013 ugunyazisa uMphathiswa wezoRhwebo, uShishino noKhuphiswano ukuba akhuphe imigaqo yokuziphatha ngokufanelekileyo ngokumayelana nokuphuhliswa kwabamnyama ngezoqoqosho kumacandelo athile.

src_text: Seboka sa pele sa BIEC se tla tshwarelwa Sandton International Convention Centre, Lejweleputswa ka Laboraro la la 20 Phupu.
tgt_text: Amalungu ecandelo lezomthetho kungokunje awanayo imigaqo yokuziphatha yecandelo ezakuwakhokhela kumalinge okulungisa nokungalingani nokungaxhamli ngokulinganayo kwicandelo lezomthetho.
I-LSC eYilwayo iza kupapashwa kwiGazethi kaRhulumente iintsuku ezingama-60 ukwenzela ukuba uluntu luhlomle..     Iingxelo zonyaka-mbini zenkqubo yomsebenzi.

src_text: Seboka sena se tla ka mora tlhomamiso ya Marangrang Thekiso Matjhabeng ke mmuso bakeng sa Boradiindasteri ba Batsho ka maikemisetso ho ba thusa ho kena mmarakeng meng, le ho fumana ditsela tsa ho fumana ditshehetso tsa ditjhelete le mekgwa ya ho bapatsa     Melaetsa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izivumile iingxelo zikanyaka-mbini zenkqubo yomsebenzi zesithuba esisuka kwinyanga yeDwarha yowama-2021 ukuya kweyoKwindla wowama-.

src_text: DitebohoKabinete lebisa diteboho le ditakaletso tse ntle ho: Sehlopha sa Springboks, ka tlholo ya sona papading ya sona le naha ya Wales papading ya sona ya pele ya tse tharo tsa diteko Lebaleng la Loftus Versveld, Tshwane, ka Moqebelo wa la 2 Phupu.
tgt_text: Ezi ngxelo ziyinxalenye yesiCwangciso-sikhokelo esiQiqisiweyo saPhakathi koNyaka (i-MTSF) sowama-2019-.

src_text: Banyana Banyana, ka tlholo ya bona ya 2-1 ka Montaha wa la 4 Phupu 2022 kgahlano le naha ya Nigeria papading ya bona ya pele Tonamenteng ya Basadi ya Dinaha tsa Afrika tshwaretsweng naheng ya Morokho     Khiro    Pele batho bohle ba hirwa, ho tla hlahlobisiswa mangolo bona thuto le mang hlokahalang.
tgt_text: I-MTSF yowama-2024 sisicwangciso sokuphumeza kunye nesikhokelo sokuhlola ukuze kufezekiswe izinto ezikhokeliswe phambili zalo mbuso uthathe iintambo zolawulo ngowama-2018 zesiCwanciso soPhuhliso seSizwe (i-NDP): uMbono wama-..     Ezi ngxelo zigxininisa kwimiba ephambili esixhenxe karhulumente, eyile (1) iiNguqu kwezoQoqosho nokudalwa kwemisebenzi; (2) ezeMfundo, izakhono nezempilo; (3) Ukuhlawulwa kwezibonelelo-mali zentlalo ngokuthi kusetyenziswa iinkonzo ezisisiseko ezisemgangathweni nezithembekileyo; (4) Ukuhlaliswa kwabantu abahlukeneyo endaweni enye, ukuhlaliswa koluntu kunye norhulumente wengingqi; (5) Ukuhlalisana ngoxolo kweentlanga ezahlukeneyo nokhuseleko loluntu; (6) umbuso onezakhono, othembekileyo nokhokelisa phambili uphuhliso; kunye (7) ne-Afrika kunye nehlabathi elingcono, kunye namanye amanyathelo okungenelela alo mbuso wathatha imikhala yolawulo ngowama-..     IKhabhinethi iyayibulela inkqubela eyenziwe kwezo ndawo zithile ngokweenjongo ebezibekiwe zeli xesha kubhekiswa kulo.

src_text: Ngaka Nyameko Barney Pityana kgethetswe ho ba Modulasetulo wa Komeshene ya Naha ya Diloto..     Moatevokate Rory Voller kgethetswe ho ba Mokomeshenara wa Komeshene ya Ngodiso ya Dikhamphani le Dihlahiswa tsa Mahlale.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivile nangendawo ezifuna ukuba kungenelelwe ukuze kulungiswe ezi zinto zibangele ulibaziseko ebeziphazanyiswe ngubhubhane we-COVID-..     AbaPhathiswa baza kubamba iindibano noonondaba ukuba banikwe iinkcukacha ezigcweleyo ngeengxelo zabo bacacise nezo ndawo zifuna ukuba kungenelelwe     Umsitho ozayo.

src_text: Motlase.
tgt_text: Energy.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse taba ya ho kenella ha mmuso mathateng motlakase naheng ena.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the interventions introduced by government to address the country’s energy crisis.

src_text: Mehato ena betla tsela yang boitekong ba ho fedisa ho kgaolwa ha motlakase ka maikemisetso ho baballa, ho fetolwa ha lekala la motlakase le ho ba le tharollo ya nako telele tabeng ya motlakase..   Ho kenya letsoho ho fokotseng mathata phepelo ya motlakase naheng ena, re tlameha ho fokotsa tshebediso ya ona ka megawatts tse 600 naheng ka bophara dikgweding tsena tse tharo tse tlang..   Malapa le ona ka nka karolo ho fokotseng hona ha tshebediso ya motlakase ka ho tima mabone sa hlokahaleng le disebediswa tse jang motlakase haholo nakong ya tshebediso phahameng ya motlakase.
tgt_text: The far-reaching measures pave the way to reduce load-shedding, transform the electricity sector and achieve long-term energy security.

src_text: Dikgwebo le tsona tlhahisong ya tsona di kgothaletswa ho sebedisa thekenoloji ya sejwale jwale ho leka ho fokotsa tshebediso matla ya motlakase..   Letsholo la Vulindlela.
tgt_text: In supporting the energy grid and helping our country through its constrained electricity supply, we need to reduce our nation’s energy consumption by 600 megawatts over the next three months..

src_text: Kabinete amohetse kgatelopele seng fihletswe tlasa Letsholo la Vulindlela ho leka ho fokotsa tshubuhlellano neng le teng lekaleng la motlakase, la tsa kgokahano, la metsi ha mmoho le la bohahlaudi ka maikemisetso ho aha moruo botjha..   Ho se ho tsoseleditswe botjha meralo ya motheo robong ho 26 mme 11 le yona bontsha kgatelopele.
tgt_text: Households can play their part in conserving energy by switching off all non-essential lighting and high-energy appliances during peak demand times.

src_text: Hara dikatleho tse seng di fihletswe re ka bala le ho nyollwa ha tekanyetso ya tlhahiso ya motlakase ke bahlahisi ba ikemetseng, ntlafatso ya Taolo ya Naha ya Boemakepe ba ha Transnet, ho lekolwa botjha ha letoto la mesebetsi bohlokwahadi, ho sebediswa ha mokgwa wa inthanete wa ho kenya kopo tsa Visa dinaheng tse 14, ho kenyeletsa le dibaka tse ntjha tse kgolo tsa bohahlaudi tse kang Tjhaena, Indiya, Kenya le Nigeria..   Ditlhekefetso tsa Bonng le ho Bolawa ha Basadi (GBVF).
tgt_text: Businesses are encouraged to adopt more energy-efficient production technology and participate in initiatives to reduce electricity demand..  Operation Vulindlela.

src_text: Kabinete halefisitswe ke ketso soto ya ho betwa ha basadi ba robedi mane Krugersdorp, Gauteng.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the progress made under Operation Vulindlela to clear bottlenecks across the energy, telecommunications, and water and tourism sectors to revive the economy.

src_text: Ketso tsena tse sehloho ha mmoho le ho hlekefetswa ha basadi di kgella fatshe mosebetsi wa setjhaba.
tgt_text: Nine out of the 26 structural reforms have been achieved, with 11 reforms making good progress.

src_text: Kabinete boetse thoholetsa Sepolesa sa Afrika Borwa ka ho potlaka ho tshwara babelaellwa diketsong tsena tsa bonokwane..   Kabinete ipiletsa ho setjhaba ho sebedisana le mekgatlo qobellang molao ka ho fana ka lesedi kapa hona ho tlaleha diketso tse belaetsang.
tgt_text: Successes include increasing the licensing threshold for embedded generation, the corporatisation of the Transnet National Ports Authority, release of the revised critical skills list and the implementation of the e-Visa system in 14 countries, including major new tourist markets such as China, India, Kenya and Nigeria..  Gender-based violence and femicide (GBVF).

src_text: Ha re sebedisana re ka fetola setjhaba sa rona ho ba dibaka tse bolokehileng bakeng sa bana le basadi.. tgt_text: The Bill proposes the amendment to seven Acts, namely (1) Associated Institutions Pension Fund Act, 1963 (Act 41 of 1963); (2) Military Pension Act,1976 (Act 84 of 1976); (3) Government Employees Pension Law of 1996; (4) Financial and Fiscal Commission Act,1997 (Act 99 of 1997); (5) Land and Agricultural Development Bank Act, 2002 (Act 15 of 2002); (6) Audit Profession Act 2005 (Act 26 of 2005) and  the (7) Auditing Profession Amendment Act 2021 (Act 5 of 2021).

src_text: Molao Laolang Tshebediso ya Dithethefatsi le ho Thibela Phapanyetsano seng Molaong ya tsona, wa 1992 (Molao wa bo 140 wa 1992) bolelang hore ke tlolo ya molao ho hlahisa dithethefatsi tse ngotsweng ho Shetjule ya Pele le ya Bobedi ya Molao ona..   Dintlafatso tsena di bolela ha Karolo ya bo 63 ya molao oo se molaong sa dumellane le molaotheo wa naha jwalo ka ha shetjule ya molao ona dumella Letona ho etsa diphetoho molaong ona ntle le ho latela tsela nepahetseng ya ketsa molao..    Ka 2020, Lekgotla la Molaotheo le ne le bolele ha Karolo ya bo 63 ya Molao Laolang Tshebediso ya Dithethefatsi le ho Thibela Phapanyetsano ya Tsona seng Molaong wa 1992 mme lekgotla la neha Palamente ho fihlela ka la 17 Tshitwe 2022 ho lokisa phoso eo.

tgt_text: In addition to clarifying the role of the Minister of Finance and on the auditing, the amendments also adjust the powers of the enforcement committee where an auditor admits guilt.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tlo tshwara Mohope wa Lefatshe wa Rugby Sevens wa 2022 mane Kapa ka la 9 le la 11 Lwetse.
tgt_text: The Bill was published for public comment in February.

src_text: Mohope ona tla be tshwarelwa lekgetlo la pele kontinenteng ya Afrika moo dihlopha tsa banna ba 24 le sa basadi ba 16 di tla beng di qothisana lehlokwa   Melaetsa.

DitebohoKabinete lebisa diteboho le ditakaletso tse ntle ho: ●  Banyana Banyana, ka ho etsa nalane ka ho hapela Afrika Borwa Mahope wa Pele wa Basadi wa Dinaha tsa Afrika (WAFCON), ka ho hlola naha ya Morokho papading ya makgaolakgang ka Moqebelo wa la 23 Phupu.
tgt_text: General Laws (Anti-Money Laundering and Combating Terrorism Financing) Amendment Bill of.

src_text: Tlholo ena ya bona ba kentse Mohopeng wa Lefatshe wa FIFA wa Basadi tla tshwarelwa naheng ya Australia le New Zealand ho tloha ka la 20 Phupu ho ya ho 20 Phato.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the General Laws (Anti-Money Laundering and Combating Terrorism Financing) Amendment Bill of 2022 to Parliament for further processing.

src_text: ●  Sehlopha sa Afrika Borwa, ka ho hapa dimetale tse 27 dipapading tse fapafapaneng Dipapading tsa Commonwealth mane Birmingham, Englane ho tloha ka la 28 Phupu ho ya ho 8 Phato.
tgt_text: The Bill is an omnibus Bill that amends the current Acts namely  Financial Intelligence Centre Act, 2001 (Act 38 of 2001); (ii) Nonprofit Organisation Act, 1997 (Act 71 of 1997); (iii) Trust Property Control Act, 1988 (Act 57 of 1988); (iv) Companies Act, 2008 (Act 71 of 2008) and  Financial Sector Regulations Act, 2017( Act 9 of 2017).

src_text: Sehlopha sena se ne se be maemong borobong ka metale tse supileng tsa kgauta, tse robong tsa silifera le tse 11 tsa bronze.
tgt_text: The amendments respond to the deficiencies identified during the peer review of the country conducted by the Financial Action Task Force (FATF).

src_text: ●  Sehlopha sa Basadi sa Springbok, ka ho hlola naha ya Spain Letotong la Dipapadi tsa Basadi tsa Mariha tse neng di bapalla Lebaleng la Emirates Airline Park, Johannesburg.●  Mme Ndavi Nokeri (23), ka ho ba Mmabotle wa Afrika Borwa wa.
tgt_text: The mutual evaluation report made 40 recommendations that would assist in getting South Africa to be aligned with international measures of combating money laundering and financing of terrorism..  South Africa was found to be lacking in 20 areas.

src_text: ●  Mme Ashleigh Buhai, ka ho hapa Dipapadi tsa 2022 tsa AIG Women’s Open mme ba mosadi wa boraro wa Afrika Borwa wa ho hapa kgau ya kgauta..   Matshidiso       Kabinete fetisetsa matshidiso yona ho lelapa le metswalle ya: ●   Tokollo “Magesh” Tshabalala (46), sebini le sengodi sa dipina ya neng tumi nakong eo ba neng ba theha sehlopha sa TKZee ka 1996 le metswalle ya hae mmedi..  Kgiro.
tgt_text: This Bill addresses about 14 of the areas identified.

src_text: Pele batho bohle ba hirwa, ho tla hlahlobisiswa mangolo bona thuto le mang hlokahalang.
tgt_text: South Africa has been member of FATF since.

src_text: Mme Zenkosi Dumile Mhlongo Motlatsi wa Molaodi Kakaretso (DDG): Karolong ya Dipatlisiso ka Melawana le Taolo Lefapheng la Mesebetsi ya Setjhaba le Meralo ya Motheo.

Ngaka Bongani Elias Sithole jwalo ka DDG: Sitsing sa Nala sa Taolo ya Dikoduwa Lefapheng la Puso ya Kopanelo..   Ntate Adam Mthombeni jwalo ka DDG: Dikamanong tsa Mafapha Mmuso Lefapheng la Mesebetsi ya Setjhaba le Meralo ya Motheo.
tgt_text: Drugs and Drug Trafficking Amendment Bill of.
Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Drugs and Drug Trafficking Amendment Bill of 2022 for further processing.

src_text: Kabinete dumellana le ho hirwa ha batho ba latelang:.
tgt_text: The Drugs and Drug Trafficking Act, 1992 (Act 140 of 1992) criminalises the manufacturing and supply of any substance included under the Schedule 1 and Schedule 2 of the Act..

src_text: Ngaka Zwanani Titus Mathe jwalo ka Motsamaiso ya ka Sehloohong Mokgatlong wa Ntshetsopele ya Eneji Afrika Borwa..   Ditho tsa nakwana tsa Mokgatlo wa Naha Laolang Taba tsa Motlakase Afrika Borwa: Ntate Thembani Bukula (Modulasetulo);Mme Zandile Mpungose (Motlatsi wa Modulasetulo); Mme Precious Sibiya;Mme Thembeka Semane; leNtate Fungai Sibanda kgethilwe hape)..   Modulasetulo le setho sa Moifo wa Boto ya Thekenoloji ya Dimenerale: Ngaka Thibedi Ramontja (Modulasetulo); leMoprofesara Lwazi Ngubevana..   Mme Cladie Thamo Hloniphile Mzobe jwalo ka Motsamaisi Moholo wa Sedika wa Mokgatlo wa Tshireletso wa Afrika Borwa wa KwaZulu-Natal.
tgt_text: The amendments address the invalidity of Section 63, which was found to be unconstitutional in respect of the Minister being provided with the rights to amend the schedules without the involvement of the legislative process.

src_text: Moruo.
tgt_text: Uqoqosho.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse taba ya ho fokotseha hanyane ha palo ya batho ba sa sebetseng naheng ena ka persente tse.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuhla kancinci kwezinga labantu abangaphangeliyo kweli lizwe, nelihle nge-.

src_text: 6, ho tloha ho persente tse.
tgt_text: 6%, lisuka kuma-.

src_text: 5 ho ya ho tse.
tgt_text: 5% kwikota yokuqala laya kutsho kuma-.

src_text: 9 ka kotara ya bobedi ya selemo sa.
tgt_text: 9% kwikota yesibini yowama-.

src_text: Ho ya ka dipalopalo tse phatlaladitsweng Tokomaneng ya Kotara ya Dipalopalo tsa Ditaba tsa Kgiro phatlaladitsweng ke Lefapha la Dipalopalo la Afrika Borwa, mesebetsi mengata fumanehile lekaleng la Ditshebeletso tsa Ntshetsopele ya Setjhaba (276 000), la tsa Kgwebo (169 000), la Ditjhelete (128 000) le la Kaho (104 000).
tgt_text: Amanani apapashwe kwiiNkcukacha-manani zoMzantsi Afrika zoPhando lweKota lwezaBasebenzi abonisa ukuba eyona nzuzo inkulu ibonakale kwiiNkonzo zoLuntu nezeNtlalo (276 000), kuRhwebo (169 000), kwezeMali (128 000) kunye nakuLwakhiwo (104 000).

src_text: Palo ya batho ba sebetsang ha jwale ke dimilione tse 15,6 kotareng ya bobedi ya selemo sa 2022 mme palo ya ba sa sebetseng yona eketsehile ka batho ba 132 000 ho ya ho ba dimilione di 8,0 ka kotara ya bobedi ya selemo sa 2022 ha ho bapiswa le kotara fetileng.
