tgt_text: Inani labantu abasebenzayo bebonke limi kwi-.

src_text: Keketseho ena le ha le nyane, empa bontsha kgatelo pele boitekong ba mmuso le mahlahana ona ba ho aha moruo botjha esitana le ho theha menyetla hlokahalang ya mesebetsi.
tgt_text: 6 lezigidi kwikota yesibini ka-2022, kwaye inani labantu abangasebenziyo linyuke nge-132 000 ukuya kwisi-.

src_text: Sena ke bopaki ba hore ha re tshwarisane, mme re sebetsa mmoho re ka hlola diphephetso tse shebaneng le moruo wa rona.
tgt_text: 0 sezigidi kwikota yesibini ka-2022 xa kuthelekiswa nekota yangaphambili.

src_text: Kabinete utlwisisa hantle pherekano maikutlong Maafrika Borwa jwalo ka ha hula ka thata ka lebaka la leqeme la mesebetsi le ditjeho tse hodimo tsa ho phela.
tgt_text: Ezi nzuzo zincinci kodwa zincomekayo zibonisa ukuba iinzame ezidityanelweyo zikarhulumente kunye namahlakani akhe kwezentlalo okukhulisa uqoqosho nokudala imisebenzi efuneka ngamandla ziyaqalisa ukuvelisa iziqhamo.

src_text: Jwalo ka mmuso hlokomelang, re ikemiseditse ka hohlehohle ho sebedisana le mahlahana rona ho aha bokamoso bo betere bakeng sa batho bohle.
tgt_text: Obu bubungqina bokuba xa sinosebenzisana sisonke sisebenzise amandla ethu ahlangeneyo, singayoyisa imingeni ejongene noqoqosho lwethu.

src_text: Mmuso ntse ikemiseditse ka taba ya ho tshehetsa dikgwebo tsa lapeng ka ho reka le ho sebedisa ditshebeletso tsa lapeng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyawuqonda umsindo wabemi boMzantsi Afrika njengoko besokola ukuqhubeka nobomi babo ngenxa yeendleko zokuphila kunye nentswela-ngqesho ephezulu.

src_text: Disebediswa tsa Setjhaba.
tgt_text: Njengorhulumente okhathalayo, sizimisele ukusebenzisana namahlakani ethu kwezentlalo ukwakha ingomso elingcono lomntu wonke.

src_text: Kabinete hanyetsana haholo le taba ya tshenyo ya disebediswa tsa setjhaba ke baahi ba Tongaat mane KwaZulu-Natal nakong ya boipelaetso ba bona ka lebaka la ho kgaoha ha phepelo ya metsi.
tgt_text: Urhulumente usazimisele ukuxhasa amashishini asekuhlaleni ngokuthenga iimpahla kunye neenkonzo zalapha ekhaya.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho setjhaba hore se be le mamello jwalo ka ha mosebetsi se qadile wa ho lokisa Sitsi se Hlwekisang Metsi sa moo Tongaat..  Kabinete utlwisisa hantle pherekano ya baahi jwalo ka ha ba tlameha ho sebedisa metsi tliswang ka dilori ka lebaka la tshenyo neng bakwe ke dikgohola botjheng ba selemo sena.
tgt_text: Iziseko zophuhliso zoluntu.

src_text: Leha ho le jwalo, meruso le ho senya disebediswa tsa setjhaba ha se tharollo, empa le ho eketsa mathata setjhabeng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikugxekile ukutshatyalaliswa kweziseko zophuhliso ngabahlali base-Tongaat KwaZulu-Natal ngexesha loqhankqalazo befuna amanzi.

src_text: Dintlafatso Molaong Laolang Tsela ya Tshebetso ya Bommasepala wa Selemo sa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ihlabe ikhwelo lokuzola kunye nomonde njengoko uqhuba umsebenzi wokubuyisela iMisebenzi yokuCocwa kwaManzi ase-Tongaat.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ho saenelwa ha Tshisinyo ya Dintlafatso Molaong Laolang Tsela ya Tshebetso ya Bommasepala wa Selemo sa 2022, (Molao wa bo 3 wa Selemo sa 2022) ho ba molao ka botlalo ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyawuqonda umsindo wabahlali ekuye kwafuneka ukuba basebenzise iitanki zamanzi ukusukela oko kwabakho izikhukula ebutsheni balo nyaka.

src_text: Ka molao ona, ho ikemiseditswe ho ntlafatsa maemo le boleng ba tshebetso ya bommasepala.
tgt_text: Nangona kunjalo, ubundlobongela kunye neziphithiphithi azisosisombululo, kwaye ukutshatyalaliswa kweziseko zophuhliso kulimaza kuphela uluntu.

src_text: Molao ona, ke karolo ya matsapa mmuso ho ntlafatsa maemo Phano ya Ditshebeletso tsa Setjhaba leng tokelo ya sona ngotsweng ho Molaotheo wa Afrika Borwa wa Selemo sa..  Molao ona hlakisa hantle le tsela tlamehang ho latelwa ha ho hirwa basebeletsi maemong hodimo boetse hape thibela basebeletsi ba mmuso ho ba ketapeleng ya mekga ya dipolotiki.
tgt_text: UMthetho oLungisiweyo kwiiNkqubo zikaMasipala kuRhulumente wamaKhaya wama-.

src_text: Molao ona hape dumella hore dikgeo tsa batsamaisi ba bommasepala di phatlalatswe boemong ba naha ho bebofatsa taba ya ho fumana batho ba nang le bokgoni bo hlokahalang.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iwamkele uMthetho oYilwayo weeNkqubo zooMasipala kuRhulumente wamaKhaya, wama-2022 (uMthetho 3 wama-2022) otyikityiweyo nguMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa.

src_text: Kabinete na le boitshepo ba hore diphetoho tsena di tla netefatsa hore ba kgethelwang kapa ba hirelwang dikgeong tseo, ba sebetsa ka tsela lebelletsweng le ho netefatsa hore re ntlafatsa maphelo batho bohle.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho ujolise ekuphuculeni amandla kunye nemigangatho yeendlela zokuziphatha zikarhulumente wamakhaya.

src_text: Bonokwane.
tgt_text: Lo mthetho uyinxalenye yamalinge karhulumente okwenza iNkonzo kaRhulumente yenziwe ngobuchule kwaye iqinisekise ukubonelela ngeenkonzo okuzinzileyo ebantwini, njengelungelo elisisiseko eliqulathwe kuMgaqo-siseko weRiphablikhi yoMzantsi Afrika we-..

src_text: Kabinete thoholetsa ba Ditshebeletso tsa Lekgetho Afrika Borwa ka ho kgona ho fumana sethethefatsi sa crystal meth sa boima ba 785kg, se ka bitsang dimilione tse   Sethethefatsi sena, se fumanwe mane Boemafofaneng ba Matjhaba ba OR Tambo ka Sontaha sa la 28 Phato.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uchaza iinkqubo emazilandelwe xa kuqeshwa kwizikhundla eziphezulu.

src_text: Ho fumaneha ha sethethefatsi sena, ho tla romela molaetsa ho dinokwane hore madiboho rona sebetsa ka thata ho lwantsha ditlolo tsa molao  Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Ngoku uthintela amagosa aphezulu karhulumente ekubeni abe nezikhundla zopolitiko kumaqela ezopolitiko.

src_text: Tlaleho ya Moifo wa Thuto Phahameng Mabapi le Dipatlisiso ka Meputso ya Baokamedi ba Diyunivesithi (CHE) le Basebeletsi ba Boemong ba Botsamaisi ho tsona Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Kananjalo kulo Mthetho ukhoyo, izithuba zoomanejala boomasipala ezingenabantu kulindeleke ukuba zipapashwe kuzwelonke ukutsala iqela elibanzi labagqatswa abafanelekileyo.

src_text: Kabinete ile ya hlajwa malotsana ka sephetho sa dipatlisiso ka CHE, tse neng di thakgolwe ke Letona la Thuto Phahameng, Saense le Mahlale, Ngaka, Blade Nzimande, ho hlahloba taba ya meputso le tsela ya tshebetso ya batsamaisi ba ka sehloohong diyunivesithing dilemong tse 15 tse fetileng, ho tloha ka selemo sa 2005 ho isa ho sa..  Dipatlisiso tsena, di ne di lekola taba ya tshebetso, katleho le ntshetsopele diyunivesithing kapa lekaleng la thuto phahameng naheng ena.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iqinisekile ukuba olu tshintsho luza kuqinisekisa ukuba abo banyuliweyo okanye abanyulwe kwezi zikhundla baya kukwazi ukuphumeza izithembiso zabo ukuze wonke umntu azuze ubomi obungcono.

src_text: Tlaleho ena le dikateng tsa yona di kenyeletsa le dikgothaletso tsa teng.
tgt_text: Ulwaphulo-mthetho.

src_text: Tse ding tsa dikgothaletso di kenyeletsa ho matlafatswa esitana le ho sebetsa ka tsela hlakileng mabapi le ditaba tsa meputso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi income amagosa eNkonzo yeRhafu yoMzantsi Afrika ngokuthimba i-785 kg ye-crystal meth enexabiso lasesitratweni lezigidi ezingama-R236 kwisikhululo seenqwelomoya i-OR Tambo International ngeCawe, umhla wama-28 kweyeThupha wama-.

src_text: Tse ding dikgothaletso di eletsa ho thehwa ha komiti ikemetseng tla shebana le taba ya meputso.
tgt_text: Ukubhaqwa kweziyobisi kuya kuthumela isilumkiso esicacileyo kumaqela abophuli-mthetho ukuba amazibuko ethu okungena kunye nawokuphuma akhuselwe kakuhle kwaye amagosa ethu asebenza nzima ukuphelisa naluphi na ulwaphulo-mthetho     Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Dikgothaletso tsena, di boetse di sisinya le hore ho be le ho matlafatswa mmoho le ho lekolwa ha tshebetso  ditsing tsa thuto phahameng.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yeBhunga leMfundo ePhakamileyo (i-CHE) ngoMvuzo weeSekela-Tshansela zeeYunivesithi kunye naBaphathi abaPhezulu abaLawulayo eMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Dipatlisiso tsena, di boetsa tsa lekola le ho fetana ha boholo ba ditsi tsena mme tsa boela tsa bapiswa le maemo matjhaba.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi inikwe amagqabantshintshi ngeziphumo zophando lwe-CHE olwagunyaziswa ngowama-2020 nguMphathiswa wezeMfundo ePhakamileyo, ezeNzululwazi kunye noKusungulwa Kwezinto Ezintsha, uGq Blade Nzimande, ukuze kuphononongwe amanqanaba emivuzo kunye neendlela zabaphathi beeyunivesithi kwisithuba seminyaka eli-15 ukusuka ngowama-2005 ukuya kutsho kowama-..     Uphando ibikukumisela uzinzo, ukusebenza kunye nophuhliso lweeyunivesithi okanye icandelo lemfundo ephakamileyo kweli lizwe.

src_text: Letona la Thuto Phahameng, Saense le Mahlale ho lebeletswe hore le buisane le ketapele ya diyunivesithi ka maikemisetso ho di ntshetsa pele.
tgt_text: Le ngxelo ichaza iziphumo eziphambili kunye nezindululo zokulungisa.

src_text: Ka morao ho moo, tlaleho ena tla phatlalatswa ho websaete ya Lefapha la Thuto Phahameng le Thupello: www.dhet.gov.za.
tgt_text: Izindululo ziphakamisa, phakathi kwezinye izinto, inkqubo yomvuzo eqinisiweyo kunye nephandle.

src_text: Ho Potlakiswa ha Diphetoho Dipatlisisong le Mokgweng wa ho Ruta Lekaleng la Thuto Phahameng.
tgt_text: Ukusekwa kwesigqeba sokujonga sangaphandle kwaye nesizimeleyo ukojonga inkqubo yokwenziwa kwezigqibo zemivuzo.

src_text: Kabinete tshehetsa dikgothaletso tsa dipatlisiso tse pedi tse neng di etswe ho ka eletsa ka tsela le mekgwa ka sebediswang ho potlakisa diphetoho dipatlisisong le mokgweng wa ho ruta ditsing tsa thuto phahameng.
tgt_text: Zikwaphakamisa nokuqiniswa kweenkqubo zovavanyo lomsebenzi kumaziko.

src_text: Tlaleho ya pele ne etswe ke Komiti Ikgethileng ya Matona neng fuputsa ka thibelo ya kgiro, tshebediso le katleho ya barutehi ba batho ba batsho Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Uphononongo lukwathathele ingqalelo ubungakanani bala maziko kwaye lwenza nokulinganisa lujonga kumazwe ngamazwe.

src_text: Tlaleho ya bobedi – neng ntshitswe ke Lefapha la Saense le Mahlale mmoho le Mokgatlo wa Naha wa Dipatlisiso – yona ne etswe ke Mokgatlo wa Diyunivesithi tsa Afrika Borwa leng mokgatlo emetseng diyunivesithi tse 26 tsa setjhaba naheng ena.
tgt_text: UMphathiswa weMfundo ePhakamileyo, iNzululwazi noKusungulwa Kwezinto Ezintsha kulindeleke ukuba axoxe ngale ngxelo neenkokeli zeyunivesithi njengenyathelo lokomeleza la maziko emfundo.

src_text: Ka bobedi ditlaleho tsena di kgothaletsa taba ya ho potlakiswa ha diphetoho dikarolong tse hlano leng tshebediso ya dirutehi; ho nka karolo ha basebeletsi ba diyunivesithi; mokgwa le tshebetso ya diyunivesithi; melawana le maano tshebetso, le kgaello ya disebediswa.
tgt_text: Ingxelo iya kuthi emva koko ipapashwe kwiwebhusayithi yeSebe leMfundo ePhakamileyo noQeqesho: www.dhet.gov.za..     INguqu eKhawulezayo yoPhando kunye neSakhono sokuFundisa kwiCandelo leMfundo ePhakamileyo.

src_text: Tumellano ya Matjhaba ho Tshebediso ya Dimela le Diphoofolo Tlhahisong ya Dijo le tsa Temo (the Treaty).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izixhasile izindululo zamaphononongo amabini awayegunyaziswe ukuba acebise ngamanyathelo aza kuthathwa ukuze kukhawuleziswe inguqu yophando kunye nesakhono sokufundisa kumaziko emfundo ephakamileyo.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa ha the Treaty Palamenteng bakeng sa tekolo.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yokuqala yenziwe liQela laBaphathiswa eliSebenzayo elaphanda ngemiqobo ethintela ukuqeshwa, ukugcinwa kunye nokuqhubela phambili kwezifundiswa ezimnyama zaseMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Sena se tla etsa hore Afrika Borwa be karolo ya Tumellano ena fanang ka tataiso ho dinaha tseo leng ditho mabapi le paballo le tshebediso ya nako telele ya dihlahiswa tsa dimela le diphoofolo dijong le ho tsa temo.
tgt_text: Ingxelo yesibini – egunyaziswe liSebe lezeNzululwazi noKusungulwa Kwezinto Ezintsha kunye neSiseko soPhando lweSizwe – yenziwe yi-Universities South Africa, iqumrhu elimele iiyunivesithi zoluntu ezingama-26 kweli lizwe.

src_text: Ho amohelwa ha Tumellano ena, ho tla matlafatsa boitlamo ba naha ena mabapi le paballo le tshebediso ya nako telele ya dihlahiswa tsa dimela le diphoofolo, mme ho tshehetswe le batho ba mahaeng.
tgt_text: Zombini ezi ngxelo zinikeze ngamacebo ongenelelo ukuze kukhawuleziswe inguqu kwimimandla emihlanu ebanzi, esebefumene isidanga sokuqala; ukuthatha inxaxheba kwabasebenzi; inkcubeko kunye nokusebenza kweziko; umgaqo-nkqubo nesicwangciso, kunye nezibonelelo ezingqongopheleyo..     ISivumelwano saMazwe ngaMazwe ngeMithombo Yemfuza yeZityalo zoKutya kunye nezoLimo (iSivumelwano).

src_text: Moralo wa Leano la Diphetoho Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa kweSivumelwano ePalamente.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho kengwa tshebetsong ha Moralo wa Leano la Diphetoho.
tgt_text: Oku kuya kwenza ukuba uMzantsi Afrika ube yinxalenye yamaqela esi Sivumelwano, nesikhokela amazwe angamalungu ekulondolozeni kunye nasekuqinisekiseni usetyenziso oluzinzileyo lwemithombo yemfuza yezityalo ekutyeni nakwezolimo.

src_text: Moralo ona hlakisa ponelopele ka Afrika Borwa nang le Maemo Lehodimo Tsitsitseng.
tgt_text: Ukungena kwesi siVumelwano kuya komeleza ukuzibophelela kwelizwe ngokubhekiselele kulondolozo kunye nokusetyenziswa ngokuzinzileyo kwemithombo yemfuza yezityalo, kwaye sinike inkxaso kuluntu lwasemaphandleni.

src_text: Moralo ona hlalosa tsela le mekgwa ya ho fihlela sena.
tgt_text: ISicwangciso-nkqubo seNguqu eluLungileyo soMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Moralo ona tla ama motho ohle Afrika Borwa fane le ka menyetla ya ho lokisa ho se lekalekane ha nako fetileng le ho aha moruo tla tswela bohle molemo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivume iSicwangciso-nkqubo seNguqu eluLungileyo ukuba iphunyezwe.

src_text: Komeshene ya Mopresidente ya Maemo Lehodimo buisane le mahlahana yona mme ya fumana tshehetso kgolo ka moralo ona.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-nkqubo sibonisa umbono okwabelwana ngawo woMzantsi Afrika olinganayo, nokwaziyo ukumelana nemozulu.

src_text: Kabinete ka netefatsa taba ya hore moralo ona wa ho fihlela tikoloho moya hlwekileng ka selemo sa 2050 tlameha ho tshehetsa moruo le ntshetsopele ya naha ho kenyeletsa menyetla ya mesebetsi ho bohle, tshebedisano le setjhaba le phediso ya bofuma.
tgt_text: Sichaza imigaqo kunye neendawo kumgaqo-nkqubo zokuphumeza oku.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho mahlahana yona ohle hore tshehetse moralo ona.
tgt_text: Isicwangciso-nkqubo senguqu siza kuchaphazela wonke umntu waseMzantsi Afrika, sinike ithuba lokulungisa ukungalingani okwenziwa yimbali kwaye sidale uqoqosho oluxhamlisa wonke umntu.

src_text: Ho tla ralwa tsela eo moralo ona tlang ho kengwa tshebetsong ka yona mme tla kenyelletswa moralong wa maano le kabo ya ditjhelete tsa mmuso.
tgt_text: IKomishoni kaMongameli yeMozulu iqhube inkqubo yothethathethwano ebanzi kunye namahlakani ezentlalo yaze yafumana inkxaso ebanzi ngesi sicwangciso-nkqubo.

src_text: Mofuta Motjha wa Lengolo la Afrika Borwa la ho Kganna.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iqinisekisile ukuba inguqu eya kuqoqosho olungenayo ikhabhoni ngowama-2050 kufuneka ixhase iminqweno yophuhliso lwesizwe, kuqukwe imisebenzi endilisekileyo kumntu wonke, ubandakanyo lwentlalo kunye nokupheliswa kwentlupheko.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho fetolwa ha mofuta sebetsang ha jwale wa lengolo la ho kganna ho ya ho le nang le dikarolo tse ntjha tsa tshireletso.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ihlabe ikhwelo kuwo onke amahlakani ezentlalo ukuba axhase aze amkele esi sicwangciso-nkqubo.

src_text: Mofuta ona sebediswang ha jwale, haesale le tshebetsong ho tloha ka selemo sa.
tgt_text: Isicwangciso esineenkcukacha zokuphumeza esi sicwangciso-nkqubo siya kuphuhliswa, kwaye sidityaniswe kwinkqubo yocwangciso kunye neyohlahlo lwabiwo-mali karhulumente.

src_text: Maemo thekenoloji fetohile haholo matsatsing ana mme ho bitsa tjhelete ngata ho tswela pele le mofuta ona.
tgt_text: Ikhadi elitsha leLayisenisi yokuQhuba yoMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Mofuta motjha wa karete tsamaisana le Maemo Matjhaba Mangolo ho Kganna le Thekenoloji ya Poloko ya Dintlha tsa Batho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivume ukutshintshwa kweKhadi leLayisensi yokuQhuba elikhoyo ngoku lize lifakwe kwelinye elineempawu ezikhuselekileyo.
Le nkqubo yangoku oko yayisebenza ukusukela ngo-.

src_text: Melawana ya Leano la Mmuso la Tshehetso ya Setjhaba (EPWP).
tgt_text: Ubuchwephesha ukusukela ngoko sebatshintsha kwaye kuya kuxabisa kakhulu ukugcina iziseko zophuhliso ezikhoyo .

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha moralo wa EPWP bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.
tgt_text: Ikhadi elitsha elicetywayo liya kwenza ilayisenisi yokuqhuba yeli lizwe ihambelane ne-International Information Technology Personal Identification Compliant Driving License (i-ISO18013).

src_text: Leano lena la EPWP, ke leo ka lona mmuso thusang setjhaba ho leleka bofuma ka ho theha mesebetsi ya nakwana, haholo bakeng sa basadi le batjha.
tgt_text: UMgaqo-nkqubo weNkqubo eYandisiweyo yeMisebenzi kaRhulumente (i-EPWP).

src_text: Moralo ona motjha tla hlakisa dintho tse ngata tse kang meputso, tshehetso tsa ditjhelete, tshireletso ya setjhaba le hore leano lena le ipapise le melao ya tsa kgiro.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa kwiphephandaba likarhulumente loMgaqo-nkqubo oyilwayo we-EPWP ukuze uluntu lubonisane ngawo.

src_text: Le tla boela le kgothaletsa le tshebedisano mmoho pakeng tsa mmuso le lekala le ikemetseng ho ka netefatsa hore lenaneo lena la EPWP le thusa ho theha mesebetsi ya moshwelella le ho leleka bofuma.
tgt_text: I-EPWP yenye yeenkqubo eziphambili zikarhulumente ezijolise ekuboneleleni ukuthomalalisa intlupheko kunye nokuzisa ingeniso ngokudala amathuba emisebenzi ethutyana, ingakumbi kulutsha kunye nabasetyhini.

src_text: Moralo ona tla hlaha ka mahlale ho kenya lenaneo lena la mesebetsi ya setjhaba tshebetsong naheng ka bophara.
tgt_text: Uyilo lomgaqo-nkqubo omtsha luza komeleza le nkqubo kwaye lunike ingcaciso kwimiba efana nemivuzo, imodeli yenkxaso-mali kunye nokhuseleko loluntu, kwaye lulungelelanise i-EPWP neendlela zokusebenza zale mihla.

src_text: Diphetoho Mofuteng wa Bone wa Tjhelete ya Tshepe Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Luza kukhuthaza intsebenziswano phakathi kukarhulumente kunye necandelo labucala ukuqinisekisa ukuba i-EPWP inegalelo elikhulu ekudalweni kwemisebenzi endilisekileyo kunye nokuphelisa intlupheko.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana tlhahisong ya Mofuta Motjha wa Tjhelete ya Tshepe Afrika Borwa ho tloha ka selemo sa tjhaetse monwana ho tjhentjhisana ha tshebediso ya dipuo tse molao tjheleteng ena jwalo ka selemo.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uza kukhuthaza ukusungulwa kwezinto ezintsha ekuphunyezweni kweenkqubo zemisebenzi yoluntu kwilizwe liphela.

src_text: Lentswe lena “Afrika Borwa” le tla hlahella lehlakoreng le le leng la tjhelete mme ho tjhentjhanywe dipuo tsohle tse molaong.
tgt_text: Izilungiso kuLuhlu lweSine kwiMali eziNkozo zaseMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Ho R5, ho tla sebediswa puo tse tharo; ho R2; 50c, 20c le 10c ho sebediswe puo tse pedi mme ho R1 ho sebediswe puo le nngwe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iwamkele umyinge, uyilo kunye noqulunqo lonyaka wama-2023 lweSine kwiMali eziNkozo zoMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Dipuo tsena di tla nne di tjhentjhane jwalo ka selemo dilemong tsena tse leshome tse tlang.
tgt_text: Ivume inkqubo ejikelezayo qho ngonyaka yokusetyenziswa kweelwimi ezisemthethweni kuluhlu lwesine lweemali ezinkozo.

src_text: Moralo wa Molawana wa Tlhwekiso ya Metsi (IWQM) wa Selemo sa.
tgt_text: Igama elithi “uMzantsi Afrika” liya kufakwa kwelinye icala kwimali eyinkozo ze libhalwe ngazo zonke iilwimi ezisemthethweni.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Moralo wa IWQM bukaneng ya diphatlalatso tsa mmuso bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.
tgt_text: Iilwimi ezintathu ziya kusetyenziswa kwi-R5; iilwimi ezimbini kwi-R2; i-50c, i-20c, i-10c kunye ne-R1 ziya kuba ngolwimi olunye.

src_text: Moralo ona tla kena sebakeng sa wa kgale wa WQM wa selemo sa 1991 neng kengwe tshebetsong ka selemo sa..  Molawana ona hlakisa dintlha tsa bohlokwa tsamaisong ya tlhwekiso ya metsi.
tgt_text: Zonke ezi lwimi ziya kusetyenziswa ngendlela ejikeleziswayo rhoqo ngonyaka kule minyaka ili-10 izayo.

src_text: Moralo ona tsamaisana le melao yohle ya naha laolang metsi mme ntse ikamahantse le boinehelo ba naha ba ho nka metsi jwalo ka sehlahiswa se sa atang.
tgt_text: UMgaqo-nkqubo oYilwayo oDityanisiweyo woLawulo loMgangatho waManzi (i-IWQM) wowama-.

src_text: Moralo wa Molawana Laolang Maqhubu Diyalemoya Bakeng sa Nako Tlang.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa kwiphephandaba likarhulumente koMgaqo-nkqubo oYilwayo we-IWQM ukuze uluntu lubonisane.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Moralo wa Molawana Laolang Maqhubu Diyalemoya bakeng sa Nako Tlang bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo ucetywayo uya kuthatha indawo yoMgaqo-nkqubo we-WQM ophelelwe lixesha wama-1991 kunye nesicwangciso-qhinga sawo esamiselwa ngo-..

src_text: Maqhubu kgaso ya diyalemoya, ke bohlokwa ho tsa kgokahano le tshebedisong ya dijithale Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uchaza uluhlu lwemigaqo eya kuba sisiseko solawulo lomgangatho wamanzi.

src_text: Molawana ona tla hlakisa taba ya ho fana ka dilaesense bakeng sa diselefounu; kgaso; tshebeletso tsa difofane le tsa dikepe; tsa dipatlisiso le ntshetsopele; tshebedisano le setjhaba ha mmoho le diindasteri tse ding tse amehang.
tgt_text: Uzobonelela ngolungelelwaniso kuyo yonke imithetho efanelekileyo enxulumene namanzi kunye nezibophelelo zelizwe ekuboneleleni nasekulondolozweni kwamanzi njengomthombo onqabileyo.

src_text: Molawana ona tla netefatsa tshebetso hlokang leemo kabong ya dilaesense lekaleng lena ha mmoho le ho netefatsa hore bohle ba fumana kgokahano ntle ka mokgwa wa dijithale le dibakeng tse dikoting naheng ena.
tgt_text: Uyilo loMgaqo-nkqubo weSizukulwana esiLandelayo seTeknoloji yezoNxibelelwano eSebenza ngaMaza oMoya.

src_text: Kemedi ya Afrika Borwa ho Boto ya Matjhaba ya Moifo wa Taolo ho tsa Kgokahano ya Diyalemoya (ITU).
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa koyilo loMgaqo-nkqubo weSizukulwana esiLandelayo soMgaqo-nkqubo seTeknoloji yezoNxibelelwano eSebenza ngaMaza oMoya ukuze uluntu luhlomle.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho kgethwa ha Ntate Mandla Samuel Mchunu ho ya emela Afrika Borwa ho ITU (Region .
tgt_text: Iteknoloji yezonxibelelwano esebenza ngamaza omoya sisixhobo sendalo esibalulekileyo kuhlumo loqoqosho lwedijithali yoMzantsi Afrika kunye nakwisiseko sonxibelelwano.

src_text: Ha jwale Ntate Mchunu ke setho sa boto ena.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo ucetywayo ujonge ukuxhasa ulwabiwo lwamaza omoya kunye nokukhutshwa kweelayisenisi ezisisigxina zeselula; zosasazo; zenqwelomoya nezaselwandle; zophando nophuhliso; zokufikelela koluntu, kunye nezamanye amashishini afanelekileyo.

src_text: Ho sisintswe hore boele kgethelwe ho sebetsa teng hape ho tloha ka semo sa 2023 ho isa ho sa..  Dikgetho di tla tshwarelwa Sebokeng sa ITU sa Kemedi tsa Dinaha se tla ba mane Bucharest, Romania ho tloha ka la 26 Lwetse ho isa ka la 14 Mphalane.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo ukwajonge ukukhuthaza ulingano kunye nolwabiwo olungenamkhethe ukuze lwenze igalelo kwinguqu yeli candelo kunye nakufikeleleka kuqhagamshelwano lwedijithali nakwiindawo ezikude zelizwe.

src_text: Afrika Borwa ikemiseditse ho ikamahanya le dipehelo tsa ITU ho netefatsa hore kgokahanyo finyella diqoleng tsohle tsa lefatshe ka mokgwa wa dijithale .
tgt_text: Umgqatswa woMzantsi Afrika weManyano yoNxibelelwano lweZizwe ngeZizwe (i-ITU) kunye neBhodi yoLawulo kaNomathotholo .

src_text: Kgwedi ya Botjhaba.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi imamkele umgqatswa woMzantsi Afrika uMnu Mandla Samuel Mchunu kwiBhodi yeMimiselo kaNomathotholo (kwiNgingqi  ye-ITU.

src_text: Selemong sena Kgwedi ya Botjhaba leng ya Lwetse re tla keteka tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Re Hopola Lefa la Solomon Linda le Mmino wa Setso sa Afrika Borwa”.
tgt_text: UMnu Mchunu ulilungu lebhodi esebenzayo ngoku.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho Maafrika Borwa kaofela ho keteka Botjhaba ba rona ka ho fapana ha rona empa re ntse re le setjhaba se le seng se bopahaneng.
tgt_text: Kwaye kucetywa ukuba aphinde onyulwe kwiBhunga ye-ITU kwixesha lowama-2023 ukuya kowama-..     Unyulo luya kuqhubeka ngexesha leNkomfa yoNozakuzaku ye-ITU eya kubanjelwa e-Bucharest, e-Romania ukusuka ngomhla wama-26 kweyoMsintsi ukuya kowe-14 kweyeDwarha.

src_text: Re tlameha ho sebetsa mmoho re tshwarane ho fedisa dikarohano le dipherekano tsa nako  fetileng mme re be setjhaba se le seng se motlotlo ka Afrika Borwa  Melaetsa.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika usazibophelele kwiinjongo ze-ITU zokuvala ukwahlukana kwedijithali kunye nokudibanisa bonke abantu behlabathi     Imisitho ezayo.

src_text: DitebohoKabinete lebisa diteboho le ditakaletso tse ntle ho:Bahlodi bohle, ba fumaneng dimetale le bohle ba nkileng karolo lebelong la bo 95 la Comrades tummeng ka hore ke “Lebelo Botho la ho Hlola Kaofela”, le neng le mathwa ka la 28 Phato.
tgt_text: INyanga yaMafa.

src_text: Mokgahlelong wa banna mohlodi bile Tete Dijana (ka nako ya dihora tse 5, metsotso 30 le metsotswana 38).
tgt_text: INyanga yaMafa kweyoMsintsi iza kukhunjulwa phantsi komxholo othi: “UkuBhiyozela ilifa lika-Solomon Linda kunye noMculo weMveli waseMzantsi Afrika”.

src_text: Mohlodi enwa tswa Mahikeng profensing ya Leboya Bophirima.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibongoza bonke abemi boMzantsi Afrika ukuba basebenzise iNyanga yaMafa ukubhiyozela inkcubeko yethu etyebileyo kunye neyantlukwano enamandla okumanya isizwe sethu.

src_text: Mokgahlelong wa basadi teng mohlodi bile Alexandra Morozova ho tswa naheng ya Rashia (ka nako ya dihora tse 6, metsotso 17 le metsotswana 47).
tgt_text: Sonke kufuneka sizibophelele ekusebenzeni kunye nokuphelisa iyantlukwano nokungabikho kobulungisa obenzeka kwixesha eladlulayo kwaye sikhuthaze ukuzingca ngokuba ngummi waseMzantsi Afrika     Imiyalezo.

src_text: MatshidisoKabinete lebisa matshidiso yona ho lelapa le metswalle ya:Mme Rita Alice Ndzanga (88), eo neng le molwanedi wa tsa tokoloho le ditokelo tsa basebetsi ya neng fumane Kgau ya National Order of Luthuli ka selemo sa 2004 ka “Kabelo ya hae ho lwaneleng ditokelo tsa basebetsi le tsa Afrika Borwa sa kgetholleng ka morabe le bonng.”Ditho tse hlano tsa Sepolesa sa Afrika Borwa (SAPS) tse ileng tsa swahlamana le sefofane Boemafofaneng ba Rand, Germiston, ka Labobedi la la 30 Phato.
tgt_text: Uvuyiswano    IKhabhinethi idlulise amazwi ombulelo kunye neminqweno emihle kwaba balandelayo:Bonke abaphumeleleyo, abaphumelele imbasa kunye nabakhuphisanayo abathathe inxaxheba kumdyarho we-Comrades wama-95, owaziwa njenge “Ultimate Human Race”, ngeCawe, umhla wama-28 kweyeThupha.

src_text: SAPS ntse fuputsa sesosa sa kotsi ena.
tgt_text: Ugqatso lwamadoda lwaphunyelelwa ngu-Tete Dijana (kwiiyure ezi-5, imizuzu engama-30, imizuzwana engama-38) osuka e-Mahikeng, eMntla Ntshona ngelixa imbaleki yase-Russia u-Alexandra Morozova (kwiiyure ezi-6, imizuzu eli-17, imizuzwana engama-47) ephumelele ugqatso lwabasetyhini.

src_text: Kabinete lakaletsa mofofisi wa teng ya lemetseng haholo ho fola ka potlako  Kgiro.
tgt_text: Amazwi Ovelwano      IKhabhinethi ivakalise amazwi ovelwano kusapho nezihlobo zika:Mama Rita Alice Ndzanga (88), igqala loMzabalazo nokwanguvulindlela wemanyano yabasebenzi owafumana imbasa ye-National Order of Luthuli ngowama-2004 “ngegalelo lakhe kumzabalazo wamalungelo abasebenzi kunye nasekufezekiseni uMzantsi Afrika ongenabuhlanga, ongacaluli ngokwesini, okhululekileyo nonentando yesininzi”.Amagosa amahlanu eNkonzo yesiPolisa yaseMzantsi Afrika (i-SAPS) ebekhwele kwinqwelo-moya ye-SAPS eye yantlitheka kwisikhululo seenqwelo-moya i-Rand Airport, e-Germiston ngoLwesibini, umhla wama-30 kweyeThupha.

src_text: Pele batho bohle ba hirwa, ho tla hlahlobisiswa mangolo bona thuto le mang hlokahalang  Mme Gugulethu Abigail Thimane jwalo ka Motlatsi wa Molaodi Kakaretso (DDG): ba keng sa Tekolo le Ntshetsopele Lefapheng la Meralo, Tekolo le Tekolobotjha  Mme Kwena Komape jwalo ka DDG: Ntshetsopele ya Moruo, tsa Kgwebo le Dipapatso Lefapheng la tsa Temo, Ditaba tsa Mobu le Ntshetsopele ya Dibaka tsa Mahaeng  Ngaka Bongani Elias Sithole jwalo ka DDG: Ofising ya Naha ya Taolo ya Dikoduwa Lefapheng la Puso ya Kopanelo.
tgt_text: I-SAPS iyaphanda ngale ngozi.

src_text: Motlakase.
tgt_text: Amandla ombane.

src_text: Kabinete ile ya fumana tlaleho ho tswa ho Letona la Dikgwebo tsa Mmuso Pravin Gordhan ka mekgwa eo Eskom tlang ho sebedisa ho lwantshana le ho tingwa ha motlakase ka sepheo sa ho baballa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi inikwe ingxelo emfutshane nguMphathiswa wamaShishini kaRhulumente u-Pravin Gordhan malunga namandla ka-Eskom okunciphisa ukucinywa kombane okwethutyana kwaye ikwafumene nengxelo yenkqubela-phambili evela kwiKomiti yobuGcisa yeKomiti yeSizwe yeNgxaki yezaMandla.

src_text: Kabinete boetse hape ya fumana le tlaleho ya kgatelo pele mosebetsing wa Komiti ya Naha Shebaneng le Mathata Motlakase..     Ha ditlaleho tsena ka bobedi di se di sekasekilwe ho tla ba teng phatlalatso tla etswa..     Kabinete ikwahlaya haholo ka ditshitiso tse bakwang ke ho tingwa hona ha motlakase dikgwebong le malapeng, haholoholo nakong eo mmuso kenyang tshebetsong matsapa neng phatlalatswe ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ka Phupu.

tgt_text: Ezinye izibhengezo ziza kwenziwa emva kokuqukunjelwa kweengxoxo ezinzulu zezi ngxelo.

src_text: Matsete.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivakalise ukudana ngokuphazamiseka kunye nengxaki ebangelwe kukucima kombane koosomashishini nakumakhaya, ingakumbi okwenzeka ngeli xesha urhulumente eqalisa ukusebenza kwizithembiso ezazenziwe  nguMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa kweyeKhala yowama-.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ho thakgolwa ha Sitsi se setjha sa Tlhahiso sa Sandvik Khomanani mane Kempton Park, seo bileng karolo ya ditshepiso tse neng di etswe Sebokeng sa bone sa Matsete sa Afrika Borwa (SAIC) se neng se tshwaretswe Sandton Convention Centre ka la 24 Tlhakubele 2022 sa dimilione tse  .
Sitsi sena se setjha se bobatsi ba 62 000m², se kopantse tshebetso ya ditsi tse hlano tse neng di sebeletsa mona nakong fetileng mme se hirile batho ba ka bang.
tgt_text: Utyalo-mali.

src_text: Sena ke se seng sa ditsi tse kgolo le tse tswetseng pele tsa Sandvik lefatsheng ka bophara mme se kgona ho hlahisa dipersente tse fetang tse 60 tsa tlhahiso Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukusungulwa kwe-Sandvik Khomanani Manufacturing Site e-Kempton Park, eyinxalenye yotyalo-mali oluzizigidi ezingama-350 zeerandi obeluthenjiswe kwiNkomfa yesine yoTyalo-mali yaseMzantsi Afrika (i-SAIC) ebibanjelwe kwiZiko leNgqungquthela laseSandton eRhawutini ngomhla wama-24 kweyoKwindla yowama-..     Eli ziko litsha elizizikwere zeemitha ezingama-62 000 lidibanisa imisebenzi ebiqhutywa ngaphambili kwiindawo ezintlanu ezahlukeneyo kwaye lingangena abasebenzi abamalunga nama-.

src_text: Kabinite boetse ya amohela ho etela ha Mopresidente ho thakgolweng ha sitsi sa tlhahiso sa Hesto Harnesses mane Stanger, KwaDukuza ka la 13 Loetse.
tgt_text: Lelinye lawona maziko e-Sandvik amakhulu  kwihlabathi jikelele nanobuxhaka-xhaka bale mihla kwaye lizawuvelisa iiloli zokulayisha emigodini.

src_text: Sitsi sena ke se seng sa diprojeke tse hlano tsa matsete tseo leng karolo ya matsete Metair Investments Limited dibilione tse  4 tlo tshehetsa katoloso ya tlhahiso ya mofuta motjha wa koloi ya Ford Ranger.
tgt_text: Umyinge ongaphezulu kwama-60% wezi ntsimbi ziza kusetyenziswa xa kusenziwa ezi loli uza kuveliswa apha eMzantsi Afrika..     IKhabhinethi ilwamkele utyelelo lukaMongameli Ramaphosa lokuya kuhlola KwaZulu-Natal ngethuba kusungulwa komzi-mveliso wakwa-Hesto Harnesses e-Stanger, KwaDukuza ngomhla we-13 kweyoMsintsi yowama-.

src_text: Mopresidente ile boela etela le ho bulweng ha khamphane atolotsweng ya ha Sappi Saiccor Mill bitsang dibilione tse R7,7 mane Umkomaas ikemiseditseng ho atolla tlhodisano ya tshebetso ya yona maemong matjhaba ha mmoho le ho eketsa menyetla ya mosebetsi bakeng sa nako kgutshwane le telele..     Matsete ana ke mang ditshepiso tse neng di etswe ke diindasteri tsena ho SAIC.
tgt_text: Eli ziko lelinye leeprojekthi ezintlanu zotyalo-mali oluyinkunzi eliyinxalenye yebhiliyonii eyi-.

src_text: Matsete mang le mang matjha naheng ena thusa letsholong la kahobotjha le tsoseletso ya moruo, mme hape tswela pele ho etsa Afrika Borwa sebaka se setle sa ho etsa matsete..     Ntshetsopele ya Meralo ya Motheo.
tgt_text: 4 yeerandi eyathenjiswa ngabakwa-Metair Investments Limited kumalinge okuxhasa umsebenzi wokwandiswa kunye nokuveliswa apha ekhaya kwe-Ford Ranger etsha.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ho bulwa ha karolo ntjha ya Mmila wa Ring Road wa Musina mane Limpopo tla bebofatsa kgwebelano ha mmoho le ho tsamaya ha batho Musina le dinaheng tsa boahisane tse ka borwa ho Afrika.
tgt_text: UMongameli ukwazimase ukuvulwa kweprojekthi yokuphucula nokwandisa i-Sappi Saiccor Mill exabisa iibhiliyoni eziyi-7,7 zeerandi e-Umkomaas, ejolise ekwandiseni nasekuphuculeni le nkampani itsho ikwazi ukukhuphisana kumgangatho wehlabathi  ngelixa ikwadala imisebenzi ezizingxungxo kunye nesisigxina.

src_text: Projeke ena ya dimilione tse R640 thehile mesebetsi ya moshwelella fetang 275 mme ya thehela le dikgwebo tse nyane, tse bohareng le tse kgolo menyetla..     Ho ahwa ha mmila ona wa Musina Ring Road ke karolo ya leano la mmuso la meralo ya motheo tlasa lenaneo la ERRP, leo ka lona ho ikemiseditsweng ho theha le hona ho hodisa menyetla ya mesebetsi setjhabeng ho tswa makaleng fapafapaneng..     Koduwa ya Jagersfontein.
tgt_text: Olu tyalo-mali luyinxalenye yezithembiso ezenziwe ngoosomashishini kwi-SAIC.

src_text: Kabinete lebisa kutlwelo bohloko ya yona ho malapa ohle lahlehetsweng ke beng ka ona ka lebaka la ho phatloha ha letamo la morafo neng se sa sebediswe wa Jagersfontein mane Foreisitata ka Sontaha sa la 11 Loetse.
tgt_text: Lonke utyalo-mali olutsha elizweni lethu lunceda ekwakhiweni ngokutsha nasekuvuseleleni uqoqosho lwethu, kwaye luyaqhubeka nokungqina ukuba uMzantsi Afrika ulilizwe elunamathuba amaninzi otyalo-mali.

src_text: Koduwa ena sentse meralo mengata ya motheo esitana le matlo le dikoloi tsa batho..     Ketelong ya hae sebakeng sena sa koduwa ka Mantaha wa la 12 Loetse 2022, Mopresidente Ramaphosa ile thoholetsa matsapa neng se entswe ho leka ho thusa sebakeng seo ile ba ikana hore mmuso tla fana ka tshehetso hlokahalang setjhabeng seo sa Jagersfontein.
tgt_text: Uphuhliso lweziseko zophuhliso.

src_text: Kabinete boetse ya kgothatswa ke taba ya hore beng ba morafo ona ba ikemiseditse ho tshehetsa mmuso ka tshehetso ya setekginiki haeba ka kotjwa ke Moifo okametseng Dimenerale Afrika Borwa..     Indasteri ya merafo ke le leng la makala nang le seabo se seholo kgolong ya moruo wa naha ena ka ho theha menyetla ya mesebetsi, ho romelwa ha thepa dinaheng tsa kantle ha mmoho le ho etsa matsete dinaheng tsa kantle, tseo tsohle tse tswelang batho ba dibaka tsa merafong molemo..     Mmuso le mekgatlo ikemetseng ba ile ba phallela ho thusa mahlatsipa ka dintho tse kang mepheme ya nakwana, ditshebeletso tsa ho thojwa maikutlo le ditlhoko tsa sethatho tse kang dikobo, mealo ha mmoho le dijo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuvulwa kwecandelo elitsha le-Musina Ring Road e-Limpopo eliza kwenza kube lula ukuba abantu bahamba-hambe eMusina, likwavumele ukwandiswa kwemisebenzi yorhwebo neyoqoqosho phakathi koMzantsi Afrika kunye namazwe oMbutho woPhuhliso lwaMazantsi e-Afrika (i-SADC).

src_text: Metsi le motlakase le tsona di boetse setlwaeding sebakeng sena..     Ha ho se ho hlwekisitswe sebakeng seo sa koduwa, boratekginiki ba tla hlahloba maemo matlo moo.
tgt_text: Le projekthi yezigidi ezingama-640 zeerandi idale imisebenzi esisigxina engama-275 yabahlali bale ngingqi yaze yabonelela ngamathuba kuluntu lwasekuhlaleni nakumashishini amancinane, aphakathi namancinane kakhulu (ii-SMME)..     Ukwakhiwa kwe-Musina Ring Road yinxalenye yenkqubo karhulumente yeziseko zophuhliso, ngokusebenzisa i-ERRP, ejonge ukudala uhlumo oluza kuxhanyulwa ngumntu wonke kunye namathuba engqesho kumacandelo ahlukeneyo nakuluntu.

src_text: Kabinete leboha ba ditshebeletso tsa tshohanyetso, mekgatlo ya setjhaba le setjhaba ka kakaretso ka ho phallela ka thuso..     Moruo.
tgt_text: Intlekele yaseJagersfontein.

src_text: Kabinete ile ya sekaseka maemo moruo naha ena ho latela dipalopalo tse sa tswa lokollwa ke Lefapha la Dipalopalo (Stats SA) la naha ena tse bontshang ha tlhahiso ya thepa kotareng ya bobedi ya selemo sena theohile ka persente tse 0,7%.
tgt_text: 1  IKhabhinethi ithi mazilale ngenxeba iintsapho zabo bathe basutywa kukufa emva kokugqabhuka kwedama lodaka lomgodi owavalwayo  wase-Jagersfontein e-Freystata lakhupha udaka olwenze umonakalo omkhulu ngentseni yangeCawa, umhla we-11 kweyoMsintsi ngowama-.

src_text: Hara dintlha tse bakileng phokotseho ena re ka bala ho tingwa ha motlakase ka sepheo sa ho baballa, ntwa ya Rashiya le Ukraine ha mmoho le ho nyoloha ha ditjeho tsa bophelo ka kakaretso..     Matsapa ileng etswa ka Lenaneo la Kahobotjha le Tsoseletso ya Moruo ile thusa haholo ho thibella ho lahleha ho hong ha mesebetsi ha mmoho le kgahlamelo mpe ya maemo matjhaba moruong wa rona.
tgt_text: Le ntlekele iphinde yashiya izakhiwo zendawo, izinto zabantu ezifana nezithuthi kunye nezindlu ezininzi zonakaliswe kakhulu.. 2   Ngethuba lotyelelo lwakhe kummandla wentlekele ngoMvulo, umhla we-12 kweyoMsintsi ngowama-2022, uMongameli Ramaphosa uvakalise umbulelo ngeenzame zohlangulo nezovuselelo kulo mmandla.

src_text: Matsapa ana mmuso bontsha katleho kgolo, mme bopaki ba teng bo bonahetse dipalopalong tsa Kotara tsa Stats SA tsa Dipatlisiso tsa Batho ba Sebetsang.
tgt_text: Ukwathembise ukuba urhulumente uzakubonelela ngenkxaso efanelekileyo kubahlali abachaphazelekayo baseJagersfontein.

src_text: Dipalopalo tsena di bontsha ha le batho ba 648 000 ba fumaneng mesebetsi pakeng tsa kotara ya pele le ya bobedi ya selemo sa     Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikhuthazekile kukuba abanini balo mgodi bathe bakulungele ukunika uncedo lobugcisa nenkxaso kurhulumente ukuba banokucelwa benze njalo liBhunga lezeZimbiwa laseMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Ho Behwa Leihlo le ho Lekolwa Botjha (M&E) ha Moralo wa Leano la Naha la Batjha (NYP).
tgt_text: 3 Ishishini lezemigodi lisahleli linegalelo elibalulekileyo kuqoqosho ngokuqeshwa ngokuthe ngqo nangokungathanga ngqo, iingeniso evela kurhwebo namazwe angaphandle, kunye notyalo-mali oluthe ngqo lwangaphandle, kwaye lidlala indima ebalulekileyo ekuphuculeni ubomi babantu kwiindawo ezinemigodi.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana moralo wa M&E mme tla matlafatsa ho behwa leihlo ha ditshiya tsa NYP 2020-.
tgt_text: 4 Urhulumente kunye neminye imibutho engekho phantsi kukarhulumente baye bangenelela ngokungxamisekileyo ngokubonelela ngeendawo zokuhlala ezingxamisekileyo, ululeko lwengqondo nangezibonelelo ezingundoqo ezifana neengubo, oomatrasi kunye nokutya.

src_text: Moralo ona na le dipontsho tse hlano tse tsamaisanang le ditshiya tsa NYP.
tgt_text: Ubonelelo lwamanzi nombane kulo mmandla sele lubuyele esiqhelweni.

src_text: Dipontsho tsena di ile tsa thehwa ka tshebedisano mmoho le bankakarolo ba nang le thahasello tshehetsong le ntshetsopeleng ya batjha naheng ena.
Dintlha tsa teng di tla arolwa ho ya ka dilemo, bonng, maemo ho itekanela, morabe ha mmoho le dibaka..     Ho behwa leihlo hona ho tla etsuwa maemong ohle mmuso ha mmoho le lekaleng le ikemetseng.
tgt_text: 5 Nje ukuba indawo yentlekele icociwe, amagcisa alindeleke ukuba enze uhlolo lweendonga zezindlu.

src_text: Tlaleho ya teng tla bokeletswa jwalo ka kotara mme phatlalatswe habedi ka selemo..     Moralo wa Leano bakeng sa Moralo wa Kopanelo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibulele iinkonzo zikaxakeka, imibutho yoluntu kunye namalungu oluntu ngeminikelo yesisa noncedo lwabo.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Moralo wa Leano bakeng sa Moralo wa Kopanelo mmusong oo ka ona ho ikemiseditsweng ho hlwaya dikgeo tse teng moralong wa ha jwale..     Matsapa ana rerilweng, ka ona ho ikemiseditswe ho shebana le ho hloleha ho etsa meralo maemong ka boraro mmuso.
tgt_text: Uqoqosho.

src_text: Matsapa ana tla tla ka lenaneo le bontshang bopaki le tla beha tshebetso leihlo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ixoxe ngobume boqoqosho beli lizwe emva kokuba amanani akutshanje eZiko leeNkcukacha-manani loMzantsi Afrika (i-Stats SA) abonise ukuba ingeniso yemveliso yelizwe (i-GDP) yekota yesibini yowama-2022 yehle ngo-0,7%.

src_text: Leano lena le boetse le tla le leano la tjhebelopele la nako telele bohareng le kgutshwane maemong ohle mmuso..     Sena se tla thusa ho tla le diphetoho melaong ka maikemisetso ho ntlafatsa tshebedisano meralong le tjhebelong pele..     Ho Amohelwa ha Tumellano ya ho Thehwa ha Akgente ya Meriana ya Seafrika (AMA).
tgt_text: Izinto eziphembelele oku kwehla ziquka ukucinywa kombane, ungquzulwano lwaseRashiya ne-Ukraine, kunye neendleko eziphezulu zokuphila kunye nokunyuka kwamaxabiso.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ho tekenwa ha Tumellano ya ho Thehwa ha AMA le ho tliswa ha yona Palamenteng bakeng sa ho sekasekwa.
tgt_text: Amanyathelo okungenelela enziwe siSicwangciso soKwakha ngokutsha kunye noVuselelo loQoqosho (i-ERRP) ubukhulu becala sithintele ilizwe kubunzima amashishini ajamelane nabo kwihlabathi, kwaye sakhusela imisebenzi kunye neendlela zokuphila.

src_text: Sena se tla thusa ho theha tumellano eo ho neng ho dumellanwe ka yona Palamente ya Dinaha tsa Afrika ka.
tgt_text: Amanyathelo okungenelela ezoqoqosho aluqilima karhulumente aqalisa ukuvelisa iziqhamo, njengoko kungqinwe kwiziphumo zakutshanje ze-Stats SA zeKota zoVavanyo lwaBasebenzi, ezibonise ukuba kudalwe imisebenzi engaphezulu kwama-648 000 phakathi kwekota yokuqala neyesibini yowama-     Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Ka tumellano ena, ho tla thehwa AMA bakeng sa kontinente ya Afrika.
tgt_text: Isicwangciso-nkqubo soBeko-liso noVavanyo (i-M&E) soMgaqo-nkqubo woLutsha lweSizwe (i-NYP).

src_text: Akgente ena tla laola meriana yohle ya kontinente ena mme ntlafatse le polokeho le tshebediso ya yona..     Ho tekenwa ha tumellano ena ho tla ntshetsa pele boinehelo ba Afrika Borwa matjhabeng ba ho ntlafatsa ho laolwa ha meriana kontinenteng ena..     Tlaleho Tshebetsong ya Dipatlisiso le Ntshetsong Pele (R&D) ya Lenaneo la Merokotso ya Lekgetho – 2019/20 le 2020/.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivume isicwangciso-nkqubo se-M&E esiza kunceda ukubeka iliso okusebenzayo kunye novavanyo lweempembelelo zeentsika ze-NYP yowama-2020 ukuya kowama-.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Lenaneo la R&D la Merokotso ya Lekgetho la dilemo tse pedi tse fetileng (2019/20 le 2020/21).
tgt_text: Isicwangciso-nkqubo sibonelela ngezalathisi ezintlanu ezikwinqanaba eliphezulu ezihambelana neentsika ze-NYP.

src_text: Sena se tsamaisana le karoloya bo 11D (17) ya Molao wa Lekgetho, wa 1962 (Molao wa bo 58 wa 1962) bolelang tlhokeho ya ho tliswa ha ditlaleho tsena Palamenteng..     Lenaneo lena la merokotso ya lekgetho le kgothaletsa dikhamphane tse ikemetseng ho tsetela ho R&D le ho tshehetsa kgolo ya matsete.
tgt_text: Ezi zalathisi zaqulunqwa kubanjiswene namahlakaniafanelekileyo anomdla kuphuhliso nasekuxhotyisweni kolutsha kweli lizwe.

src_text: Lenaneo lena le tshehetsa ntlafatso ya saense le mahlale kgolong ya moruo le matlafatsong ya tlhodisano..     Kabinete kgotsofetse ka tlaleho ena bontshang dikhamphane tse ntjha tse kentseng dikopo tsa merokotso ya lekgetho.
tgt_text: Iinkcukacha eziza kuqokelelwa ziza kujonga iminyaka yobudala, isini, ukukhubazeka, uhlanga ngokwebala kunye nendawo yokuhlala ngokwemimmandla yala mangenelelo..     Ukubeka iliso kuza kwenziwa kuwo onke amanqanaba karhulumente, kumaqumrhu nakumacandelo abucala.

src_text: Sena se kgothaletsa dikhamphane tse ngata ho nka karolo ka maikemisetso ho hodisa matsete tsona le ho matlafatsa kgolo ya moruo..     Dikhamphane tse nne tse ka pele lenaneong lena la merokotso ya lekgetho ke tsa lekala la tlhahiso ya tsa temo, tsa merafo, tsa dikhemikhale, ditlolo, meriana, setekginiki le tsa thekenoloji ya dikhomputara mme Kabinete nkile makala ana la ona ka Sehloohong Leanong la Meralo ya Diindasteri.
tgt_text: Iingxelo ziza kwenziwa ngekota kwaye zipapashwe kabini ngonyaka..     Isicwangciso-nkqubo soMgaqo-nkqubo woCwangciso oluDityanisiweyo.

src_text: Tlaleho feletseng ka fumaneha ho websaete ya Lefapha la Saense le Mahlale: www.dst.gov.za..     Foramo ya Afrika ya Menyetla ya Kgolo (AGOA) –.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isivumile Isicwangciso-nkqubo soMgaqo-nkqubo woCwangciso oluDityanisiweyo kurhulumente, esijonge ukulungisa izikhewu eziboniweyo zocwangciso lomgaqo-nkqubo kwinkqubo yocwangciso yangoku.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarwa ha Foramo ya AGOA ya.
tgt_text: Amanyathelo okungenelela acetywayo phakathi kwezinye izinto aza kujongana nokunqongophala kolungelelwaniso locwangciso phakathi kwamanqanaba amathathu karhulumente.

src_text: AGOA ne thakgolwe ke naha ya Amerika ka selemo sa 2000 ho fana ka tshebedisano ya tsa kgwebo dinaheng tse ka tlase ho lehwatata la Sahara..     Thumello ya thepa ya Afrika Borwa ka tlasa lenaneo la AGOA kenyeletsa ditholwana, matokomane, dikoloi, dikarolwana tsa dikoloi, menerale ya ho etsa tshepe, tshepe le dihlahiswa tsa dikhemikhale.
tgt_text: Amanyathelo okungenelela azo kuqalisa indlela yokubeka iliso esekelwe kubungqina.

src_text: Sebaka le letsatsi la seboka seo di tla phatlalatswa ha nako ntse tsamaya..     Seboka sa Matona sa Tlhahlobo ya Lefatshe (GEO) –.
tgt_text: Isicwangciso-nkqubo somgaqo-nkqubo sikwazisa ukuqikelelwa lula ngocwangciso lwexesha elide ukuya kwixesha eliphakathi kunye nelexesha elifutshane kurhulumente wonke.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarelwa ha Seboka sa Matona sa GEO mane Kapa ka.
tgt_text: Siza kusebenzela ukwazisa uhlaziyo lwemithetho ukuze kuphuculwe ukuhambelana nokuqikelelwa kucwangciso kunye nokubekwa kweliso kukarhulumente..     Ukuvunywa kweSivumelwano sokuSekwa kwe-Arhente yaMayeza ase-Afrika (i-AMA).

src_text: GEO ke mokgatlo wa kopanelo wa mmuso neng thehwe ka selemo sa 2003 ka mora Seboka sa Matjhaba sa Ntshetsopele se neng se tshwarwe ka.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukutyikitywa kweSivumelwano sokuSekwa kwe-AMA kunye nokungeniswa kwaso ePalamente ukuze sivunywe.

src_text: Lena ke lepatlelo leo dinaha tse fapafapaneng di fanang ka kabelo ya tsona molemong le mong wa ho aha tshebeletso ya GEO..     Ha jwale GEO na le ditho tsa mebuso ya dinaha tse fetang tse 113, mme tse 30 tsa tsona ke tsa mona Afrika.
tgt_text: Oku kuza kuzalisekisa isivumelwano esamkelwa yiNdibano yeManyano ye-Afrika ngowama-.

src_text: Afrika Borwa haesale le setho se ka sehloohong ho tloha ka selemo sa 2005 mme borasaense ba rona ke karolo ya dipatlisiso tse ngata tse etswang ke GEO..     Mphalane Kgwedi ya Dipalangwang (OTM) –.
tgt_text: Esi sivumelwano siseka ngokusesikweni i-AMA yeli lizwekazi.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho thakgolwa ha letsholo la OTM ka Moqebelo wa la 1 Mphalane 2022 tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Sishov’ingolovane: mmoho re aha moralo wa motheo wa dipalangwang ntlafatsang maphelo batho.”.
tgt_text: I-arhente iza kulawula amayeza onyango, kwaye iphucule ukhuseleko kunye nokusebenza kwamayeza onyango kweli lizwekazi.

src_text: Lenaneo la selemo la OTM ke leo ka lona ho hlokomediswang setjhaba ka bohlokwa ba dipalangwang jwalo ka karolo ya kgolo le ntshetsopele ya moruo.
tgt_text: Ukutyikitya kunye nokuvunywa kungqina ukuba uMzantsi Afrika uzibophelele kwizivumelwano zeli lizwekazi nezehlabathi malunga nokuphucula imithetho yeli lizwekazi elawula iimveliso zalo zempilo..     Ingxelo ngokuSebenza kweNkqubo yesiBonelelo seRhafu yoPhando noPhuhliso (i-R&D) – yowama-2019/20 kunye neyowama-2020/..     IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa ePalamente kweNkqubo yesiBonelelo seRhafu ye-R&D kule minyaka mibini idlulileyo (ngowama-2019/20 kunye neyowama-2020/21).

src_text: Ho tla ba le diketsahalo tse fapafapaneng mefuteng yohle ya dipalangwang jwalo ka difofane, dikepe, dipalangwang tsa setjhaba ha mmoho le tsa mebila.
tgt_text: Oku kuhambelana necandelo 11D (17) loMthetho weRhafu yeNgeniso, wowe-1962 (uMthetho wama-58 wowe-1962), elifuna ukuba ezi ngxelo zandlalwe ePalamente.

src_text: Diketsahalo tsena di tla hlokomedisa ka tshireletso le polokeho dipalangweng.
tgt_text: Inkqubo yesibonelelo serhafu ijonge ukukhuthaza iinkampani zabucala ukuba zityale imali kwi-R&D ukuze zikhuthaze ukukhula kotyalo-mali.

src_text: Bankakarolo ba tla bontshana le ka diphephetso tse tobaneng le lekala la dipalangwang..     Mmuso ntse ikemiseditse ka taba ya ho ntlafatsa meralo ya motheo ya dipalangwang, mahaeng le ditoropong ka sepheo sa ho bebofatsa ho thothwa ha batho le thepa..     Kopano ya Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN) ya Lenaneo la ho Dudiswa ha Batho.
tgt_text: Ivumela ukuqhubela-phambili kwenzululwazi kunye nobuchule bokuyilaobuza kunceda ekukhuleni koqoqosho, kwaye ikhuthaza ukhuphiswano.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarwa ha kopano ya UN-HABITAT Johannesburg ka la 16 le la 17 Mphalane.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ichulumancile kukuba le ngxelo ibonisa ukuba iinkampani ezintsha zifake izicelo zokufumana isibonelelo serhafu.
Ikhuthaza iinkampani ezininzi ukuba zifake izicelo zokuxhamla esi sibonelelo njengenxalenye yokukhulisa utyalo-mali lwazo kunye nokukhwezela ukukhula koqoqosho.

src_text: Lefapha la ho Dudiswa ha Setjhaba ke lona le tla tsamaisa seboka sena sa matsatsi mabedi seo ho sona ho tla tla boradipolotiki, basebeletsi le boradipatlisiso lekaleng lena ho kenyeletsa ditho tsa bohlokwa tseo tla beng le Kemedi ya UN-HABITAT ho tswa Nairobi, Kenya.
tgt_text: Iinkampani ezine eziphezulu ezithe zasifumana esi sibonelelo serhafu zikwicandelo lokucola iimveliso zolimo; elezokuxhamlisa kwizimbiwa; elezamichiza, elezithambiso, elezamayeza kunye nelezobugcisa bezombane kunye nelezobuchwepheshe bolwazi ethe iKhabhinethi yawamkela njengemacandelo ekufuneka akhokeliswe phambili kwisiCwangciso sokuSebenza soMgaqo-nkqubo wezoShishino.

src_text: Taba tla ba ka sehloohong mona tla ba ho nkuwa ha mehato mabapi le dibaka tsa baipehi le ba mekhukhung..     Sephetho sa dipuisano tsena tla ba ona mokotaba tla theha Moralo wa Matjhaba tla tliswa ho Kopano ya UN-HABITAT ho tla pasiswa ka     Ditshisinyo tsa Melao.
tgt_text: Ingxelo epheleleyo inokufumaneka kwiwebhusayithi yeSebe lezeNzululwazi kunye noBuchule bokuYila:  www.dst.gov.za..     IQonga loMthetho lokuKhula kunye namaThuba ase-Afrika (i-AGOA) – yowama-.

src_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Moifo wa Naha Shebaneng le Tlhekefetso tsa Basadi le Dipolao tsa Bona (GBVF) wa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukusingathwa kweQonga le-AGOA ngowama-.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa ha Tshisinyo ya Molao wa 2021 wa Moifo wa Naha Shebaneng le GBVF bakeng sa ho sekasekwa.
tgt_text: I-AGOA yaphunyezwa yiMelika (i-USA) ngowama-2000 ukuze yenze kube lula kumazwe amaninzi ase-Afrika akumazantsi e-Sahara ukurhweba ne-USA.

src_text: Tshisinyo ena tla le moralo wa molao tla thusa ho theha komiti ya molao tla shebana le taba ya GBVF boetse dumella ho thehwa ha Boto tla tla le maano le ho kenya tshebetsong ha Leano la Moralo wa Naha shebaneng le GBVF le neng le tjhaelwe monwana ke Kabinete ka Mphalane.
tgt_text: Iimveliso zorhwebo zoMzantsi Afrika ezithunyelwa e-USA phantsi kwe-AGOA ziquka iziqhamo ezityiwayo, amandongomane, izithuthi, iintsimbi zemoto, intsimbi, isinyithi kunye neemveliso zemichiza.

src_text: Boto ena tla ba le kemedi ya persente tse 51 ho tswa setjhabeng le tse 49 ho tswa mmusong.
tgt_text: Owona mhla nendawo zisaza kubhengezwa.

src_text: Tshisinyo ena ya molao se phatlaladitswe bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba..     Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Kwae le Disebediswa tsa ho Tsuba tsa Elektroniki wa.
tgt_text: Ingqungquthela yaBaphathiswa ye-Group on Earth Observations (i-GEO) –.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa ha Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Kwae le Disebediswa tsa ho Tsuba tsa Elektroniki wa 2018 Palamenteng oo ka ona ho ikemiseditsweng hore kene sebakeng sa Molao Laolang Kwae wa 1993 (Molao wa bo 83 wa 1993) jwalo ka ha ntlafaditswe..     Ka tshisinyo ena ho ikemiseditswe ho tiisa melawana ya dipetlele tsa mmuso hore ikamahanye le ya Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba wa Bophelo bo Botle Laolang Kwae nngwe ya dintho tse bolelwang ke tshisinyo ena ke dibaka tseo ho sa tsubelweng ho tsona kantle le ka hara meaho; ho kwalwa ha ho rekiswa ha kwae metjhining ya ho rekisa, le hore kwae be le letshwao la tlhokomediso pakaneng ya yona..     Tshisinyo ena sekasikilwe ke bankakarolo bohle ho kenyeletsa indasteri ya kwae, mekgatlo ya setjhaba ha mmoho le mafapha amehang mmuso     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivumile ukuba uMzantsi Afrika usingathe iNgqungquthela yaBaphathiswa ye-GEO eKapa ngowama-.

src_text: Kopano Tlwaelehileng ya bo 77 ya Matjhaba Kopaneng (UNGA77).
tgt_text: I-GEO liqumrhu eliphakathi koorhulumente elasekwa ngowama-2003 emva kweNgqungquthela yeHlabathi yowama-2002 yoPhuhliso oluZinzileyo.

src_text: Afrika Borwa nka karolo ho UNGA77 tswelang pele ntlokgolo ya Matjhaba Kopaneng mane New York City, USA ho tloha ka la 20 ho isa ho la 27 Loetse 2022 tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Nako ya bohlokwa: Tharollo ya diphetoho mathateng rarahaneng”.
tgt_text: Isebenza njengeqonga lamazwe ngamazwe apho amazwe anikela ngokuzithandela kwinjongo enye yokwakha iinkqubo ze-GEO.

src_text: Kgahlamelo ya sewa sa Khorona (COVID-19) dinaheng tseo moruo le bodulo ba teng bo seng maemong bile kgolo ha bapiswa le ya dinaha tse setletseng mme dinaha tsena ha di tlameha ho tlohelwa di sale morao ha re tla tabeng ya kahobotjha le tsoseletso..     Pele ho Ngangisano ya Kopanong eo ya UN, Mongodi Moholo wa UN, Ntate António Guterres tla kopanya seboka se mabapi le “Diphetoho ho tsa Thuto” mme bitse le kopano ya bohlokwa ya Maano Ntshetsopele (di-SDG).
tgt_text: I-GEO ngoku inoorhulumente bamazwe abangaphezulu kwe-113, abangama-30 kubo bavela e-Afrika kunye nemibutho ethatha inxaxheba emalunga ne-140, kwaye i-11 lale mibutho livela e-Afrika.

src_text: Dikopano tsena tsa di-SDG ho lebeletswe hore di tle le ditsela tsa ho potlakisa ho kengwa tshebebetsong ha maano..     Letsatsi la Botjhaba.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika ube lilungu leKomiti Elawulayo elisebenzayo ukusukela ngowama-2005 kwaye iinzululwazi zethu ngoku zithatha inxaxheba kumaphulo ophando amaninzi akhokelwa yi-GEO.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla fana ka puo ya bohlokwa moketeng wa ho keteka Letsatsi la Botjhaba la 2022 mane Union Buildings ka Moqebelo wa la 24 Loetse.
tgt_text: Inyanga yezoThutho yeDwarha (i-OTM) –.

src_text: Lepetjo la mokete ona ke le reng: “Re Hopola Lefa la Solomon Linda re Thabela le Mmino wa Setso sa Afrika Borwa.”.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukusungulwa kwephulo le-OTM ngoMgqibelo, umhla woku-1 kweyeDwarha yowama-2022, phantsi komxholo othi:  “Sishov’ingolovane: sisonke sakha iziseko zophuhliso zezothutho ezakha nezigcina indlela yokuphila”.

src_text: Selemong sena Kgwedi ena ya Botjhaba tla tsepamisa maikutlo mminong wa setso sa Afrika Borwa haholoholo wa Isicathamiya ha mmoho le kabelo ya ona dipapading, tsa bonono, tsa setso le botjhaba.
tgt_text: I-OTM yonyaka isetyenziselwa ukwazisa ngezothutho njengenye yezinto ezibalulekileyo ekukhuleni koqoqosho kunye nophuhliso lweendawo ezihlala uluntu.

src_text: Ka lepetjo lena ho ikemiseditswe ho keteka dilemo tse 60 sebini le moqapi wa dipina Solomon Popoli Linda (1909-1962) hlokahetse mme boela tsebisahale ka la Solomon Ntsele, eo leng moqapi wa pina ya, “Mbube”.
tgt_text: Imisebenzi emininzi iza kwenziwa ukubonisa imiba eyahlukeneyo yeziseko zophuhliso lothutho kwezophapho, kwezaselwandle, kwezothutho lukawonke-wonke kunye neendlela.

src_text: Mokete wa Matjhaba wa 2022 wa Letsatsi la Ditaba tsa Mawatle.
tgt_text: Le misebenzi iza kwazisa uluntu malunga nokhuseleko kunye nokhuselo lwezothutho.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla keteka Mokete wa Matjhaba wa 2022 wa Letsatsi la Ditaba tsa Mawatle mane Thekong ho tloha ka la 12 ho isa ka la 14 Mphalane.
tgt_text: Iindibano zokubonisana namahlakani abachaphazelekayo nazo ziza kubanjwa ukuze kuxoxwe ngemiceli-mngeni eyahlukeneyo kwicandelo lezothutho.

src_text: Mokete ona tla tshwarwa nakong ya OTM moo ka lona ho tlang ho etswa tlhokomediso ka dikepe jwalo ka lekala la dipalangwang.
tgt_text: Urhulumente usazibophelele ekuphuculeni iziseko zophuhliso zezothutho zeli lizwe, kwiindawo ezisemaphandleni kunye nasezidolophini, ukuze kube lula ukuthuthwa kweempahla kunye nabantu ngendlela esebenzayo nenempumelelo..     Intlanganiso yeZizwe Ezimanyeneyo (i-UN) neNkqubo yokuHlaliswa koLuntu (i-UN-HABITAT).

src_text: Moketeng ona ho tla ba teng le kemedi ho tswa dinaheng tse fapafapaneng ho tla iponela tsa indasteri ya dikepe ya Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukusingathwa kwentlanganiso yamalungu e-UN-HABITAT eRhawutini ngomhla we-16 nowe-17 kweyeDwarha ngowama-.

src_text: Afrika Borwa haesale le setho sa Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba wa Dikepe ho tloha ka selemo sa.
Mokgatlo ona ke lekala le laolang tshebetso ya dikepe ho Matjhaba Kopaneng..     Kgwedi ya Bohahlaudi.
tgt_text: ISebe lezokuHlaliswa koLuntu liza kuququzelela le ntlanganiso yeentsuku ezimbini eza kuzinyaswa ziintshatsheli zezopolitiko, iingcali kunye nabaphandi, kuquka namalungu abalulekileyo eKomiti yaBammeli abasiSigxina be-UN-HABITAT ezinze e-Nairobi, e-Kenya.

src_text: Letsatsi la Matjhaba la Bohahlaudi (27 Loetse) Kgweding ena ya Bohahlaudi re tlo le keteka ka lepetjo le reng, “Re Nahana Botjha ka Bohahlaudi”.
tgt_text: Imiba engundoqo eza kuxoxwa iza kuquka ukufuna amanyathelo okungenelela aza kuza notshintsho kwiindawo zoogob’ityholo kunye nakumatyotyombe..     Iziphumo zezi ngxoxo ziza kufikelela kuvuthondaba ngokusungulwa kweSicwangciso-nkqubo seSicwangciso sokuSebenza seHlabathi, esiza kuthiwa thaca kwiNdibano ye-UN-HABITAT ukuze sivunywe ngowama-     Imithetho eYilwayo.

src_text: Tsa bohahlaudi kwano lapeng di bohlokwa bakeng sa kahobotjha ya lekala lena la bohahlaudi le karolo kgolo ya Lekeno la Afrika Borwa ha mmoho le ho thehwa ha mesebetsi..     Kabinete thabetse ho ntlafala ha lekala la kamohelo ya baeti le ntlafetseng ka mora sewa sa COVID-.
tgt_text: Umthetho oYilwayo weBhunga leSizwe loBundlobongela obuSekwe kwiSini kunye nokuBulawa kwabaseTyhini (i-GBVF) wowama-..     IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa koMthetho oYilwayo weBhunga leSizwe le-GBVF wowama-2021 ePalamente ukuze uqwalaselwe.

src_text: Halofong ya pele ya 2022, ho bile le maeto lehae dimilione di.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo unika ingcaciso ngomthetho oza kusetyenziswa xa kusekwa iqumrhu elimiselwe ngokomthetho eliza kungqala ngqo kule ngxaki ye-GBVF..     Ukwakhululela ukuba kusekwe iBhodi yeli Bhunga eza kukhokela ize ibeke iliso kumalinge okuphunyezwa kwesiCwangciso-qhinga seSizwe se-GBVF, esavunywa yiKhabhinethi kweyeDwarha yowama-2020 ukuba masiqalise ukusebenza.

src_text: 2 leng keketseho ya persente tse 114 ha ho bapiswa le nako tshwanang selemong sa.
tgt_text: Le bhodi iza kuba namalungu angama-51% avela kwimibutho yoluntu aze wona angama-49% aphume kurhulumente.

src_text: Sena se bontsha keketseho leha ho bapiswa le nako tshwanang ka selemo sa 2019 moo ho bileng le maeto lehae dimilione di.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo sele ugwadliwe kwiindibano zovakaliso-zimvo zoluntu...     Umthetho oYilwayo woLawulo lweeMveliso zeCuba neMidiza e-Elektronikhi wowama-.

src_text: Jwalo ka karolo ya ho keteka Kgwedi ya Bohlaudi, Kabinete kgothaletsa Maafrika Borwa hore etele diprofensi tsa bona ka ho fapana..     Kabinete amohetse qeto ya Bofofise ba Belgium ba ho ba le difofane tse tlang Afrika Borwa ka ho otloloha ho qalang kgweding ena (Loetse) leng se tla matlafatsa lekala lena le ho netefatsa taba ya hore Afrika Borwa ke sebaka se setle sa bohahlaudi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa koMthetho oYilwayo woLawulo lweeMveliso zeCuba neMidiza e-Elektronikhi wowama-2018 ePalamente, ojonge ukurhoxisa lo Mthetho woLawulo lweeMveliso zeCuba ukhoyo, wowe-1993 (uMthetho wama-83 wowe-1993), njengoko ulungisiwe.

src_text: Sena se tla kenyeletsa difofane tse tla ya Kapa le Johannesburg jwalo ka beke     Melaetsa.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo ukwajonge ukuqinisa amanyathelo elizwe amalunga nezempilo yoluntu aze enziwe ukuba  ahambelane nesiVumelwano soMbutho wezeMpilo weHlabathi seSicwangciso-nkqubo soLawulo lweCuba kuLawulo lweCuba.

src_text: Diteboho    Kabinete lebisa diteboho le ditakaletso tse ntle ho: Mopresidente William Samoei Ruto wa Kenya, ya neng behwa semmuso ka Labobedi la la 13 Loetse 2022, ho latela dikgetho tse se nang morusu tse neng di tshwerwe ka la 9 Phato.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo uphakamisa, phakathi kwezinye izinto, ukuba kubhangiswe tu ukutshaya ngaphakathi kwizakhiwo nakwezinye iindawo ezingaphandle kwezakhiwo;; ukubhangiswa kokuthengiswa kwecuba ngoomatshini bokuthengisa, futhi ukwaphucula neendlela amaqokobhe ecuba enziwa ngayo kunye nemibhalo yokulumkisa ebhalwe kuwo.

src_text: Motlatsi wa Mopresidente, Ntate David Mabuza ne le teng moketeng oo ho emela Mopresidente Ramaphosa, mmuso le setjhaba sa Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo uhliwe amahlongwane wade wacokiswa ngamahlakani achaphazelekayo ahlukeneyo, aquka amashishini ecuba, imibutho yoluntu kunye namasebe karhulumente afanelekileyo     Imisitho ezayo.

src_text: Mokgatlo wa Afrika Borwa wa Rabi ha mmoho le Toropo ya Kapa ka ho tshwara ka katleho Mohope wa Lefatshe wa borobedi wa Rugby Sevens ho tloha ka la 9 ho isa ka la 11 Loetse ne le lekgetlo la pele tonamente ena tshwarelwa Afrika, mme seo se bontsha hantle hore Afrika Borwa tumme hantle ka kamohelo ya baeti..     Matshediso     Kabinete fetisetsa matshediso yona ho malapa le metswalle ya:  Bana ba sekolo ba 18 le batho ba baholo ba babedi ba ileng ba hlokahala kotsing nyarosang ka Labohlano la la 16 Loetse mane Phongola, KwaZulu-Natal ka mora hore lori thulane le vene tsamaisang bana ba sekolo     Kgiro.
tgt_text: Iseshoni yama-77 yeNdibano Jikelele yeZizwe eziManyeneyo (i-UNGA77).

src_text: Pele batho bohle ba hirwa, ho tla hlahlobisiswa mangolo bona thuto le mang hlokahalang     Ntate Makgothi Samuel Thobakgale jwalo ka Molaodi Kakaretso (DG): Mokomeshenara wa Naha wa Lefapha la Tlhabollo ya Batshwaruwa     Ngaka Malixole Percival Mahlati Motlatsi wa Molaodi Kakaretso DDG: Ya Karolong sebetsang ka Dipetlele le Thuto Phahameng ho tsa Bophelo bo Botle le Ntshetsopele ya Ditaba tsa Basebetsi Lefapheng la tsa Bophelo     Ntate Siyabonga Blessing Mdubeki jwalo ka Moabi wa Lefatshe ya ka Sehloohong Lefapheng la tsa Temo, Ntlafatso ya tsa Mobu le ho Ntlafatswa ha Dibaka tsa Mahaeng     Ntate Phaswa Phineas Mamogale Motsamaisi ya ka Sehloohong wa Ditjhelete Lefapheng la tsa Bophelo..     Kabinete dumellana le ho hirwa ha batho ba latelang     Ntate Tshediso Matona jwalo ka Mokomeshenara wa Komeshene ya Tshehetso ya ba Batsho Moruong (BBBEE)     Ditho tsa Boto ya Maipiletso ya Difilimi le Diphatlalatso: Ntate Siyazi Tyamtyam (Modulasetulo); Mme Sohani Natasha Chundhur;Mme Sisanda Nkoala;Mme Shandukani Mulaudzi;Mme Nomaswazi Rachel Shabangu-Mndawe;Ngaka Litheko Modisane;Mme Phuti Nehemia Phukubje;Mme James Shikwambana; leMme Manko Thalitha Bufffel kgethilwe hape).
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uthatha inxaxheba kwi-UNGA77 eqhubeka kundlunkulu we-UN kwisiXeko saseNew York e-USA ukusuka ngomhla wama-20 ukuya kowama-27 kweyoMsintsi ngowama-2022 phantsi komxholo othi:  “Ixesha lesiganeko sokuphawula utshintsho olubalulekileyo lwembali:  Ukuvula izisombululo zenguqu kwimiceli-mngeni edibanayo”.

src_text: Paballo ya Metsi.
tgt_text: Ugcino lwamanzi.

src_text: Kabinete leboha Maafrika Borwa ka ho ikobela dipehelo mabapi le ho fokotswa ha phepelo ya metsi dikarolong tse itseng tsa Johannesburg, Tshwane le Ekurhuleni ka boiteko ba ho imolla mehlodi ya rona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibulele abemi boMzantsi Afrika ngokuthobela izithintelo zokusebenzisa amanzi eziphunyezwe kwiindawo ezithile zaseRhawutini, eTshwane nase-Ekurhuleni ngeenzame zokuzinzisa umthamo omumethwe ngoovimba bamanzi.

src_text: Mehlodi le matamo rona tlasa kgatello kgolo ka lebaka la maemo motjheso phahameng Gauteng leng se qobelletseng ba ha Rand Water ho fokotsa phepelo ya bona ya metsi ho bommasepala bana.
tgt_text: Amadama kunye noovimba banomthamo ongaphantsi koxinzelelo ngenxa yobushushu obukwiqondo eliphezulu e-Gauteng, kwaye ukwanda kwemfuneko yamanzi kunyanzelise i-Rand Water ukuba icuthe ngesaquphe unikezelo lwamanzi kwaba masipala.

src_text: Khamphane ena ya metsi fepela batho ba fetang dimilione tse 11 Gauteng le karolong tse ding tsa Mpumalanga, Foreisitata le Leboya Bophirima..   Ho fokotswa hona ha phepelo ka hona ho ikemiseditswe ho leka ho baballa metsi ho fihlela maemo ntlafala.
tgt_text: Eli ziko lamanzi libonelela ngobuninzi bamanzi aselwayo kubantu abangaphezu kwezigidi ezili-11 e-Gauteng, kwiindawo zaseMpumalanga, eFreystata naseMntla Ntshona.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho setjhaba hore se tswele pele ho ikobela dipehelo tsa ho fokotswa hona ha phepelo ya metsi ka hore se sebedise ka nepo..   Seteraeke sa ha Transnet.
tgt_text: Ezi zithintelo esingakwaziyo ukuzibaleka zenzelwe ukuqinisekisa ukuba siyaqhubeka nokuphaka amanzi ngendlela ezinzileyo, kwaye zisezakuhlala zikhona de imeko ibe bhetele.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse tumellano ya nyollelo ya meputso ya dilemo tse tharo fihletsweng ke mokgatlo wa basebetsi wa United National Transport Union (UNTU), le Transnet tla qala morao ho tloha ka la 1 Mmesa 2022 ho fihlela ka la 31 Tlhakubele.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ihlabe ikhwelo kuluntu ukuba luqhubeleke luyithobela imiqathango yothintelo lwamanzi kwaye ludlale indima yalo ngokusebenzisa ngokonga amanzi kuba abaluleke kakhulu futhi anqongophele..   Ugwayimbo lakwa-Transnet.

src_text: Komeshene ya Tharollo ya Ditaba tsa Basebetsi (CCMA) ke yona neng laola dipuisano tsena mme sena se tlisitse mohwanto ona wa ditho tsa UNTU pheletsong hanghang.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isamkele isivumelwano semivuzo yeminyaka emithathu ekufikelelwe kuso phakathi kuka-Transnet nombutho wabasebenzi i-United National Transport Union (i-UNTU), esi sivumelwano sizosebenza ukusuka kumhla woku-1 kuTshazimpunzi 2022 ukuya kowama-31 kweyoKwindla.

src_text: Kabinete boetse ya amohela kgoeletso ya mokgatlo wa basebetsi wa South African Transport and Allied Workers Union wa ho fedisa seteraeke sa bona..   Kabinete amohela hape boinehelo ba Transnet ba ho shebana le mosebetsi wa ho leka ho fokotsa mosebetsi saletseng morao boemakepeng le ditereneng tse tsamaisang thepa bakilweng ke seteraeke sena leng se ammeng moruo wa naha le bohle ba tshepetseng tshebeletsong ya Transnet..   Kabinete leboha tshehetso le tshebedisano mmoho bontshitsweng ke dikgwebo nakong ena ya seteraeke.
tgt_text: IKomishini yoXolelwaniso, kunye noLamlo ingenelele ngokulamla esi sivumelwano esenze ukuba luphele ngoko nangoko ugwayimbo obeluqhutywa ngamalungu e-UNTU.

src_text: Kabinete kgothaletsa taba ya hore dikamano tsena di tswele pele pakeng tsa Transnete le mekgatlo ya basebetsi molemong wa khamphane le moruo wa naha..   Dikamano tsa Afrika Borwa le naha ya Saudi Arabia.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwasamkele isigqibo sombutho i-South African and Allied Workers Union (i-SATAWU) sokurhoxisa olu gwayimbo.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ketelo bileng le katleho ya Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa naheng ya Saudi Arabia ka la 15 le la 16 Mphalane.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuzibophelela kuka-Transnet ekubeni agxininise ekugqibeni umsebenzi osemva okuwo wonke amazibuko noololiwe obangelwe lolu gwayimbo, oluchaphazele uqoqosho kunye namacandelo axhomekeke kwiinkonzo zale arhente.

src_text: Ketelong ena dinaha tsena tse pedi di ile tsa saena ditumellano tse 17 makaleng mangata kenyeletsang la temo, botshwasi ba dihlapi, la merafo, ho fehlwa ha motlakase ka tsela ya tlhaho, tsa tshireletso, dipalangwang le la tlhahiso ya dimela le diphoofolo tsa lewatleng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivakalise umbulelo wayo kwinkxaso nentsebenziswano ebisuka kwabezoshishino ngethuba logwayimbo.

src_text: Ho boetswe ha saenwa le ditumellano tsa ho thehwa ha Moifo wa tsa Kgwebo le tshebedisano ho tsa sesole le theko ya thepa ya mmuso ha mmoho le tsa tlhahlobo ya maemo lefatshe..   Mopresidente sebedisitse monyetla ona ho mema ba tsa kgwebo Saudi Arabia ho tla sebokeng sa bohlano sa matsete sa Afrika Borwa se tla ba isao ka.
tgt_text: Ikhuthaza ubudlelwane obukhona phakathi kwabalawuli bakwa-Transnet nabasebenzi ukuze kuxhamle inkampani noqoqosho lwelizwe.

src_text: Saudi Arabia ke naha ya bobedi ka boholo hwebelanang le Afrika Borwa dinaheng tsa Botjhabela ba Bohareng mme hape ke naha eo ho yona ho rekwang thepa ngata tikolohong ena.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwane boMzantsi Afrika ne-Saudi Arabia.

src_text: Dikamano tsa dinaha tsena di tlisitse tshebedisano ntle ho tsa kgwebo le matsete..   Matsete Meralo ya Motheo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ilwamkele uTyelelo lokuSebenza lukaMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa e-Kingdom of  Saudi Arabia olubeyimpumelelo, lwangomhla we-15 nowe-16 kweyeDwarha.

src_text: Kabinete amohela taba ya ho simollwa ha sitsi sa tlhahiso sa dihlahiswa tsa polasitiki sa maemo pele mane Lanseria Gauteng ke khamphane ya matjhaba ya ALPLA Group.
tgt_text: Kolu tyelelo, la mazwe mabini atyikitye iZivumelwano Zokusebenzisana (ii-MoU) ezili-17 kumacandelo ohlukeneyo afana nezolimo, ezokuloba, ezemigodi, amandla ombane ohlaziyekayo, ukhuseleko, ezothutho kunye nezolimo lwasemanzini.

src_text: Sena se paka boinehelo ba Mopresidente Ramaphosa ba ho ntshetsa meralo ya motheo pele jwalo ka mokgwa wa ho nyolla moruo le menyetla ya mosebetsi..   Sena ke projeke ya matsete bitsang tjhelete dimilione di 50 tsa ditollara tsa Amerika mme ke karolo ya projeke ya moralo wa Toropo sebedisang Marangrang ya Lanseria.
tgt_text: Ezinye ii-MoU ezityikityiweyo zisekusekweni kweBhunga lezoShishino eliDityanelweyo, intsebenziswano kushishino lomkhosi nokuthengwa kwempahla, kunye nentsebenziswano kuphando lwejiyoloji.

src_text: Projeke ena tla hlahisa botsitso moruong thehe le mesebetsi ka bang.
tgt_text: UMongameli usebenzise olu tyelelo ukumema amashishini ase-Saudi Arabia kwinkomfa yesihlanu yotyalo-mali eMzantsi Afrika eza kubanjwa ngonyaka wama-.

src_text: Projeke ena kenyeletsa le mananeo 36 thupello ya boratekginiki ho tsa motlakase le ho lokiswa ha metjhini mmoho le ho tsoselletswa botjha ha dintho tse lahlilweng.
tgt_text: I-Saudi Arabia ililizwe elikwindawo yesibini ngokomthamo  wezorhwebo kumazwe arhweba noMzantsi Afrika kummandla woMbindi Mpuma, kwaye eli lizwe lingowona mthombo mkhulu wezinto ezithengwayo ezingena eMzantsi Afrika ezivela kulo mmandla.

src_text: Ba rupelletsweng lenaneong lena ba tla sebetsa ho ALPLA Group dinaheng tsohle tse Afrika ka borwa.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwane phakathi kwala mazwe omabini bunesiqhamo esihle kurhwebo notyalo-mali.

src_text: Lenaneo lena la thupello le tla qala ka 2023 mme ba 12 ba pele ho tla rupellwa ba tla kgethwa hona mona setjhabeng..   Ho Rashwa Ntle le Molao.
tgt_text: Utyalo-mali kwiziseko zophuhliso.

src_text: Ho rashwa ntle le molao ho lematsa setjhaba le moruo wa rona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuqaliswa kwamalungiselelo okwakha iziko elikumgangatho ophezulu lokuvelisa iiplastiki yinkampani ephambili kwihlabathi, , i-ALPLA Group, e-Lanseria e-Gauteng.

src_text: Sena se tlisa tahlehelo ya lekeno mmusong le lekaleng la merafo..   Kabinete thabetse ho hatjwa ha dithunya le ho tshwarwa ha babelaellwa ba 20 ba belaellwang ketsong tsena tsa ho rafa ntle le molao mane Stillfontein Leboya Bophirima..   Kabinete etsa boipiletso ho mekgatlo qobellang melao ho netefatsa hore matsholo bona a atleha.
tgt_text: Oku kongeza ekuzinikeleni kukaMongameli Ramaphosa ekubekeni uphuhliso lweziseko ezingundoqo njengendlela yokuvuselela uqoqosho nokwandisa imisebenzi.

src_text: Sena se tla romela molaetsa pakang hore tlolo tsa molao ha di na molemo, dinokwane di tshwarwa di kwallwe ntle le tshabo..   Motlakase.
tgt_text: Olu tyalo-mali oluxabisa ama-50 ezigidi zeedola zaseMelika ligalelo elingundoqo kwisicwangciso esikhulu sedolophu yale mihla, ii-Lanseria Smart City esiceba ukuqhuba uzinzo kunye nohlaziyo lweemveliso kwanokudala nokugcina imisebenzi engama-.

src_text: Eskom sa tswa saena tumellano ya dilemo tse 30 le bahlahisi ba ikemetseng ba tla fehla motlakase seteisheneng sa Majuba le sa Tutuka mane Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: Kukwabandakanywe nenkqubo yokuqeqeshelwa umsebenzi kubasebenzi abangama-36 abazakuba ziingcaphephe zokusebenza ngoomatshini neengcali zokuhlaziya iinkunkuma ibeyimveliso entsha kwimisebenzi yeenkampani ye-ALPLA Group kuwo wonke amazwe  akumazantsi e-Afrika.

src_text: Kgiro ya lefatshe leo ho tlo ahwa diteishene tsena ho lona le tla tlisa matsete ballwang ho dibilione tse 40 tsa diranta..   Dikhamphane tse nne tse tla fehla motlakase ona ke – HDF Energy South Africa, Red Rocket SA, Sola Group le Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – mme di tla eketsa motlakase wa 2 000 megawatts phepelong ya naha.
tgt_text: Inkqubo yokuqeqeshelwa umsebenzi iza kuqalisa ngonyaka wama-2023, abafundi bokuqala abali-12 baseMzantsi Afrika bazakuba bephuma kuluntu lwasekuhlaleni.

src_text: Motlakase ona tla hokelwa phepelong ya naha dikgweding tse 24 ho isa ho tse 36 ka mora ho phethelwa ha ditlhoko tse hlokahalang tsa ditjhelete mmoho le ditumello tse mabapi le tshebediso ya mobu..   Paballo ya Tlhahiso ya Dijo.
tgt_text: Ukwembiwa kwemigodi ngokungekho mthethweni.

src_text: Kabinete amohela ho tshwarwa ha seboka sa Agri SA sa 2022 mane Tshwane ka la 13 le 14 Mphalane 2022 tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Re Hlahisa tsa Lehae”.
tgt_text: Ukwembiwa kwemigodi ngokungekho mthethweni kulimaza uluntu kunye noqoqosho lwethu, kwaye kukhokelela kwilahleko yengeniso karhulumente nakwicandelo lezemigodi.

src_text: Sebokeng sena ho sekasekilwe taba tse kenyeletsang moralo bakeng sa tlhahiso ya lehae, meralo ya motheo bakeng sa bahlahisi ba lehae; ho etsa tikoloho ya rona dumelle tlhahiso ya dijo bakeng sa nako tlang ha mmoho le ho thusa bahlahisi ba lehae tshebetsong ya bona ya ho hlahisa dijo kwano..   Bakeng sa paballo ya nako tlang ya tlhahiso ya dijo, Kabinete amohetse ho thehwa ha Sitsi sa Naha sa Thibelo ya Ditshwaetso tse amang Leruo le Dijalo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuthinjwa kwemipu emininzi kunye nokubanjwa kwabarhanelwa abangama-20 aboyamene nokwembiwa kwemigodi ngokungekho mthethweni ngethuba kuqhutywa iphulo lokulwa nolu lwaphulo-mthetho kumgodi wase-Stilfontein eMntla Ntshona.

src_text: Sena se etswa ke Lekala la Mahlale tsa Temo Lefapheng la Saense le Mahlale ka kopanelo le Yunivesithi ya Tshwane.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibongoza abemi boMzantsi Afrika ukuba baqhubeleke nokusebenzisana nee-arhente zogcino-mthetho ukuze kuqinisekwe ukuba nakwilixa elizayo amaphulo okulwa nolwaphulo-mthetho abayimpumelelo.

src_text: Sitsi sena se tla thusa thibelong le ho fokotseng ditshwaetso tsa dijalo le diphoofolo leng se tla tshehetsa tlhahiso ya dijo le ntshetsopele ya dibaka tsa mahaeng   Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Oku kuza kuthumela umyalezo ongqongqo wokuba ulwaphulo-mthetho alunanzuzo, kwaye izaphuli-mthetho ziza kubanjwa, zitshutshiswe ngaphandle koloyiko okanye ukwenzelela.

src_text: Ho Lokiswa ha Tokomane ya Mokgatlo wa Dinaha tsa Afrika.
tgt_text: Amandla ombane.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tokomane ya Mokgatlo wa Dinaha tsa Afrika bakeng sa Dipehelo, Keketso ya Matla Tshebetso, Taolo ya Bommasepala le Ntshetso pele ya bona ho tla tla lokiswa.
tgt_text: Kutshanje u-Eskom utyikitye izivumelwano zengqeshiso yomhlaba zeminyaka engama-30 nabatyali-zimali abane abazimeleyo abavelisa umbane ukuze bakhe amaziko amatsha okuvelisa amandla ombane ococekileyo kwizikhululo zombane zaseMajuba naseTutuka eMpumalanga.

src_text: Afrika Borwa ne saene Tokomane ena ka Phato.
tgt_text: Ezi zivumelwano zokuqeshisa ngomhlaba ziza kutsala utyalo-mali oluqikelelwa malunga nama-40 eebhiliyoni zeerandi.

Abatyali-zimali abane – i-HDF Energy South Africa, i-Red Rocket SA, i-Sola Group kunye ne-Mainstream Power Renewable Developments South Africa – baza kufaka ubuncinane iimegawathi ezingama-2 000 kwiziko lombane lesizwe.

src_text: Tokomane ena ya Keketso ya Matla Tshebetso fana ka moralo dinaheng tsohle tseo leng ditho mabapi le taba ya keketso ya tsela tsa tshebetso ho tloha boemong ba naha ho isa maemong ohle mmuso.
tgt_text: La maziko matsha okuvelisa umbane kulindeleke ukuba aqhagamshelwe kuthungelwano lombane kwisithuba seenyanga ezingama-24 ukuya kwezingama-36 ukusuka kumhla wokutyikitywa kwezivumelwano zezimali, kodwa ke konke oku kuzakuxhomekeka kumaphepha-mvume endalo, okucandwa komhlaba kunye neminye imithetho enxulumene nolawulo lomhlaba.

src_text: Tokomane ena shebane haholo le temana ya katoloso ya matla tshebetso maemong bommasepala le ntshetsopele ya bona..   Kopano ya Matjhaba ya bo 32 ya Selemo le Selemo ya Polokeho Ditereneng (IRSC).
tgt_text: Ukufumaneka kokutya.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarelwa ha kopano ya bo 32 ya Selemo le Selemo ya IRSC Johannesburg ho tloha ka la 1 ho isa ka la 6 Mphalane 2023, tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Re lokisa diterene tsa rona Maemong sa Lokang”.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukusingathwa kweNkongolo ye-Agri SA yowama-2022 ePitoli ngomhla we-13 nowe-14 kweyeDwarha 2022 phantsi komxholo othi: “Silima Ukutya ekuHlaleni”.

src_text: IRSC ke foramo ya matjhaba kopanyang ditsebi ho tsa polokeho ho tsa diterene boemong ba matjhaba ho tla hlabana malotsana ka tsa ntlafatso ya polokeho ditereneng..   Mokgatlo wa Afrika Borwa wa tsa Polokeho ho tsa Diterene ne qetele ho tshwara kopano ena ka selemo sa.
tgt_text: Le nkongolo ibishukuxa imiba efana nokwenza izicwangciso eziphambili kwezolimo zisebenzele abalimi basekuhlaleni; iziseko zophuhliso ezizinzileyo zokutya okulinywa ekuhlaleni; ukwenza imo yendalo nokusingqongileyo kwendawo kukwazi ukugcina imveliso yokutya okuveliswa ekuhlaleni nakwixesha elizayo, kunye nokomeleza amandla abavelisi bokutya ukuze bakwazi ukuqhubeka nemveliso elinywe ekuhlaleni.

Ekubekeni phambili ukufumaneka kokutya, iKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuphehlelelwa kweziko lesizwe lezoKhuseleko lwendalo i-National Biosecurity Hub, ngaphantsi kwenkqubo ye-Agricultural Bio-economy Innovation Partnership Programme, okuyinkqubo yeSebe lezeNzululwazi kunye nokuSungulwa Kwezinto eyenziwe ngentsebenziswano neYunivesithi yasePitoli.

src_text: Mokgahlelo wa Bobedi wa Moralo wa Naha wa Selemo sa 2050 wa Meralo ya Motheo (NIP 2050).
tgt_text: Eli ziko liza kuxhasa uthintelo, ukuncitshiswa kunye nolawulo lwezifo zezityalo nezilwanyana, nto leyo eza kuba negalelo elihle ekwandeni kwemveliso, ukufumaneka kokutya kunye nophuhliso oluzinzileyo lwasemaphandleni   Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho hatiswa ha mokgahlelo wa bobedi wa moralo wa NIP 2050 bukeng ya diphatlalatso tsa mmuso bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.
tgt_text: Ukuqinisekiswa koMqulu wokuNabisa amaGunya weManyano ye-Afrika (i-AU).

src_text: Moralo ona fana ka tataiso tabeng ya maano tshebetso le diprojeke tsa mmuso..   Moralo ona hlwaya ditshebetso tsa diprojeke lekaleng la ho dudiswa ha setjhaba, ditshebeletso tsa bommasepala tse kenyeletsang motlakase; metsi; ho thothwa ha matlakala; dipalangwang tsa setjhaba; meralo ya motheo ya tsa thuto, bophelo le dijithale le thibelo ya bobodu le bonokwane..   Moralo ona bontsha moo ho hlokahalang ho tsepamiswa maikutlo teng, le ho lekola maemo teng renang ha jwale le se tlamehang ho etswa bakeng sa ho fihlela tjhebelo pele ya moralo ona.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa ePalamente koMqulu we-AU oqulathe iMithetho-siseko yokuNatyiswa Kwamagunya, uLawulo lweeNgingqi kunye noPhuhliso lwaseKhaya.

src_text: Moralo ona eletsa hore tshebetso ya moralo ona be ya nako ya dilemo tse tharo.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika utyikitye lo mqulu kweyeThupha kowama-..   UMqulu wokuNabisa amaGunya ubonelela ngoxwebhu olusisikhokelo kuwo onke amazwe angamalungu e-AU, esi sikhokelo simalunga nokunatyiswa kwamagunya nemisebenzi yabasemagunyeni ukusuka kuzwelonke ukuya nakwamanye amanqanaba karhulumente.
