src_text: Motlakase.
tgt_text: Umbane.

src_text: Kabinete ananetse ho thakgolwa ha Letlole la Tlhokomelo ya Mehlodi (RMF) ke Letona la Motlakase Kantorong ya Mopresidente, Ngaka Kgosientsho Ramokgopa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuphehlelelwa kweNgxowa-mali yokuHlanganisa iziBonelelo (i-RMF) nguMphathiswa wezoMbane kwi-Ofisi kaMongameli, uGq Kgosientsho Ramokgopa.

src_text: Tshebedisano-mmoho ena pakeng tsa mmuso le Business Unity South Africa batla ho fana ka disebediswa le boitsebelo ho thusa mmuso ho kenya tshebetsong ka nepo Leano la Tshebetso ya Motlakase le neng le phatlalatswe ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ka Phupu 2022, le Puong ya Maemo Naha (SoNA) ya 2023 le mohlala wa tshebedisano ntle ya setjhaba se sebetsang hantle le ho tiisa boitshepo ba Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Le ntsebenziswano phakathi kukarhulumente ne-Business Unity South Africa ijonge ukubonelela ngezixhobo nobuchule ukuze urhulumente akwazi ukuzalisekisa isiCwangciso sokuSebenza kwezaMandla esabhengezwa nguMongameli uCyril Ramaphosa kweyeKhala yowama-2022 kunye nakwiNtetho kaMongameli engoBume beSizwe (i-SoNA) yowama-2023 njengomzekelo wentsebenziswano phakathi kwamahlakani ezentlalo kunye nokuthembeka okuqhubekayo kuMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: RMF tla matlafatsa mosebetsi wa Komiti ya Naha ya Mathata Motlakase ho fihlella maikemisetso yona ho fedisa ho tingwa ha motlakase ka maikemisetso ho baballa Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: I-RMF iza kukhulisa umsebenzi weKomiti yeSizwe yeNgxaki yezaMandla (i-NECC) ukuze ifezekise injongo yayo yokuphelisa ingxaki kacimi-cimi wombane eMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Kabinete ipileditse ho bankakarolo bohle ho kenya letsoho ho kengweng tshebetsong ha Leano la Tshebetso ya Motlakase bakeng sa ho sebetsana le mathata bakwang ke ho kgaolwa hona ha motlakase moruong.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ibongoze bonke abachaphazelekayo ukuba bafake isandla ekuphunyezweni kwesiCwangciso sokuSebenza kwezaMandla ukuze kuliwe nomthwalo onzima wengxaki kacimi-cimi wombane kuqoqosho.

src_text: Kabinete lemohile dingongoreho tse sa tswa hlahiswa ke S&P Global Ratings tsa hore kgolo ya moruo wa Afrika Borwa tobane le kgatello ntseng eketseha bakang mathata meralo ya motheo, haholoholo kgaello matla ya motlakase.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iqaphele inkxalabo ephakanyiswe kutshanje yi-S&P Global Ratings yokuba ukukhula koqoqosho loMzantsi Afrika kubanjezelwa kukunqongophala kweziseko ezingundoqo, ingakumbi ukunqongophala kombane okumandla.

src_text: Ho sebetsana le phephetso ena, mmuso tlile le mehato fapafapaneng kenyeletsang ho matlafatsa matlotlo mmuso, diphetoho tse potlakileng tsa moruo le mehato potlakileng ya nako kgutshwane ya ho fokotsa ho tingwa hona ha motlakase le ho fetola lekala lena ka ho tlisa diphetoho mebarakeng ka sepheo sa ho fihlela tharollo ya nako telele ya motlakase.
tgt_text: Ukukhawulelana nalo mcelimngeni, urhulumente sele eqalise uthotho lwamanyathelo anzima, aquka ukuqiniswa kwezimali, uhlengahlengiso olukhawulezileyo lwezoqoqosho kunye namanyathelo angxamisekileyo ajolise ekunciphiseni ingxaki kacimi-cimi wombane ngoku kunye nokuguqula eli candelo ngokwenza iinguqu kulo ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuba siza kuba nombane owaneleyo kule minyaka izayo.

src_text: Kabinete hape amohetse ho bulwa ha nako ya dikopo tsa boiketo ba tlhahiso ya motlakase dimekawate tse 513 (MW) ka kgonang ho bolokwang ho dibetri jwalo ka karolo ya ho matlafatsa karabello ya rona ho phephetso ya motlakase.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuvulwa kwesithuba sokufaka izicelo zokuvelisa iibhetri ezinomthamo wokugcina umbane ozimegawathi (MW) ezingama-513  njengenxalenye yokomeleza indlela esisabela ngayo kumngeni wombane.

src_text: Letsatsi la ho qetela la ho kenya dikopo ke la 5 Phupu 2023 ka 17:00 mme bohle ba nang le thahasello ba ka tlatsa foromo ya ngodiso ya elektroniki fumanehang ho: www.ipp-storage.co.za .
tgt_text: Umhla wokuvala ukungeniswa kwezicelo ngowe-5 kweyeKhala 2023 ngentsimbi yesi-17:00 kwaye onke amaqela anomdla angayizalisa ifom yobhaliso ekwikhompyutha efumanekayo apha: www.ipp-storage.co.za .

src_text: Kabinete hape amohetse qeto ya Letona la Meru, Ditlhapi le Tikoloho, Barbara Creecy, ya ho dumella Eskom ho fetisa tekanyetso dumeletsweng ho Laesene ya yona ya mosi tswang metjhining ya yona fehlang motlakase.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwasamkele isigqibo soMphathiswa wezaMahlathi, wezokuLoba nokusiNgqongileyo, uNksz Barbara Creecy, sokuba u-Eskom angaqukwa kwabo baza kulandela inkqubo ende efunekayo yokwenza izilungiso kwi-Atmospheric Emission Licence yakhe.

src_text: Ho ya ka Eskom, tumello ena tla thusa ho kenya tshebetsong tharollo ya nakwana ya ho lokisa Seteishene sa Motlakase sa Kusile ka Pudungwana 2023 mme sena se tla thusa hore seteishene sena se fehle dimekawate tse 2 100 (MW) tse tla fokotsa ho tingwa hona ha motlakase ka dikgato tse pedi.
tgt_text: Ngokuka-Eskom, oku kumnceda akwazi ukusebenzisa isisombululo sexeshana kumonakalo okwiSikhululo soMbane iKusile ngeyeNkanga wama-2023 kwaye ngaloo ndlela ivumele isikhululo sombane ukuba siphinde siqalise ukuvelisa umthamo weemegawathi ezingama-2 100 (MW) nto leyo eya kunciphisa ingxaki kacimi-cimi eMzantsi Afrika ngamanqanaba amabini.

src_text: National Education, Health and Allied Workers' Union (NEHAWU).
tgt_text: Ugwayimbo lwe-National Education, Health and Allied Worker’s Union (i-NEHAWU).

src_text: Ka seteraeke sa NEHAWU, Kabinete amohetse ho tekenwa ha Tumellano ya Tharollo Lekgotleng la Ditherisano tsa Basebeletsi ba Mmuso (PSCBC) le rarollang ditherisano tsa meputso tsa selemo sa 2022/23 le ho fedisa seteraeke ha mmoho le ho kgutlisetsa mekga kaofela Lekgotleng la Ditherisano bakeng sa ditherisano tsa meputso tsa selemo sa 2023/..     Kabinete tswetse pele ho leboha mekga ileng ya tswelapele le ditherisano ho PSCBC.
tgt_text: Kugwayimbo lwe-NEHAWU, iKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukutyikitywa kweSivumelwano sokuPheliswa koGwayimbo kwiBhunga loThetha-thethwano loLungelelaniso lweNkonzo kaRhulumente (i-PSCBC) esisombulula iingxoxo zothethathethwano ngemivuzo yowama-2022/23 nokuphelisa ugwayimbo kwakunye nokubuyisela onke amaqela achaphazelekayo kwiBhunga loThetha-thethwano kuxoxwe ngemivuzo yowama-2023/..     IKhabhinethi iphinde yavakalisa umbulelo wayo kwezo manyano zabasebenzi zithe zahlala kwi-PSCBC ukuqhubeka nothethathethwano.

src_text: Sena se bontsha boitlamo ba mmuso tshebetsong ya ditherisano, le ho sebetsa le balekane bohle ba amehang ho netefatsa hore boholo ba ditherisano tse kopanetsweng bo sireletswa le ho hlomphuwa.
tgt_text: Iphinde yakubethelela ukuzibophelela kukarhulumente kwinkqubo yothethathethwano, nokusebenzisana nawo onke amahlakani afanelekileyo ukuqinisekisa ukubaluleka kokusombulula izinto ngokubonisa ukuhlala kuhlonitshwa.

src_text: Re rata ho netefatsa hore molao reng HA SA SEBETSA HA LEFUWE tla sebetsa hang-hang mme tjhelete tla hulwa ka dikgwedi tse nne tse tlang jwalo ka ha ho dumellano.
tgt_text: Masikucacise ukuba ABASEBENZI ABEBENGAPHANGELANGA NGETHUBA LOGWAYIMBO ABAZIKUBHATALWA.

src_text: Lefapha la Basebeletsi ba Mmuso le Tsamaiso le tla beha leihlo ho kenngwa tshebetsong ka botlalo ha tumellano tsena.
tgt_text: Imali yezi ntsuku bangaziphangelanga iza kuxhuzulwa ngezavenge kwezi nyanga zine zizayo, njengenxalenye yeSivumelwano sokuPheliswa koGwayimbo.

src_text: Ho feta moo, makala qobello ya molao tla sala morao diketso tsa botlokotsebe tse entsweng nakong ya seteraeke, mme baokamedi ka ho fapana ba tla shebana le diketso tsena tsa tlolo ya molao ho latela Melao ya Boitshwaro ya Basebeletsi ba Mmuso.
tgt_text: ISebe lezaBasebenzi bakaRhulumente noLawulo liya kubeka esweni ukuphunyezwa ngokupheleleyo kwezi zigqibo.

src_text: Ho Kwalwa ha Naha.
tgt_text: Ukongeza, ii-arhente zogcino-mthetho ziza kulandela izenzo zolwaphulo-mthetho ezenziwe ngexesha logwayimbo, ngeli lixa abaphathi abahlukeneyo baya kuhoya izenzo ezaphula uMgaqo wokuZiphatha wabaSebenzi bakaRhulumente.

src_text: Kabinete hlahisitse matshwenyeho ka boipiletso ba mohwanto reretsweng Mantaha wa la 20 Tlhakubele 2023 mme nka sena le ketso ya ho hloka boikarabelo le bohlaswa.
tgt_text: Uqhankqalazo lukazwelonke.

src_text: Sehlopha sa Toka, Thibelo ya Botlokotsebe le Tshireletseho (JCPS) se sebetsana le mosebetsi wa ho netefatsa hore bohle ba ikobela molao.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivakalise ukuxhalaba ngezimemezo zoqhankqalazo ezicetywayo ngoMvulo, umhla wama-20 kweyoKwindla ngowama-2023 kwaye ithi ukwenza oku kubonakalisa ukungakhathali nokutsalela ecaleni.

src_text: Ditletlebo tseo ba llang ka tsona leng ho fedisa ho tingwa ha motlakase ka sepheo sa ho baballa, ditjeho tse phahameng tsa ho reka ntho tse batho ba iphedisang ka tsona, le leqeme la mesebetsi ke tseo Mopresidente Ramaphosa boletseng ka tsona ho SoNA ka la 9 Hlakola.
tgt_text: INtlanganisela yezoBulungisa, uThintelo loLwaphulo-mthetho kunye noKhuseleko (i-JCPS) lizixakekise ngomsebenzi wokuqinisekisa ukuba ulwaphulo-mthetho alunyanyezelwa.

src_text: Mabapi le ho fedisa ho tingwa ha motlakase, Mopresidente hirile Letona la Motlakase Ngaka Ramokgopa ya shebaneng feela le ho fedisa ho tingwa hona ha motlakase.
tgt_text: Ezi zikhalazo kutyholwa ngazo zimalunga nokupheliswa kokucinywa kombane, iindleko eziphakamileyo zokuphila kunye nenqanaba eliphezulu lentswela-ngqesho zaphendulwa nguMongameli Ramaphosa ngexesha le-SoNA ngomhla we-9 kweyoMdumba.

src_text: Ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Leano la Tshebetso la Dintlha tse Hlano ho ntse ho tswelapele ka matla mme Letona la Motlakase dibekeng tse tlang le tla phatlalatsa mekgwa eo Eskom tla latela mabapi le ho fedisa ho tingwa hona ha motlakase..     Ka ho le leng hape, Mopresidente ho SoNA ya hae ya 2023 buile ka mehato behilweng bakeng sa ho sebetsana le maemo hodimo tlhokeho ya mesebetsi ya batjha le ditjheo tse hodimo tsa bophelo.
tgt_text: Malunga nomba wengxaki kacimi-cimi  wombane, uMongameli uqeshe uMphathiswa wezoMbane, uGq Ramokgopa, noza kujongana kuphela nokulwa ingxaki kacimi-cimi wombane.

src_text: Ka hona, seo ba se hwantelang feela ke ho tlosa Mopresidente Ramaphosa setulong ka tsela kgahlano le molaotheo.
tgt_text: Ukuphunyezwa kwesiCwangciso sokuSebenza saMandla esinaManqaku amaHlanu kuyaqhuba ngenzondelelo kwaye uMphathiswa wezoMbane kwiiveki ezizayo uza kubhengeza imisebenzi ejolise kuyo u-Eskom ekupheliseni ukucinywa kombane..     UMongameli kwi-SoNA yakhe yowama-2023 wathetha nangamanyathelo amiselweyo okujongana namazinga aphezulu olutsha olungaphangeliyo kunye neendleko zokuphila.

src_text: Re batla ho tsebisa bohle hore HO FETOLA PUSO KA TSELA SA DUMELLANENG LE MOLAOTHEO KA SE ETSAHALE AFRIKA BORWA.
tgt_text: Ngoko ke, isikhalazo esishiyekileyo kwezi zibaliweyo zolu qhankqalazo likazwelonke sesokufuna ukususa uMongameli Ramaphosa esikhundleni ngeendlela ezingavisisaniyo nomgaqo-siseko.

src_text: Mang kapa mang ya nang le ditabatabelo tsa ho busa naha ena tlameha ho emela dikhetho tsa naha kaofela tsa.
tgt_text: Sifuna ukubazisa bonke ukuba UKUTSHINTSHA UMBUSO OPHETHEYO NGOKUSEBENZISA IINDLELA EZINXAMNYE NOMGAQO-SISEKO AKUYI KWENZEKA EMZANTSI AFRIKA.

src_text: Boiteko ba ho hlokisa naha botsitso bo ke se dumellwe.
tgt_text: Nabani na oneminqweno yokulawula eli lizwe makalinde ukuze angenele unyulo lowama-.

src_text: Re boetse hape re tlameha ho hlakisa hore ha re no dumella mokgwa ofe kapa ofe wa ho fetola maikutlo setjhaba ho tsa dipolotiki ka kgang Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Iinzame zokudala uphazamiseko nezidubedube elizweni ziya kuhlangatyezwana nengalo yomthetho.

src_text: Kabinete boetse lemohile ditaba tseo seng nnete tsa dihlopha tse ipolelang hore di nehile Kabinete matsatsi supileng ho kwala dikolo.
tgt_text: Kufuneka kwakhona sicacise ukuba akukho vuk’engceni wezopolitiko uza kulukuhla abemi boMzantsi Afrika benze izinto ezinxamnye nomthetho.

src_text: Khalendara ya dikolo  tsohle tsa Afrika Borwa tsa mmuso le tsa poraefete neng phatlaladitswe bukeng ya diphatlalatso tsa mmuso ka Tlhakubele 2022 se ntse hlwaya letsatsi la la 20 Tlhakubele 2023 jwalo ka letsatsi le ikgethang la phomolo la dikolo.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iwavile namaqela abhibhidla amazinyo esithi anike iKhabhinethi iintsuku ezisixhenxe ukuba zivalwe izikolo.

src_text: Ho ile ha hlaka hore ho na le boiteko ba ho leka ho iphumanela tlotla siyo.
tgt_text: Ikhalenda yezikolo zaseMzantsi Afrika yezikolo zikarhulumente nezikolo zabucala, eyapapashwa kwigazethi kweyoKwindla 2022, sele iwubeke njengeholide yesikolo eyodwa umhla wama-20 kweyoKwindla.

src_text: Ho etswa se tshwanang matsatsing ohle pakeng tsa mafelo beke le letsatsi la phomolo.
tgt_text: Kudala lo mkhuba wokuqhayisa ngezinto ezingenamsebenzi ukhona, yile nto kanye ngoku aba baphambili kulo mkhuba bafuna ukuyenza, benze ngathi inyanzeliswe ngabo into eqhelekileyo yokwenziwa iholide yesikolo eyodwa kosuku oluphakathi kweentsuku ezimbini zeholide kawonke-wonke..     Inkqubo kaMongameli yobuNkokheli boLutsha.

src_text: Lenaneo la Mopresidente la Boetapele ba Batjha.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuphehlelelwa kweNkqubo kaMongameli yobuNkokheli boLutsha nguMongameli Ramaphosa ngomhla we-10 kweyoKwindla 2023, kwiDyunivesithi yase-Walter Sisulu, eMthatha, nalapho kwasekwa inkqubo yobudlelwane phakathi kwe-Afrika yonkana.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ho thankgololwa ha Lenaneo la Mopresidente la Boetapele ba batjha ke Mopresidente Ramaphosa ka la 10 Tlhakubele 2023, mane Yunivesiting ya Walter Sisulu, mane Mthatha, le ho thehwa ha lenaneo la kopanelo Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Oku kube yinxalenye yeseshoni yokusungulwa kweNgxoxo yoLutsha luka-Nelson Mandela phantsi komxholo othi: “Ubunkokeli obusesikweni nobuphakathi kwezizukulwana nge-Afrika engcono”.

src_text: Sena se thehile karolo ya kopano ya ho qala ya Dipuisano tsa Batjha ba Nelson Mandela tlasa mookotaba: “Boetapele bo nang le maitshwaro le meloko fapaneng bakeng sa Afrika betere”.
tgt_text: Eli qonga lobunkokheli phakathi kwezizukulwana lomeleza izicwangciso nezivumelwano ezikhoyo kwilizwekazi ngokubanzi ezifana ne-Ajenda yeManyano ye-Afrika yowama-2063, uMqulu we-Afrika woLutsha kunye neSivumelwano soMmandla woRhwebelwano weLizwekazi le-Afrika.

src_text: Lepatlelo lena la boetapele ba meloko fapaneng le matlafatsa meralo le ditumellano tse seng di le teng tsa kontinente ka bophara tse jwalo ka Lenaneo la Kopano ya Afrika la 2063, Tjhatha ya Batjha ba Afrika le Tumellano ya Sebaka sa Kgwebisano Senang Ditshita ya Kontinente ya Afrika.
tgt_text: Isivumelwano seNkqubo-sikhokelo sokwakhiwa kweemoto eMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Tumellano ya Moralo wa ho aha Dikoloi Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi izamkele iindaba zokuba inkampani yeemoto i-Stellantis South Africa ityikitye isivumelwano sokusebenzisana ne-Industrial Development Corporation kunye neSebe lezoRhwebo, uShishino noKhuphiswano ukuze kwakhiwe iziko elitsha lokuvelisa izithuthi eMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ditaba tsa hore khamphani ya dikoloi ya Stellantis Afrika Borwa tekenne tumellano ya tshebedisano le Koporasi ya Tlhabollo ya Diintasteri le Lefapha la Kgwebisano, Diindasteri le Tlhodisano ho bula sebaka sa tlhahiso ya dikoloi Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: I-Stellantis ithengisa i-Jeep, i-Alfa Romeo, i-Fiat, i-Citroën, i-Opel ne-Peugeot eMzantsi Afrika .

src_text: Stellantis rekisa mefuta ya dikoloi tse kang Jeep, Alfa Romeo, Fiat, Citroën, Opel le Peugeot Afrika Borwa.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwane boMzantsi Afrika ne-Tanzania.

src_text: Dikamano tsa Afrika Borwa le Tanzania.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ilwamkele uTyelelo lwasebuRhulumenteni oluza eMzantsi Afrika ngoLwesine, umhla we-16 kweyoKwindla 2023 nguMongameli Samia Suluhu Hassan we-United Republic of Tanzania, ngokumenywa ngugxa wakhe, uMongameli Ramaphosa.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ketelo ya Mopresidente Samia Suluhu Hassan wa Tanzania Afrika Borwa ka Labone, la la 16 Tlhakubele 2023 arabela memo ya mphato wa hae Mopresidente Ramaphosa.
tgt_text: Olu tyelelo lulandela iKomishoni yabaPhathiswa boMzantsi Afrika nabaseTanzania (i-BNC) ebibanjelwe ePitoli ngoLwesithathu, umhla we-15 kweyoKwindla.

src_text: Ketelo ena latela Khomishene ya Matjhaba Kopaneng ya Matona Afrika Borwa le Tanzania (BNC) neng tshwaretswe Tshwane ka Laboraro la 15 Tlhakubele.
tgt_text: Iza kuthwesa iseshoni yesibini ye-BNC yoMzantsi Afrika ne-Tanzania, equka iikomiti ezine: eyezoPolitiko nezoZakuzo; eyoKhuselo noKhuseleko; eyeMicimbi yezoQoqosho, kunye neyezeNtlalo neNkcubeko.

src_text: Yona tla boela ba letshwao la kopano ya bobedi ya BNC ya Afrika Borwa le Tanzania nang le dikomiti tse nne: ya tsa Dipolotiki le tsa Bodiplomate; Paballo le Tshireletso; Ditaba tsa Moruo, tsa Sechaba le Setso.
tgt_text: Ukongeza kumsebenzi wokubambisana noMzantsi Afrika kumzabalazo wenkululeko, i-Tanzania lelinye lamazwe aphambili esirhweba nalo, urhwebo lulonke phakathi kwala mazwe mabini lunyuke ukusuka kwimali ezibhiliyoni eziyi-.

src_text: Ntle le kabelo ya yona ntweng ya Afrika Borwa ya tokoloho, Tanzania ke e nngwe ya dinaha tseo naha ena hwebisanang le tsona mme ka kakaretso matsetse kgwebisano dinaha tsena tlohile ho dibillione tse  89 ka 2021 ho ya ho tse  71 ka.
tgt_text: 89 zeerandi ngowama-2021 laya kutsho kwimali ezibhiliyoni eziyi-.

src_text: Ho na le dikhamphane tse tswang naheng ya Afrika Borwa tse fetang 250 makaleng fapaneng tse naheng ya Tanzania.
tgt_text: 71 zeerandi ngowama-.

src_text: Ho Kopana ha Heineken le Distell.
tgt_text: E-Tanzania kukho iinkampani zoMzantsi Afrika ezingaphezu kwama-250 ezirhweba kumacandelo ahlukeneyo.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse tumello ya Lekgotlana la Ditlhodisano ya ho dumella ho kopana ha khamphane ya Yuropa ya jwala Heineken le ya Afrika Borwa ya Distell Group Holdings.
tgt_text: Ukudityaniswa kwe-Heineken kunye ne-Distell.

src_text: Kopanyo ena tla theha moetsi moholo ka ho fetisisa wa majwala nang le tshukiri ka hara naha itshetlehile ka letoto la maemo kgahleho ya setjhaba kenyeletsang kgodiso ya ntshetsopele ya baabi, paballo ya ditheko tsa lehae, kgothaletso ya matsete ho dipatlisiso le ntshetsopele le ho eketsa bokgoni ba tlhahiso ka naheng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuvunywa yiNkundla yezoKhuphiswano kwesigqibo sokudityaniswa kwenkampani edidiyela utywala yaseYurophu, i-Heineken kunye nevelisa utyalwa yoMzantsi Afrika i-Distell Group Holdings.

src_text: Ho kopana hona ha dikhamphani tsena ho tla boela ho tswela basebetsi molemo ka hore le bona be beng ba diabo khamphaneng leng se tla etsa hore ba be le kemedi botong ya khamphani..     Kgatelopele Tlhokomelong ya Tshenyo ya Dikgohola tsa.
tgt_text: Oku kudityaniswa kwezi nkampani zimbini kuza kudala elona shishini likhulu kweli lizwe elivelisa uhlobo lotywala oluyi-cider, kubekelwe imiqathango ekhokelisa phambili iimfuno zoluntu, eziquka ukuqhutywa kwamaphulo okuphuhlisa ababoneleli-nkonzo, ukuqhubeleka kuthengwa iimveliso zalapha ekhaya, ukukhuthazwa kotyalo-mali kuphando nophuhliso kunye nokwandisa kwesakhono sokuvelisa apha ekhaya.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse kgatelo pele mosebetsing entsweng ke Letona la ho Dudiswa ha Setjhaba, Mme Mmamoloko Kubayi le bomphato ba hae mosebetsing wa ho dudiswa ha setjhaba ya ho phallela ba malapa anngweng ke dikgohola tsa 2022 KwaZulu-Natal jwalo naha itokiseletsa ho hlwaya sehopotso sa pele sa tshenyo ena ya dikhohola tsa.
tgt_text: Le nkampani iza kuzalwa zezi nkampani zimbini zidityanisiweyo iza kuqinisekisa ukuba abasebenzi banezabelo kuyo futhi bayinxalenye yebhodi yayo.

src_text: Ditlhaloso tse Fosahetseng Mabapi le Melemo ya Matona le Batlatsi ba Matona.
tgt_text: UkuHlola iNkqubela ngoNcedo lweZikhukula zowama-.

src_text: Kabinete hlahisa matshwenyeho yona mabapi le tlhahiso fosahetseng tswelang pele ya Melemo ya Matona le Batlatsi ba Matona jwalo ka ha ngotswe Bukaneng ya Ditlhaloso tsa Melemo ya Ditho tsa Kabinete hlalosang megolo eo ba fumanang, disebediswa tsa ho etsa mosebetsi wa bona le merokotso ya bona ha ba entse mosebetsi wa bona ka bokgabane.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iwamkele umsebenzi owenziwe nguMphathiswa wezokuHlaliswa koLuntu, uNksz Mmamoloko Kubayi kunye namaLungu e-MinMEC yokuHlaliswa koLuntu wokuhlola umsebenzi osele wenziwe malunga nokufunelwa kweendawo zokuhlala ezisisigxina iintsapho ezazichatshazelwe zizikhukula zowama-2022 kwiphondo laKwaZulu-Natal njengoko sele kuzakuphela unyaka kwenzeka ezi zikhukula ngowama-.

src_text: Taba ya matlo bodulo ba matona haesale ne thehwe ka 1910 nakong eo ho neng ho qalwa mmuso wa Union of South Africa mme matlo taolo ya puso arolwa hararo, Dikantoro tsa Puso tsa ba Tshwane, tsa Boahlodi tsa ba Bloemfontein mme Palamente yona ya ba Motse Kapa.
tgt_text: Iingxelo ezingeyonyaniso malunga neziBonelelo zabaPhathiswa kunye nooSekela-baPhathiswa.

src_text: Matlo ana madulo kaofela ke pele ho 1994 mme mmuso latetseng eteletsweng pele ke African National Congress netefatsa hore matlo ana fumana tlhokomela hlokahalang bakeng sa ho boloka hore se be dithako.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivakalise ukuxhalaba zingxelo ezingeyonyaniso  ngeziBonelelo zabaPhathiswa nooSekela-Baphathiswa ezicaciswe kwiSikhokelo saMalungu esiGqeba esiLawulayo, esichaza izibonelelo, izixhobo zokusebenza kunye namaqithi-qithi aMalungu eSigqeba ukuze enze umsebenzi wawo ngokufanelekileyo.

src_text: Matona le Batlatsi ba Matona ba dulang matlong mmuso, le bona ba lefa rente jwalo ka ditho tsohle tsa Palamente tla be le ho hloka toka ho lebella hore Matona le Batlatsi ba Matona ba se nang mosebetsi wa moshwelella hore ba ipatlele bodulo empa ba sebeletsa setjhaba.
tgt_text: Isigqibo ngeziNdlu ezisisiBonelelo zabaPhathiswa sathathwa kwisiVumelwano sowe-1910 ngethuba lokusekwa koManyano loMzantsi Afrika apho kwamiselwa ukuba uMzantsi Afrika uza kuba nezixeko ezithathu eziza kudlala indima yokuba likomkhulu: iPitoli iza kuba liKomkhulu likaRhulumente, iBloemfontein yona ibe liKomkhulu leCandelo leeNkundla, ize yona iKapa ibe liKomkhulu lezoWiso-mthetho okanye elinePalamente.

src_text: Dikoloi tse sebediswang ke Matona le Batlatsi ba bona di tsamaellana le Bukana ya Ditlhaloso tsa Melemo mme tekanyetso ya boleng ba tsona behilwe ke Letona la Matlotlo ka therisano le Letona la Sepolesa mabapi le dikarolo tsa tshireletso.
tgt_text: Ezi zindlu kuthiwa zifana namabhotwe zonke zathengwa phambi kowe-1994 kwaye urhulumente okhokelwa yi-African National Congress yena uqinisekisa nje ukuba ziyalungiswa ukuze amaxabiso wazo angehli, ahlale esenyuka njengazo zonke izindlu zexabiso.

src_text: Dikarolo tsa tshireletso ke ntlha ya bohlokwa leng ona laolang ditheko mme sena hape se bakwa le ke diketsahalo tse sa thabiseng tsa moraorao tjena tsa matona lahlehelwang ke maphelo ka lebaka la ho ameha dikotsing tse mpe.
tgt_text: Abaphathiswa kunye nooSekela baPhathiswa abasebenzisa izindlu zombini ezibonelelwe nguRhulumente bahlawula irenti ngendlela efanayo naleyo yenziwa ngamalungu epalamente.

src_text: Ena ke taba ya bohlokwa haholo seng ya ho bapala dipapadi tsa dipolotiki.
tgt_text: Iya kuba yinto engalunganga ukulindela ukuba abaPhathiswa kunye nooSekela baPhathiswa abanemisebenzi engesosigxina ukuba bazifunele ngokwabo iindawo zokuhlala ngelixa besebenzela isizwe.

src_text: Ditho tsohle tsa Palamente di na le tokelo ya ho ba le basebetsi ba ba thusang ho phetha mosebetsi wa bona.
tgt_text: Izithuthi ezisetyenziswa ngabaPhathiswa kunye namaSekela abo zivumelekile ngokwemigaqo ekwiNcwadana yabaPhathiswa futhi ixabiso limiselwa nguMphathiswa wezeMali ngokubonisana noMphathiswa wamaPolisa kwiinkalo zokhuseleko.

src_text: Palo ya basebeletsi ba Letona ka leng laolwa ke nako eo le kgethilweng ka lona, mme hape re tlameha ho hopola hore nako ya kgiro ya basebeletsi bana a lekana le ya Letona leo.
tgt_text: Ubuxhaka-xhaka nezinye izibonelelo zezokhuseleko ezifakelwa kuzo budlala indima xa kumiselwa ixabiso lazo futhi iziganeko ezibuhlungu zakutsha nje ze-MECs zokuphulukana nobomi babo okanye ukubandakanyeka kwiingozi ezimbi zemoto zigxininisa ukubaluleka kwalo mba kwaye kufuneka ungasetyenziswa njengomba onxulumene nezopolitiko.

src_text: Sena se bontsha hore Bukana ena a sebediswa mme dula hlahlojwa kgafetsa..     Mopresidente fetiseditse Bukana ena ya Melemo ya Matona ho Khomishene Ikemetseng ya Meputso ya Ditho tsa Palamente ho lekola, komishene ena ke yona sebetsanang le meputso ya basebetsi bohle ba mmuso maemong phahameng     Diqeto tsa Kabinete.
tgt_text: Onke amalungu ePalamente anelungelo lokuba abenabasebenzi ababancedisayo kwii-ofisi zawo ukuze akwazi ukwenza umsebenzi wawo.

src_text: Moralo wa Leano la Basadi ba Dipapading.
tgt_text: Umahluko kwinani labasebenzi abanika inkxaso kwii-ofisi zabaPhathiswa unxulumene nexesha lokuqeshwa koMphathiswa othile, njengoko bonke aba basebenzi beqeshwa kunye nokuqeshwa koMphathiswa othile.

src_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho kenngwa ha Moralo wa Leano la Basadi ba Dipapading bukaneng ya diphatlalatso tsa mmuso bakeng sa tshwaelo ya setjhaba.
tgt_text: Oku kungenxa yokuba iNcwadana yabaPhathiswa luxwebhu oluhlaziywa rhoqo.

src_text: Leano lena le hlakisa letoto la mehato tla ntshetsapele le ho tshehetsa basadi dipapading le ho netefatsa hore mananeo teng bakeng sa ho rarolla phapang ya bong mefuteng le mekgatlong ya dipapadi.
tgt_text: UMongameli uthumele le Ncwadana yabaPhathiswa ikhoyo ngoku kwiKomishoni eziMeleyo yeMivuzo yabaSebenzi be-Ofisi kaRhulumente, esele ijongene nemivuzo yabo bonke amagosa karhulumente ukuba iphonononge     Izigqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Leano lena le boetse le sebetsana le ditshitiso tsa ho kena ha basadi dipapading tse kang kgaello ya ditjhelete, tshehetso ya ditjhelete le meputso sa lekaneng.
tgt_text: UMgaqo-nkqubo oYilwayo waManina akwiMidlalo.

src_text: Leano le sisintsweng le rerile ho kgothaletsa bonkakarolo bo mahlahahlaha bo eketsehileng ba basadi dipapading le mesebetsing ya boetapele kang ya ho kwetlisa le ho okamela.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukupapashwa kwiphephandaba likarhulumente koMgaqo-nkqubo oyilwayo wamaNina akwiMidlalo ukuze uluntu luhlomle kuwo.

src_text: Leano lena le shebile ho theha bonkakarolo bo eketsehileng ba basadi dipapading le maemong boetapele bo tla fokotsa haholo mme qetellong bo fedisitse ho se lekane ha bong le mefuta fapaneng ya kgethollo kgahlano le basadi.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uchaza uluhlu lwamanyathelo aza kukhuthaza kwaye axhase abasetyhini kwezemidlalo nokuqinisekisa ukuba iinkqubo zikhona ukulungisa ukungalingani ngokwesini kwiintlobo zemidlalo kunye namaqumrhu ezemidlalo.

src_text: Le boetse le batla ho phahamisa tekatekano le ho netefatsa hore basadi ba fumana tlhompho kapa kananelo maemong profeshenale, ho kenyeletswa le meputso lekanang le bomphato ba bona ba banna..     Ho tshwara Seboka sa Matjhaba sa Bophelo bo Botle ba Baimana le Masea sa.
tgt_text: Ikwajongana nemiqobo yokungena kwabasetyhini kwezemidlalo efana nokunqongophala kwenkxaso-mali, izibonelelo zemali kunye nomvuzo onganelanga.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ho tshwarelwa ha Seboka sa Matjhaba sa Bophelo bo Botle ho Baimana le Masea mane Kapa ho tloha ka la 8 ho isa ka la 11 Motshehanong 2023 moo ho tla kopana teng bankakarolo ba fetang 1 000 ho tswa lefatsheng ka bophara ho tla le ditharollo mathateng boimana le ho thibela ho hlokahala ha masea le ho thibela ho ho tsholoha ha mpa.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo ucetywayo unenjongo yokukhuthaza wokunyusa inani labasetyhini abathatha inxaxheba  kwimidlalo nabakwizikhundla zokukhokela ezifana nokuba ngumqeqeshi okanye usompempe.

src_text: Aforika Borwa entse kgatelopele kgolo mabapi le ho fihlella dipehelo tsa Mokgatlo wa Dinaha tse Kopaneng (UN) bakeng sa bophelo bo botle ba baimana le mo ho thibeleng ho tsholoha ha mpa.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uyakuqonda ukuba ukwanda kwenani labantu basetyhini abathatha inxaxheba kwezemidlalo nabakwizikhundla zokukhokela kuzakuphelisa le ngxaki yokungalingani ngokwesini kunye nezinye iintlobo ezahlukeneyo zocalucalulo olujoliswe kwabasetyhini.

src_text: Naha le yona tla una molemo moholo ha baemedi ba dikopano ba tla arolelana hara tse ding, maano bona hlwahlwa mabapi le ditaba tsa bophelo bo botle ba baimana le masea..     Morero wa Resistance and Liberation Heritage Route (RLHR).
tgt_text: Ikwafuna ukukhuthaza ulingano kunye nokuqinisekisa ukuba abasetyhini bayayinikwa indawo yabo xa bekwididi labahlawulwayo kwezemidlalo, kuquka nokuhlawulwa imivuzo elinganayo neyabadlali abangamadoda.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse tlaleho felletseng ya kgatelopele mabapi le ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha morero wa RLHR.
tgt_text: Ukubanjwa kweNkomfa yeHlabathi yowama-2023 yeMpilo yooMama AbaKhulelweyo neeNtsana eziSanda kuZalwa.

src_text: Kabinete hape tjhaetse monwana hore Letona la Dikamano le Tshebedisano ya Matjhaba le la tsa Toka le Tlhabollo ya Batshwaruwa be karolo ya Komiti ya Matona (IMC) RLHR.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi inike imvume yokuba uMzantsi Afrika ubambe iNkomfa yeHlabathi yooMama Abakhulelweyo neeNtsana Ezisanda kuZalwa ukususela ngomhla we-8 ukuya kowe-11 kuCanzibe ngowama-2023, apho amahlakani angaphezulu kwe-1 000 avela kwihlabathi jikelele aza kudibana ukuze kukhawuleziswe izisombululo zokuphucula umgangatho wempilo yoomama abakhulelweyo kunye neentsana ezisanda kuzalwa, kunye ukuthintela ukuzalwa kwabantwana beswelekile.

src_text: RLHR ke projeke ya sehopotso ya naha reretsweng ho ikgopotsa le ho keteka tsela ya Afrika Borwa isang tokolohong.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika wenze inkqubela phambili enkulu ekufezekiseni iinjongo zoPhuhliso oluZinzileyo zeZizwe eziManyeneyo (i-UN) zempilo yoomama abakhulelweyo nabantwana abasanda kuzalwa, kunye nothintelo lokubeleka sele beswelekile.

src_text: Kabinete thehile IMC ho okamela morero ona le ho fana ka boetapele ba dipolotiki.
tgt_text: Ilizwe liza kuxhamla kakhulu njengoko abathunywa benkomfa beza kwabelana, phakathi kwezinye izinto, ngezicwangciso zabo ezisebenzayo kunye nezinto ezintsha kwimiba yempilo yoomama  abakhulelweyo nabantwana abasanda kuzalwa.

src_text: Morero ona habile ho kenyelletsa mekgwa fapaneng ya sehopotso sa boitelo boo balwanedi ba tokoloho ba bo entseng hore Afrika Borwa lokolohe fumane le demokrasi boetse dumella kaho ya dimusiamo, difika, dilaeborari le dipolokelo, mme ikemiseditse ho ananela moya wa kopano le tshebedisano-mmoho hara Maafrika amohetsoe ke Matjhaba Kopaneng mme na le monyetla wa ho matlafatsa tshebedisanommoho pakeng tsa batho ka ho sebedisa setso le lefa ho phatlalla le kontinente.
tgt_text: Iprojekthi ye-Resistance and Liberation Heritage Route (i-RLHR).

src_text: Mesebetsi mengata etsahetseng ka 2022 kenyeletsa maeto Matona ho leba Botswana le Zimbabwe ha mmoho le ho rera dikopano le Angola le Tanzania.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ifumene ingxelo yenkqubela eneenkcukacha malunga nokuphunyezwa kweprojekthi ye-RLHR.

src_text: Diketso tse mabapi le morero ona di ikemiseditse ho hokahanya dinaha tsohle tsa Afrika ka Borwa le ho ruta batjha ka ntwa kgahlano le bokoloniale le kgethollo ya morabe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikwavumile ukuba uMphathiswa wezoBudlelwane baMazwe ngaMazwe neNtsebenziswano kunye kunye nowezoBulungisa kunye neeNkonzo zoLuleko babe yinxalenye yeKomiti yabaPhathiswa (i-IMC) ejongene ne-RLHR.

src_text: Leano lena le lona le fana ka tumello ya ho kgutlisa masalla balwanedi ba tokoloho ba Afrika Borwa ba patilweng dinaheng tsa kantle.
tgt_text: I-RLHR yiprojekthi yesikhumbuzo yesizwe ejolise ekukhumbuleni nasekubhiyozeleni indlela yoMzantsi Afrika esa enkululekweni.

src_text: Mabitla ka bang 11 tsebahalang le Maafrika Borwa fumanwe Zambia, ho kenyeletswa le la mohale wa ntwa Monghadi Duma Nokwe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iseke i-IMC ukuba yongamele le projekthi kwaye ibonelele ngobunkokeli bezopolitiko.

src_text: Leano la Naha la Dijithale ho tsa Bonono, Setso le Botjhaba.
tgt_text: Le projekthi ijonge ukuquka iintlobo ngeentlobo zezikhumbuzo zezinto ezancanywa ngamajoni enkululeko esenzela  uMzantsi Afrika ukuba ukhululeke kwaye ube nentando yesininzi.

src_text: Kabinete amogetse Leano la Naha la Dijithale ho tsa Bonono, Setso le Botjhaba ho ka kengwa tshebetsong.
tgt_text: Ukwavumela ulwakhiwo lweemyuziyam, amatye ezikhumbuzo, amathala eencwadi noovimba, kwaye jolise ekuqondeni umoya wembumba yamanyama nentsebenziswano phakathi kwama-Afrika.

src_text: Leano lena le fana ka phaello eketsehileng Leanong la Naha la phetolelo ho tsa Dijithale ha Disebediswa tsa Bonono ho ntlafaditsweng ke Lefapha la Bonono le Setso ka.
tgt_text: Ivunywe yi-UN kwaye inamandla okuqinisa intsebenziswano phakathi kwabantu ngokusebenzisa inkcubeko kunye nelifa lemveli kwilizwekazi lonke.

src_text: Leano lena le tsepamisitse maikutlo hodima ho kenya mehlodi ya lefa la dijithale ka sepheo sa ho boloka, phihlello le taolo ya beng.
tgt_text: Imisebenzi emininzi eyenzekileyo ngowama-2022 iquka utyelelo lwabaPhathiswa eBotswana naseZimbabwe kwakunye nokwenza amalungiselelo okubamba iintlanganiso e-Angola nase-Tanzania.

src_text: Le hoja phetolelo ena ya dijithale le mokgwa wa ho fetolela ditaba tsa analogue hore be tsa dijithale, mona ho kenyeletswa direkoto tsa pampiri, di-microfiche le direkoto tsa theipi tseo seng tsa dijithale, leano le atolositse le tlhaloso ena ho mehlodi meng ya dijithale jwalo ka tlhahisoleseding hlahiswang ka mokgwa wa dijithale kannang ya se ke ya fetolwa sebopeho sa boyona.
tgt_text: Imisebenzi ejikeleze le projekthi ijolise ekudibaniseni onke amazwe akuMazantsi e-Afrika kunye nokufundisa abantu abatsha malunga nomzabalazo wokulwa ubukoloniyali kunye nobuhlanga.

src_text: Ho etsa dijithale ho tla ba le melemo meholo bakeng sa naha ka ha ho tla fana ka phihlello bonolo ho mehlodi ya tlhahisoleseding, haholoholo tshwerweng ke dipolokelo, dilaeborari le dimusiamo.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uza kuvulela nokuba kubuyiswe amathambo amajoni enkululeko aseMzantsi Afrika angcwatywa kumazwe angaphandle.

src_text: Leano lena le tla kenngwa tshebetsong ho phatlalla le mmuso le setjhaba     Tshisinyo ya molao.
tgt_text: Kukho amangcwaba amalunga ne-11 aziwayo ukuba ngawabemi boMzantsi Afrika athe abhaqwa e-Zambia, aquka elo legqala loMzabalazo uMnu Duma Nokwe.

src_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Tokiso ya Ditaba tsa Boahlodi ya.
tgt_text: UMgaqo-nkqubo weSizwe wokuFakwa kwiKhompyutha koLwazi lwezoBugcisa, iNkcubeko kunye namaFa eMveli.

src_text: Kabinete amohetse ho phatlalatswa ha Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Tokiso ya Ditaba tsa Boahlodi wa 2023 Palamenteng.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iwamkele uMgaqo-nkqubo weSizwe wokuFakwa kwiKhompyutha koLwazi lwezoBugcisa, iNkcubeko kunye namaFa eMveli ukuba uphunyezwe.

src_text: Tshisinyo ena ya Molao ho ikemiseditswe ho ntlafatsa Melao fapafapaneng okametsweng ke Lefapha la Toka le Ntshetsopele ya Molaotheo ka ho sekaseka diketso tse tobaneng le ho kengwa tshebetsong ha melao eo.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uzalisekisa  uMgaqo-nkqubo weSizwe wokuFakwa kwiKhompyutha koLwazi ngamaFa eMveli owaqulunqwa  liSebe langaphambili lezoBugcisa neNkcubeko ngoko ngowama-.

src_text: Tshisinyo ena na le dikarolo tse 37 tse lokisang mathata molaotheo melaong fapafapaneng     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo umalunga nokufakwa kwikhompyutha kolwazi olunxulumene namafa emveli kusenzelwa ukuba lugcinwe, lufumaneke lula futhi kwaziwe nabanikazi balo.

src_text: Letsatsi la Litokelo tsa Botho.
tgt_text: Nangona inkqubo yokufaka kwikhompyutha iyinkqubo yokuguqula ulwazi olushicilelwe emaphepheni lube lulwazi olushicilelwe kwikhompyutha, kuquka amaphepha aselugcinweni aneenkcukacha, i-microfiche kunye neteyiphu ezingashicilelwanga kubuxhaka-xhaka bale mihla,  lomgaqo-nkqubo uye wayihlomela le nkcazelo yaquka nemithombo yolwazi eshicilelwe ngobuxhaka-xhaka bale mihla kwasekuqaleni efana nolwazi oluveliswa ngeekhompyutha, lona olungasoze lushicelelwe ephepheni okanye kwesinye isixhobo esibambekayo.

src_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla fana ka puo ya sehlooho ketsahalong ya naha ya Letsatsi la Ditokelo tsa Botho la 2023 ka Labobedi la la 21 Tlhakubele 2023 Lebaleng la Dipapadi la De Aar West, Kapa Leboya.
tgt_text: Ukufakwa kolwazi kwikhompyutha kuza kulinceda kakhulu eli lizwe njengoko kuza kwenza ukuba kube lula ukufumana imithombo yolwazi, ingakumbi leyo igcinwe koovimba bolwazi, amathala eencwadi kunye neemyuziyam.

src_text: Mookotaba wa selemo sena ke: “Ho Kopanya le ho Tshwara Setso sa Ditokelo tsa Botho ho Isa Bokamosong”, ha re ntse re hopola dipolao tsa Sharpeville le Langa, le mehwanto meng etsahetseng ka la 21 Tlhakubele 1960 naheng ka bophara.
tgt_text: Lo mgaqo-nkqubo uza kusetyenziswa ngurhulumente wonke nakuluntu ngokubanzi     Umthetho osaYilwayo.

src_text: Jwalo ka mmuso, re dula re itlamme boikarabelong ba molaotheo ba ho sireletsa ditokelo tsa botho tsa batho bohle naheng.
tgt_text: UMthetho-siHlomelo oYilwayo weMiba yeeNkundla wowama-.

src_text: Ha re sebetseng mmoho ho netefatsa hore ha re siele motho morao mabapi le ho etsa dipehelo tsa Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa wa 1996 le Bili ya Ditokelo tsa Botho ho phethahala ho bohle.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukungeniswa ePalamente koMthetho-siHlomelo oYilwayo weMiba yeNkundla wowama-.

src_text: Letsatsi la Lefatše la Metsi.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo ujolise ekuhlomeleni iMithetho emininzi elawulwa liSebe lezoBulungisa noPhuhliso loMgaqo-siseko ngokujongana nemiba yobugcisa kunye nemiba echaphazela ukusebenza ngokubonakalayo kwale Mithetho.

src_text: Afrika Borwa tla tshwaya Beke ya Naha ya Metsi ho tloha ka la 20 ho isa la 26 Tlhakubele 2023 tlasa mokotaba: “Re Potlakisa Phetoho”.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho usaYilwayo uqulathe amagatya angama-37 aphakamisa izilungiso ukulungisa iindawo ezinxamnye nomgaqo-siseko kwiMithetho eyahlukeneyo     Imisitho ezayo.

src_text: Beke ena tsamaisana le Letsatsi la Lefatshe la Metsi ka la 22 Tlhakubele 2023, le totobatsang bohlokwa ba metsi hlwekileng.
tgt_text: Usuku lwamaLungelo oLuntu.

src_text: Ho sa tsotellehe dipula tse matla tsa moraorao tjena dikarolong tsa naha, Afrika Borwa ntse le naha hlokang metsi mme maemong bo 30 dinaha tse omeletseng ka ho fetisisa lefatsheng.
tgt_text: UMongameli Ramaphosa uza kwenza intetho ephambili kumsitho wesizwe woSuku lwamaLungelo oLuntu lowama-2023 ngoLwesibini, umhla wama-21 kweyoKwindla 2023 e-De Aar West Stadium, eMntla Koloni.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho setjhaba ho sireletsa mehlodi ya rona ya metsi bohlokwa haholo paballong ya metsi.
tgt_text: Umxholo walo nyaka uthi: “UkuBethelela nokuKhusela amaLungelo oLuntu kuLungiselelwa Amangomso”, njengoko sikhumbula inyhikityha  yokubulawa kwentlaninge yabantu e-Sharpeville nakwaLanga, kunye neminye imingcelele eyathi yaqhutywa ngomhla wama-21 kweyoKwindla kowe-1960 kwilizwe liphela.

src_text: Kaofela re na le karolo eo re lokelang ho bapala ho baballeng metsi le ho netefatsa hore phepelo ya ona ha fele.
tgt_text: Njengorhulumente, sihlala sizibophelele kuxanduva lomgaqo-siseko lokukhusela amalungelo abantu bonke elizweni.

src_text: Letsatsi la Matjha la Lefuba (TB).
tgt_text: Masisebenzisane ukuqinisekisa ukuba asishiyi namnye ngasemva ekwenzeni izibonelelo zoMgaqo-siseko weRiphablikhi yoMzantsi Afrika wowe-1996 kunye noMqulu wamaLungelo oLuntu zibe yinyani ephilayo kumntu wonke.

src_text: Motlatsi wa Mopresidente Paul Mashatile tla fana ka puo ya sehlooho nakong ya sehopotso sa semmuso sa Letsatsi la Matjhaba la Lefuba ka la 24 Tlhakubele 2023 tlasa mokotaba: “E!
tgt_text: Usuku lwaManzi lweHlabathi.

src_text: Nna le wena re ka fedisa TB”.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uza kuphawula iVeki yeSizwe yaManzi ukusuka ngomhla wama-20 ukuya kowama-26 kweyoKwindla 2023 phantsi komxholo othi: “UkuKhawulezisa iiNguqu”.

src_text: Ketsahalo ya semmuso tla ba Lebaleng la Dipapadi la Tlhabane ho la Leboya Bophirima mme Lekgotla la Naha la AIDS la Afrika Borwa le Lefapha la Bophelo bo Botle ba tla thakgola Moralo wa Lewa la Naha bakeng sa TB, HIV le Mahloko Tshwaetso ka Thobalano bakeng sa 2023 ho isa ho.
tgt_text: Le veki ingqamana noSuku lwaManzi lweHlabathi olungomhla wama-22 kweyoKwindla 2023, oluqaqambisa ukubaluleka kwamanzi abalekayo.

src_text: Sena se ahella hodima kgatelopele kgolo fihlelletsweng ka tjantjello ntjhafaditsweng hodima thibelo, kalafo, ho amohela, ho latela melao, le ho fedisa kgethollo le sekgobo     Melaetsa.
tgt_text: Ngaphandle kweemvula ezinkulu zakutsha nje kwiindawo ezithile zeli lizwe, uMzantsi Afrika uselilizwe elinengxaki yokunqongophala kwamanzi kwaye ukwindawo yama-30 kwawona mazwe omileyo ehlabathini.

src_text: Diteboho Kabinete fetiseditse ditebohiso le ditakaletso tse molemo ho:Proteas bao ha jwale ba amohelang West Indies bakeng sa leeto la mefuta mengata.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ihlaba ikhwelo kubo bonke abemi ukuba balondoloze imithombo yamanzi ebalulekileyo efana neendawo ezilijojo, njengoko le mithombo iza kusinceda ukuba sihlale sinamanzi aneleyo nakule minyaka izayo.

src_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho Maafrika Borwa ho tshehetsa Proteas jwalo ka ha ba tswelapele le ho phahamisa folakga ya naha ya habo rona..     MatshidisoKabinete lebisitse matshediso ho ba lelapa le metswalle ya:Letona la Thuto la Foreisetata Tate Makgoe (60), ya kentseng letsoho haholo lekaleng la thuto mme etella pele Foreisetata ka katleho ho fihlela sekgahla se phahameng ka ho fetisisa sa ho pasa ha baithuti ba materiki dilemong tse nne tse latellanang.Mme Maurencia Gillion, ya neng emetse Kapa Bophirima Lekgotleng la Naha la Diprofensi, mme sebetsa Komiting Ikgethileng ya Ditshebeletso tsa Bophelo bo Botle le Setjhaba ne le moitseki ya tsebahalang mme sebeletsa batho ba Kapa Bophirima, haholo dibakeng tsa mahaeng profensing eo, ka dilemo tse ngata.Ntate John Wills (66), mmuelli ya tummeng wa ditokelo tsa botho le molwanedi ya neng emela baeteledipele ba sepolotiki ba kenyeletsang Mopresidente wa mehleng Nelson Mandela.Ntate Mark Pilgrim (54), raditaba ya tummeng ya bileng le tshusumetso kgolo indastering ya boraditaba.Mme Gloria Bosman (50), sebini le moqapi wa mmino wa jazz wa Afrika Borwa ya hapileng dikgau tse ngata     KhiroPele batho bohle ba hirwa, ho hlahlobisiswa mangolo bona thuto le mang hlokahalang.
tgt_text: Sonke sinendima ekufuneka siyidlalile ekongeni amanzi nokuqinisekisa ukuba amanzi awasipheleli.

src_text: Ditho tsa Lekgotla la Keletso la Tsamaiso ya Merero ya Dithaetlele tsa ho ba le Matlo     Moatevokate Boyce Mkhize (Modulasetulo)     Hosi Pheni Cypraim Ngove (Motlatsi wa Modulasetulo)     Mme Kagisho Mmaseleke Choenyana     Ntate Pieter Jacobus De Beer     Moatevokate Nomonde Nokuthula January     Ntate Iqbal Mohamed Motala; le     Ngaka Vuyisani Moss.
tgt_text: Usuku lweHlabathi lweSifo sePhepha (i-TB).
